engChrName: Hello.
engSearchText: Hello.
jpnChrName: （一通り回ったし、そろそろ   ＣＩＤからの魔獣退治に行くか？）
jpnSearchText:
（一通り回ったし、そろそろ
ＣＩＤからの魔獣退治に行くか？）

engChrName: Hi.
engSearchText: Hi.
jpnChrName: これ以上進むと、 メインのストーリーが進行します。
jpnSearchText:
これ以上進むと、
メインのストーリーが進行します。

engChrName: (Okay, we've wrapped up our other work here. Suppose it's time we go handle the CID's job.)
engSearchText:
(Okay, we've wrapped up our other work here.
Suppose it's time we go handle the CID's job.)
jpnChrName: 市街を自由に回れなくなるので 注意して下さい。
jpnSearchText:
市街を自由に回れなくなるので
注意して下さい。

engChrName: If you choose to proceed, the main story will advance.
engSearchText: If you choose to proceed, the main story will advance.
jpnChrName: っと、導力メールか。
jpnSearchText: っと、導力メールか。

engChrName: When this happens, you will no longer be able to move freely around town.
engSearchText:
When this happens, you will no longer be able to
move freely around town.
jpnChrName: あ、もしかして……
jpnSearchText: あ、もしかして……

engChrName: Oh, sounds like I've got mail.
engSearchText: Oh, sounds like I've got mail.
jpnChrName: どなたからですか？
jpnSearchText: どなたからですか？

engChrName: Who's it from?
engSearchText: Who's it from?
jpnChrName: ハッ、女からの呼び出しかよ？
jpnSearchText: ハッ、女からの呼び出しかよ？

engChrName: Who from?
engSearchText: Who from?
jpnChrName: そんなんじゃねぇっ。
jpnSearchText: そんなんじゃねぇっ。

engChrName: Oho. You got a booty call?
engSearchText: Oho. You got a booty call?
jpnChrName: ……どうやらＣＩＤからの “下請け”みたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
……どうやらＣＩＤからの
“下請け”みたいだな。

engChrName: No. Shut up.
engSearchText: No. Shut up.
jpnChrName: 未確認の魔獣の調査と討伐…… これもギルドへの牽制だろう。
jpnSearchText:
未確認の魔獣の調査と討伐……
これもギルドへの牽制だろう。

engChrName: It's from the CID. They've got another job for us.
engSearchText: It's from the CID. They've got another job for us.
jpnChrName: 場所は──《ディルク記念公園》か。
jpnSearchText: 場所は──《ディルク記念公園》か。

engChrName: Typical monster extermination gig, looks like.
engSearchText: Typical monster extermination gig, looks like.
jpnChrName: ディルク記念公園── 首都郊外ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ディルク記念公園──
首都郊外ですね。

engChrName: We'll be heading to Dirke Memorial Park.
engSearchText: We'll be heading to Dirke Memorial Park.
jpnChrName: 記念公園…… そんな場所があるんですか。
jpnSearchText:
記念公園……
そんな場所があるんですか。

engChrName: Oh, really? I believe that's on the outskirts of the city.
engSearchText: Oh, really? I believe that's on the outskirts of the city.
jpnChrName: ディルク記念公園── あのシーナ・ディルク関連かよ？
jpnSearchText:
ディルク記念公園──
あのシーナ・ディルク関連かよ？

engChrName: Ooh, I've never been to a memorial park before.
engSearchText: Ooh, I've never been to a memorial park before.
jpnChrName: ああ、ちょいと遠くて面倒だが。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ちょいと遠くて面倒だが。

engChrName: Never been to that place before. I'm guessing it's named after Sheena Dirke.
engSearchText:
Never been to that place before. I'm guessing it's
named after Sheena Dirke.
jpnChrName: ああ、首都郊外にな。 ちょいと遠くて面倒だが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、首都郊外にな。
ちょいと遠くて面倒だが。

engChrName: Would've been nice if they picked some place closer, but oh, well.
engSearchText:
Would've been nice if they picked some place closer,
but oh, well.
jpnChrName: （……？   このメール、随分下まで改行してやがる。）
jpnSearchText:
（……？
このメール、随分下まで改行してやがる。）

engChrName: It's on the outskirts of the city, so we'll have to drive a ways to get there. Wish they picked some place closer.
engSearchText:
It's on the outskirts of the city, so we'll have to drive a
ways to get there. Wish they picked some
place closer.

engChrName: (...Hold up. What's with all the extra line breaks?)
engSearchText: (...Hold up. What's with all the extra line breaks?)
jpnChrName: Ｐ．Ｓ． 思い出くらい大切にしておけ。
jpnSearchText:
Ｐ．Ｓ．
思い出くらい大切にしておけ。

engChrName: (Wait...)
engSearchText: (Wait...)

engChrName: P.S. Make sure you treasure all of your memories.
engSearchText: P.S. Make sure you treasure all of your memories.
jpnChrName: はあ……ったくあの野郎。 性格が悪すぎだろ。
jpnSearchText:
はあ……ったくあの野郎。
性格が悪すぎだろ。

jpnChrName: ……？ それで……どうします？
jpnSearchText:
……？
それで……どうします？

engChrName: *sigh* That guy's a pain in the neck sometimes.
engSearchText: *sigh* That guy's a pain in the neck sometimes.
jpnChrName: ……？ えっと、どうしましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……？
えっと、どうしましょうか？

engChrName: ...? So, what should we do?
engSearchText: ...? So, what should we do?
jpnChrName: ……？ で、どうすんだ？
jpnSearchText:
……？
で、どうすんだ？

engChrName: ...? Umm... So, what are we gonna do?
engSearchText: ...? Umm... So, what are we gonna do?
jpnChrName: ……まあ、報酬も悪くねえ。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、報酬も悪くねえ。

engChrName: ...? So, what's the plan, chief?
engSearchText: ...? So, what's the plan, chief?
jpnChrName: ギルドに片付けられる前に 横取りしちまったほうがいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドに片付けられる前に
横取りしちまったほうがいいだろう。

engChrName: ...Well, the pay's decent enough, I guess.
engSearchText: ...Well, the pay's decent enough, I guess.
jpnChrName: 車を出す必要がある── 他の用事が済んだらガレージに行くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
車を出す必要がある──
他の用事が済んだらガレージに行くぞ。

engChrName: I think snatching it out of the guild's grubby paws is the play here.
engSearchText:
I think snatching it out of the guild's grubby paws is
the play here.
jpnChrName: おっと…… （一般通信みてぇだな。）
jpnSearchText:
おっと……
（一般通信みてぇだな。）

engChrName: We're gonna need to take the car, though, so let's get back to the garage once we're done with everything else.
engSearchText:
We're gonna need to take the car, though, so let's get
back to the garage once we're done with
everything else.
jpnChrName: やあ、フェリちゃんの雇い主。
jpnSearchText: <C1>やあ、フェリちゃんの雇い主。

engChrName: ...Hmm? (Don't recognize this number.)
engSearchText:
...Hmm?
(Don't recognize this number.)
jpnChrName: 《三日月亭》の女将だけど 今、ちょっといいかい？
jpnSearchText:
《三日月亭》の女将だけど
今、ちょっといいかい？

engChrName: Hello there. I take it I'm speaking with Feri's employer?
engSearchText:
Hello there. I take it I'm speaking with
Feri's employer?
jpnChrName: ああ、構わないぜ。 何かトラブルでもあったか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、構わないぜ。
何かトラブルでもあったか？

engChrName: I'm the owner of the inn you all are staying at. Do you have a moment to talk?
engSearchText:
I'm the owner of the inn you all are staying at.
Do you have a moment to talk?
jpnChrName: いやねえ、実はアンタたちを 紹介してくれって人がいてね。
jpnSearchText:
いやねえ、実はアンタたちを
紹介してくれって人がいてね。

engChrName: Oh, sure. What's up?
engSearchText: Oh, sure. What's up?
jpnChrName: 他の用事が済んでからでいいから、 話を聞いてやってほしいんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
他の用事が済んでからでいいから、
話を聞いてやってほしいんだよ。

engChrName: There's a man who dropped by earlier and asked to pass along a message.
engSearchText:
There's a man who dropped by earlier and asked to
pass along a message.
jpnChrName: 内容と報酬次第だが…… どちらに向かえばいいんだ？
jpnSearchText:
内容と報酬次第だが……
どちらに向かえばいいんだ？

engChrName: He has a job for you, and he wishes to meet in person to discuss the nature of the request.
engSearchText:
He has a job for you, and he wishes to meet in person
to discuss the nature of the request.
jpnChrName: 伝統地区にある公衆浴場（ハマム）さ、 詳しくはそっちで聞いとくれ。
jpnSearchText:
伝統地区にある公衆浴場（ハマム）さ、
詳しくはそっちで聞いとくれ。

engChrName: Got'cha. Well, I can't make any firm commitments, but I'm down to hear him out. Where's he at?
engSearchText:
Got'cha. Well, I can't make any firm commitments,
but I'm down to hear him out. Where's he at?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、頼んだよ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>それじゃあ、頼んだよ。

engChrName: You will find him at the public bath in the Cultural District. He said this isn't an urgent matter, so you can take your time if you have other work.
engSearchText:
You will find him at the public bath in the
Cultural District. He said this isn't an urgent matter,
so you can take your time if you have other work.
jpnChrName: 宿の女将さんから…… それに公衆浴場（ハマム）からですか。
jpnSearchText:
宿の女将さんから……
それに公衆浴場（ハマム）からですか。

engChrName: That's all he had to say. Thank you.
engSearchText: That's all he had to say. Thank you.
jpnChrName: 何かトラブルでも起きたんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: 何かトラブルでも起きたんでしょうか？

engChrName: Huh. Wonder what he wants.
engSearchText: Huh. Wonder what he wants.
jpnChrName: 午前中も入れなかったしな。 とにかく行くだけ行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
午前中も入れなかったしな。
とにかく行くだけ行ってみるか。

engChrName: Perhaps there's a problem with the baths?
engSearchText: Perhaps there's a problem with the baths?
jpnChrName: さあな…… とにかく行くだけ行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
さあな……
とにかく行くだけ行ってみるか。

engChrName: Maybe, yeah. It'd explain why they were closed earlier.
engSearchText:
Maybe, yeah. It'd explain why they were
closed earlier.
jpnChrName: 暑くなってきたし、ついでに 汗流していくのもアリかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
暑くなってきたし、ついでに
汗流していくのもアリかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: Maybe. Hard to know for sure till we head over there and see what the deal is.
engSearchText:
Maybe. Hard to know for sure till we head over there
and see what the deal is.
jpnChrName: ハッ、てめぇのサウナ趣味じゃねえが 悪くはなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、てめぇのサウナ趣味じゃねえが
悪くはなさそうだ。

engChrName: If you're right, though, we should help him out. It's scorching hot, so now's a perfect time for a good soak.
engSearchText:
If you're right, though, we should help him out.
It's scorching hot, so now's a perfect time for a
good soak.
jpnChrName: えへへ…… ちょっと楽しみですっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
ちょっと楽しみですっ。

engChrName: Normally, I wouldn't be on board with enabling your weird sauna obsession, but I'll allow it this time.
engSearchText:
Normally, I wouldn't be on board with enabling your
weird sauna obsession, but I'll allow it this time.
jpnChrName: それでは用事を済ませたら そちらへ伺ってみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
それでは用事を済ませたら
そちらへ伺ってみましょうか。

engChrName: Me, too. I'll do anything to help beat this heat!
engSearchText: Me, too. I'll do anything to help beat this heat!
jpnChrName: （この番号は……何か掛かったか。）
jpnSearchText: （この番号は……何か掛かったか。）

engChrName: Then let's head over there as soon as we're ready.
engSearchText: Then let's head over there as soon as we're ready.
jpnChrName: ヴァン──今、どこにいる？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン──今、どこにいる？

engChrName: (Did he find something already? That was fast.)
engSearchText: (Did he find something already? That was fast.)
jpnChrName: ああ、ちょうど──
jpnSearchText: ああ、ちょうど──

engChrName: Where are you right now, Van?
engSearchText: Where are you right now, Van?
jpnChrName: ……？　どうした？ 妙に慌ててるみてえだが。
jpnSearchText:
……？　どうした？
妙に慌ててるみてえだが。

engChrName: Oh, I'm over by—
engSearchText: Oh, I'm over by—
jpnChrName: ──頼まれていた件だが 早速、目立つ動きがあった。
jpnSearchText:
──頼まれていた件だが
早速、目立つ動きがあった。

engChrName: ...Huh? What's up? You sound kinda serious.
engSearchText: ...Huh? What's up? You sound kinda serious.
jpnChrName: お前たちが二度出くわしたという 護衛を連れた観光客を覚えているか？
jpnSearchText:
お前たちが二度出くわしたという
護衛を連れた観光客を覚えているか？

engChrName: I have an update for you.
engSearchText: I have an update for you.
jpnChrName: 先ほど連中が騒ぎを起こしたらしい。
jpnSearchText: 先ほど連中が騒ぎを起こしたらしい。

engChrName: You remember those troublemaking tourists with the bodyguards?
engSearchText:
You remember those troublemaking tourists with
the bodyguards?
jpnChrName: またですか……？ 懲りない人たちです。
jpnSearchText:
またですか……？
懲りない人たちです。

engChrName: Well, they're at it again.
engSearchText: Well, they're at it again.
jpnChrName: ったく、今度は何をやらかしたんだ？
jpnSearchText: ったく、今度は何をやらかしたんだ？

engChrName: Are you for real...? When are they gonna learn their lesson?
engSearchText:
Are you for real...? When are they gonna learn
their lesson?
jpnChrName: ……周囲にいた目撃者の証言だ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>……周囲にいた目撃者の証言だ。

engChrName: *sigh* What've they done this time?
engSearchText: *sigh* What've they done this time?
jpnChrName: 現地の踊り子らしき少女に絡んで 車に連れ込んだらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
現地の踊り子らしき少女に絡んで
車に連れ込んだらしくてな。

engChrName: Let me read out the witness' testimony.
engSearchText: Let me read out the witness' testimony.
jpnChrName: 止めようとしたベレー帽の娘も ついでに連れ込んで走り去ったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
止めようとしたベレー帽の娘も
ついでに連れ込んで走り去ったらしい。

engChrName: 'They went up to a local dancer girl and forced her into their car...'
engSearchText:
'They went up to a local dancer girl and forced
her into their car...'

engChrName: '...then a girl in a beret tried to stop them—and they pushed her in, too.'
engSearchText:
'...then a girl in a beret tried to stop them—and they
pushed her in, too.'
jpnChrName: そ、それって……！？
jpnSearchText: そ、それって……！？

jpnChrName: ……ギルドか警察には？
jpnSearchText: ……ギルドか警察には？

engChrName: Th-That sounds like...
engSearchText: Th-That sounds like...
jpnChrName: 間が悪い事に今は無理そうだ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>間が悪い事に今は無理そうだ。

engChrName: ...Have the police or the guild taken action?
engSearchText: ...Have the police or the guild taken action?
jpnChrName: （これで一通りは回れたな。 　今の所、怪しい動きはなさそうだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（これで一通りは回れたな。
　今の所、怪しい動きはなさそうだが……）

engChrName: They have not, unfortunately. It sounds like they don't have the manpower to spare at the moment.
engSearchText:
They have not, unfortunately. It sounds like they
don't have the manpower to spare at the moment.
jpnChrName: （他に用事がなければ、どこかで 　パレードの開始を待つとするか。）
jpnSearchText:
（他に用事がなければ、どこかで
　パレードの開始を待つとするか。）

engChrName: (Okay, we've finished makin' our rounds. Nothing out of the ordinary so far.)
engSearchText:
(Okay, we've finished makin' our rounds.
Nothing out of the ordinary so far.)
jpnChrName: メインストーリーを進める場合、移動メニューから 『パレードまで待機する』を選択してください。
jpnSearchText:
メインストーリーを進める場合、移動メニューから
『パレードまで待機する』を選択してください。

engChrName: (Not much else to do now 'cept chill out and wait for the parade to start.)
engSearchText:
(Not much else to do now 'cept chill out and wait for
the parade to start.)
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、通信が……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、通信が……

engChrName: Choosing 'Wait for the Parade' from the Travel menu will cause the main story to advance.
engSearchText:
Choosing 'Wait for the Parade' from the Travel
menu will cause the main story to advance.
jpnChrName: ああ…… （この番号は──）
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
（この番号は──）

engChrName: Your Xipha's ringing, Van.
engSearchText: Your Xipha's ringing, Van.
jpnChrName: よう、アークライド。 サルバッドじゃお疲れだったな。
jpnSearchText:
よう、アークライド。
サルバッドじゃお疲れだったな。

engChrName: So it is. (I swear I've seen this number before...)
engSearchText:
So it is.
(I swear I've seen this number before...)
jpnChrName: 《不動》、アンタか……
jpnSearchText: 《不動》、アンタか……

engChrName: 'Sup, Arkride? I heard you had a bad time in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
'Sup, Arkride? I heard you had a bad time
in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: おいおい、何度か絡んでるのに 露骨に嫌そうな顔するなよ。
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、何度か絡んでるのに
露骨に嫌そうな顔するなよ。

engChrName: Ugh. Not you...
engSearchText: Ugh. Not you...
jpnChrName: “試験紙”としてはどうしても 警戒せざるを得ねえからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
“試験紙”としてはどうしても
警戒せざるを得ねえからなぁ。

engChrName: Aww, what do you mean, 'Not you'? You're gonna make me cry.
engSearchText:
Aww, what do you mean, 'Not you'? You're gonna
make me cry.
jpnChrName: どうせまた面倒事を 押し付けようってハラだろ？
jpnSearchText:
どうせまた面倒事を
押し付けようってハラだろ？

engChrName: Can you blame me for bein' wary? You people're always hoverin' over me and judging how I choose to handle my work.
engSearchText:
Can you blame me for bein' wary? You people're
always hoverin' over me and judging how I choose to
handle my work.
jpnChrName: わはは、否定はせんさ。 しかも今回はそれなりでな。
jpnSearchText:
わはは、否定はせんさ。
しかも今回はそれなりでな。

engChrName: Plus I have a sinking feeling you're only callin' to bring trouble to my doorstep. Again.
engSearchText:
Plus I have a sinking feeling you're only callin' to
bring trouble to my doorstep. Again.
jpnChrName: 単刀直入に言うが── “１３番”に付き合っちゃくれねえか？
jpnSearchText:
単刀直入に言うが──
“１３番”に付き合っちゃくれねえか？

engChrName: Ahaha. Am I that easy to read? Yeah, this job's a toughie, for sure.
engSearchText:
Ahaha. Am I that easy to read? Yeah, this job's a
toughie, for sure.

engChrName: I'll cut to the chase. Would you mind coming with me to the 13th?
engSearchText:
I'll cut to the chase. Would you mind coming with
me to the 13th?

jpnChrName: 裏解決屋（お前さん）なら当然、 知らねえはずはねえよな？
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋（お前さん）なら当然、
知らねえはずはねえよな？

engChrName: (The 13th...)
engSearchText: (The 13th...)
jpnChrName: それどころか 定期的に顔を出してそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
それどころか
定期的に顔を出してそうだが。

engChrName: Surely you don't need me to spell out what that means.
engSearchText:
Surely you don't need me to spell out what
that means.
jpnChrName: ……さて、どうだかな。
jpnSearchText: ……さて、どうだかな。

engChrName: You strike me as the kinda guy who'd drop by there a lot.
engSearchText:
You strike me as the kinda guy who'd drop by there
a lot.
jpnChrName: アンタこそあんな所に いったい何の用事がある？
jpnSearchText:
アンタこそあんな所に
いったい何の用事がある？

engChrName: No comment.
engSearchText: No comment.
jpnChrName: なに、ちょっとした野暮用さ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>なに、ちょっとした野暮用さ。

engChrName: I'm curious. What business do you have there?
engSearchText: I'm curious. What business do you have there?
jpnChrName: 知らん場所でもないが、最近じゃ どうしても顔を出しにくいんでね。
jpnSearchText:
知らん場所でもないが、最近じゃ
どうしても顔を出しにくいんでね。

engChrName: Oh, nothing major.
engSearchText: Oh, nothing major.
jpnChrName: お前さんが付き合ってくれるならと 思ったんだが──どうだ？
jpnSearchText:
お前さんが付き合ってくれるならと
思ったんだが──どうだ？

engChrName: But it's not exactly a place I fit in, especially as of late.
engSearchText: But it's not exactly a place I fit in, especially as of late.

engChrName: So I figured I'd ask if you could tag along. C'mon, help a guy out, will ya?
engSearchText:
So I figured I'd ask if you could tag along.
C'mon, help a guy out, will ya?
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえ──アンタにはそのうち 貸しを作っときたかったところだ。
jpnSearchText:
仕方ねえ──アンタにはそのうち
貸しを作っときたかったところだ。

jpnChrName: “Ｃ３”あたりでいいか？
jpnSearchText: “Ｃ３”あたりでいいか？

engChrName: All right, you win. You owe me one after this, though.
engSearchText:
All right, you win. You owe me one after
this, though.
jpnChrName: ああ、区切りがついてからでいい。 適当に案件こなして待ってるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、区切りがついてからでいい。
適当に案件こなして待ってるぜ。

engChrName: Wanna meet up in the C-3 area?
engSearchText: Wanna meet up in the C-3 area?
jpnChrName: ……えっと……
jpnSearchText: ……えっと……

engChrName: Sure thing. Oh, and don't feel like you need to rush if you've got other business to take care of. I can keep myself busy while I wait.
engSearchText:
Sure thing. Oh, and don't feel like you need to rush if
you've got other business to take care of. I can keep
myself busy while I wait.
jpnChrName: あのクマみたいなヒトが どうしたんですか？
jpnSearchText:
あのクマみたいなヒトが
どうしたんですか？

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: 《不動》──黒月も 一目置いてやがる達人か。
jpnSearchText:
《不動》──黒月も
一目置いてやがる達人か。

engChrName: So, what'd he want?
engSearchText: So, what'd he want?
jpnChrName: 何の話だ？
jpnSearchText: 何の話だ？

engChrName: So that's the famous Zin the Immovable.
engSearchText: So that's the famous Zin the Immovable.
jpnChrName: こっちの話だ。 大したことじゃねえさ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちの話だ。
大したことじゃねえさ。

engChrName: The hell did he want?
engSearchText: The hell did he want?
jpnChrName: （あらかた片付いたら行くか……）
jpnSearchText: （あらかた片付いたら行くか……）

engChrName: Oh, nothing much. Don't worry about it.
engSearchText: Oh, nothing much. Don't worry about it.

engChrName: (Guess I'll head over once I've wrapped up my other work.)
engSearchText:
(Guess I'll head over once I've wrapped up my
other work.)
jpnChrName: 移動メニューから 『今日の業務を終了する』を選ぶと メインのストーリーが進行します。
jpnSearchText:
移動メニューから
『今日の業務を終了する』を選ぶと
メインのストーリーが進行します。

jpnChrName: （……業務が終わったらあの場所で 《不動》と落ち合う約束になっている。）
jpnSearchText:
（……業務が終わったらあの場所で
《不動》と落ち合う約束になっている。）

engChrName: Choosing 'Call It a Day' from the Travel menu will cause the main story to advance.
engSearchText:
Choosing 'Call It a Day' from the Travel menu will
cause the main story to advance.
jpnChrName: （そろそろ向かうか……？）
jpnSearchText: （そろそろ向かうか……？）

engChrName: (I agreed to meet up with the Immovable once my other work was done.)
engSearchText:
(I agreed to meet up with the Immovable once my
other work was done.)
jpnChrName: よし──職人街はこんな所か。 そろそろ新市街に戻ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
よし──職人街はこんな所か。
そろそろ新市街に戻ってみるぞ。

engChrName: (Should I head over there now?)
engSearchText: (Should I head over there now?)
jpnChrName: エアロトラムが使えない以上、 車か徒歩になりますがどちらに……？
jpnSearchText:
エアロトラムが使えない以上、
車か徒歩になりますがどちらに……？

engChrName: I think that's all there is to see in the Artisanal District. We should check out New Town next.
engSearchText:
I think that's all there is to see in the Artisanal
District. We should check out New Town next.
jpnChrName: まずは歩きだな。 動線のチェックは重要だ。
jpnSearchText:
まずは歩きだな。
動線のチェックは重要だ。

engChrName: Since we cannot use the aerotram, we will have to either walk or drive there.
engSearchText:
Since we cannot use the aerotram, we will have to
either walk or drive there.
jpnChrName: マジかよ……クソダリーな。
jpnSearchText: マジかよ……クソダリーな。

engChrName: Let's take a walk. It'll help us get more acquainted with the city and its people.
engSearchText:
Let's take a walk. It'll help us get more acquainted
with the city and its people.
jpnChrName: となると……徒歩用の “連絡橋”があるみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
となると……徒歩用の
“連絡橋”があるみたいですね。

engChrName: You gotta be kidding me. Walking's a pain in the ass.
engSearchText: You gotta be kidding me. Walking's a pain in the ass.
jpnChrName: さっそく行ってみましょう！
jpnSearchText: さっそく行ってみましょう！

engChrName: Well, I, for one, think a stroll would be lovely.
engSearchText: Well, I, for one, think a stroll would be lovely.
jpnChrName: （そろそろカトル君に   認証カードのことを相談しようかな？）
jpnSearchText:
（そろそろカトル君に
認証カードのことを相談しようかな？）

engChrName: Me, too! Let's make our way to the bridge, then.
engSearchText: Me, too! Let's make our way to the bridge, then.
jpnChrName: カトルに連絡するとメインストーリーが進行し クエストなど一部のやり込みが終了します。
jpnSearchText:
カトルに連絡するとメインストーリーが進行し
クエストなど一部のやり込みが終了します。

engChrName: (Maybe now would be a good time to call Quatre and ask about our certification cards.)
engSearchText:
(Maybe now would be a good time to call Quatre and
ask about our certification cards.)
jpnChrName: はい、こちらサリシオン── ああ……アニエスさんか。
jpnSearchText:
はい、こちらサリシオン──
ああ……アニエスさんか。

engChrName: Contacting Quatre will cause the main story to advance. As a result, all unfinished quests will disappear.
engSearchText:
Contacting Quatre will cause the main story
to advance. As a result, all unfinished quests
will disappear.
jpnChrName: カトル君。 良かったです、繋がって。
jpnSearchText:
カトル君。
良かったです、繋がって。

engChrName: Yes, this is Salision speaking. Ah, it's you, Agnès.
engSearchText: Yes, this is Salision speaking. Ah, it's you, Agnès.
jpnChrName: ……？　少しノイズが 入っているみたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
……？　少しノイズが
入っているみたいですね？

engChrName: Oh, good! I was worried I wouldn't be able to get through.
engSearchText:
Oh, good! I was worried I wouldn't be able to
get through.
jpnChrName: ああ……ごめん、今ちょっと 手が離せない状況なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……ごめん、今ちょっと
手が離せない状況なんだ。

engChrName: ...? It sounds like there's a little bit of interference with the connection, though.
engSearchText:
...? It sounds like there's a little bit of interference
with the connection, though.
jpnChrName: 何だったら職人街にある ジスカール工房で待ってて──
jpnSearchText:
何だったら職人街にある
ジスカール工房で待ってて──

engChrName: Right. I apologize for that—I happen to be in the middle of something at the moment.
engSearchText:
Right. I apologize for that—I happen to be in the
middle of something at the moment.
jpnChrName: カトル君？
jpnSearchText: カトル君？

engChrName: Could you wait for me at a place called Giscard Workshop? It's in the Artisanal District. I will be there shor—
engSearchText:
Could you wait for me at a place called
Giscard Workshop? It's in the Artisanal District.
I will be there shor—
jpnSearchText: ……これは──！

engChrName: ...Hello?
engSearchText: ...Hello?
jpnChrName: ＦＩ…、サー…を──
jpnSearchText: ＦＩ…、サー…を──

engChrName: ...That's not good!
engSearchText: ...That's not good!
jpnChrName: もしもし、カトル君……！？
jpnSearchText: もしもし、カトル君……！？

engChrName: FI...a sear...
engSearchText: FI...a sear...
jpnChrName: ……今のって……
jpnSearchText: ……今のって……

engChrName: Hello? Hello?!
engSearchText: Hello? Hello?!
jpnChrName: 崩落音に微かな咆吼…… 何かあったみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
崩落音に微かな咆吼……
何かあったみたいです。

engChrName: What just happened...?
engSearchText: What just happened...?
jpnChrName: ハッ、厄介事っぽいじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、厄介事っぽいじゃねぇか。

engChrName: It sounded like something collapsed, and I could've sworn I heard a faint roar after that...
engSearchText:
It sounded like something collapsed, and I could've
sworn I heard a faint roar after that...
jpnChrName: ジスカール工房…… 先ほど訪ねた場所ですか。
jpnSearchText:
ジスカール工房……
先ほど訪ねた場所ですか。

engChrName: Sounds like trouble to me.
engSearchText: Sounds like trouble to me.
jpnChrName: ああ── とにかく行ってみるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
とにかく行ってみるぞ！

engChrName: We were just at Giscard's workshop a short while ago.
engSearchText:
We were just at Giscard's workshop a short
while ago.
jpnChrName: 導力車でオージュ峡谷に出ますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>導力車でオージュ峡谷に出ますか？

engChrName: Let's get on back there and see what the deal is!
engSearchText: Let's get on back there and see what the deal is!
jpnChrName: ……色々、見えてきましたね。
jpnSearchText: ……色々、見えてきましたね。

engChrName: Drive to Auge Canyon?
engSearchText: Drive to Auge Canyon?
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン先生が “反応兵器”の研究を進めていた、か。
jpnSearchText:
……キャラハン先生が
“反応兵器”の研究を進めていた、か。

engChrName: Phew. That was a lot to take in.
engSearchText: Phew. That was a lot to take in.
jpnChrName: 実現可能性はゼロに近いけど、その過程で 生み出される派生技術もありそうだ……
jpnSearchText:
実現可能性はゼロに近いけど、その過程で
生み出される派生技術もありそうだ……

engChrName: I'm still trying to process it all, myself. I can hardly believe Professor Callaghan is attempting to develop nuclear weapons...
engSearchText:
I'm still trying to process it all, myself. I can hardly
believe Professor Callaghan is attempting to develop
nuclear weapons...
jpnChrName: ……それをアルマータが 狙っている可能性はありそうです。
jpnSearchText:
……それをアルマータが
狙っている可能性はありそうです。

engChrName: His chances of succeeding are slim to none, but we can't discount the possibility that he'll make another dangerous invention along the way.
engSearchText:
His chances of succeeding are slim to none, but we
can't discount the possibility that he'll make another
dangerous invention along the way.
jpnChrName: 手がかりがあるとすれば 峡谷のどこかにあるらしい“野外実験棟”か。
jpnSearchText:
手がかりがあるとすれば
峡谷のどこかにあるらしい“野外実験棟”か。

engChrName: And we can't let something like that fall into Almata's hands.
engSearchText:
And we can't let something like that fall into
Almata's hands.
jpnChrName: 随分古い施設みてぇだが、 あの先生が頻繁に出入りしてたようだ。
jpnSearchText:
随分古い施設みてぇだが、
あの先生が頻繁に出入りしてたようだ。

engChrName: We'll need some clues if we want to stop them, though. And that outdoor experiment complex in the canyon is the best lead we have.
engSearchText:
We'll need some clues if we want to stop
them, though. And that outdoor experiment complex
in the canyon is the best lead we have.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… そんじゃあ早速行ってみるかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
そんじゃあ早速行ってみるかよ？

engChrName: If he's been frequenting that place, there's a decent chance he'll have left something incriminating behind.
engSearchText:
If he's been frequenting that place, there's a decent
chance he'll have left something
incriminating behind.
jpnChrName: 警察やギルド── ＣＩＤに嗅ぎ付けられる前にな。
jpnSearchText:
警察やギルド──
ＣＩＤに嗅ぎ付けられる前にな。

engChrName: Well, what're we standing around here for, then? Let's get our asses over there and get the jump on him.
engSearchText:
Well, what're we standing around here for, then?
Let's get our asses over there and get the jump
on him.
jpnChrName: ええ、準備を整えしだい、 オージュ峡谷へと向かいましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、準備を整えしだい、
オージュ峡谷へと向かいましょう。

engChrName: We'll bag that son of a bitch in a jiff and leave the cops', guild's, and CID's jaws on the floor.
engSearchText:
We'll bag that son of a bitch in a jiff and leave the
cops', guild's, and CID's jaws on the floor.
jpnChrName: はい……！ （後で先輩にも連絡しないと……）
jpnSearchText:
はい……！
（後で先輩にも連絡しないと……）

engChrName: A solid course of action. We should make our way over there as soon as we are ready.
engSearchText:
A solid course of action. We should make our way
over there as soon as we are ready.
jpnChrName: おっと……
jpnSearchText: おっと……

engChrName: Sounds like a plan. (I should let my classmates know what's going on.)
engSearchText:
Sounds like a plan.
(I should let my classmates know what's going on.)
jpnChrName: あ、よかったヴァンちゃん。 取り込み中じゃなかったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、よかったヴァンちゃん。
取り込み中じゃなかったみたいね。

engChrName: Oh, shoot. One sec.
engSearchText: Oh, shoot. One sec.
jpnChrName: ベルモッティ、どうした？
jpnSearchText: ベルモッティ、どうした？

engChrName: Hello, hello! I hope I didn't catch you at a bad time.
engSearchText: Hello, hello! I hope I didn't catch you at a bad time.
jpnChrName: あ、さっきの……
jpnSearchText: あ、さっきの……

engChrName: Nah, you're good. What's up, Bermotti?
engSearchText: Nah, you're good. What's up, Bermotti?
jpnChrName: ああん、色物バーテンかよ？
jpnSearchText: ああん、色物バーテンかよ？

engChrName: It's the man from earlier.
engSearchText: It's the man from earlier.
jpnChrName: 誰が色物よ、誰がっ！ 熱いベーゼをお見舞いするわよっ！
jpnSearchText:
誰が色物よ、誰がっ！
熱いベーゼをお見舞いするわよっ！

engChrName: It's the weird bartender dude.
engSearchText: It's the weird bartender dude.
jpnChrName: ──じゃなくて、ちょっと 相談があるんだけどいいかしら？
jpnSearchText:
──じゃなくて、ちょっと
相談があるんだけどいいかしら？

engChrName: Oh, my. You better watch who you're calling 'weird,' darling, or you may find yourself in danger of being pecked on the cheek by moi!
engSearchText:
Oh, my. You better watch who you're calling 'weird,'
darling, or you may find yourself in danger of being
pecked on the cheek by moi!
jpnChrName: ちょっと相談が あるんだけどいいかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと相談が
あるんだけどいいかしら？

engChrName: Aaanywho, I'm afraid this isn't a social call. I have a little job for you. Interested?
engSearchText:
Aaanywho, I'm afraid this isn't a social call. I have a
little job for you. Interested?
jpnChrName: ああ、一区切り付いたから 構わねえが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、一区切り付いたから
構わねえが。

engChrName: I have a little job for you. Interested?
engSearchText: I have a little job for you. Interested?
jpnChrName: えっとね、実はウチのお得意さんで ヴァンちゃんに相談したいって人がいてね。
jpnSearchText:
えっとね、実はウチのお得意さんで
ヴァンちゃんに相談したいって人がいてね。

engChrName: Sure. Might take us a bit before we can tackle it, but you're free to run your request by us now if you want.
engSearchText:
Sure. Might take us a bit before we can tackle it, but
you're free to run your request by us now if you want.
jpnChrName: ４ｓｐｇの条件は満たしてそうだし、 話だけでも聞いてあげられないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
４ｓｐｇの条件は満たしてそうだし、
話だけでも聞いてあげられないかしら？

engChrName: Actually, this request comes from a regular of mine. He's in a spot of trouble, you see.
engSearchText:
Actually, this request comes from a regular of mine.
He's in a spot of trouble, you see.
jpnChrName: はん……？　まあお前には サルバッドで世話になったからな。
jpnSearchText:
はん……？　まあお前には
サルバッドで世話になったからな。

engChrName: He hoped he could discuss it with you personally. Would you be a dear and make time to meet with him?
engSearchText:
He hoped he could discuss it with you personally.
Would you be a dear and make time to meet
with him?
jpnChrName: 話を聞くくらいならいいぜ、 そっち（カフェバー）に行きゃあいいのか？
jpnSearchText:
話を聞くくらいならいいぜ、
そっち（カフェバー）に行きゃあいいのか？

engChrName: You want me to what now? C'mon, man. I'm on a tight schedule here.
engSearchText:
You want me to what now? C'mon, man. I'm on a
tight schedule here.
jpnChrName: ううん、ちょっとウチだと 逆にマークされちゃっててね……
jpnSearchText:
ううん、ちょっとウチだと
逆にマークされちゃっててね……

engChrName: But, ehh, what the hell. I do owe you one for your help in Tharbad, so I can at least hear him out. I'll swing by your place in a sec.
engSearchText:
But, ehh, what the hell. I do owe you one for your
help in Tharbad, so I can at least hear him out.
I'll swing by your place in a sec.
jpnChrName: 良かったらこの後、車である地点に 向かってもらえないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
良かったらこの後、車である地点に
向かってもらえないかしら？

engChrName: Ah. That, erm, may pose a problem. This is a matter that requires discretion, and my establishment is subject to the prying eyes of the public.
engSearchText:
Ah. That, erm, may pose a problem. This is a matter
that requires discretion, and my establishment is
subject to the prying eyes of the public.
jpnChrName: そこを流していたら あっちから声を掛けるそうよ。
jpnSearchText:
そこを流していたら
あっちから声を掛けるそうよ。

engChrName: They've already picked out a more secluded venue, as it so happens. Could I trouble you to drive there instead?
engSearchText:
They've already picked out a more secluded venue, as
it so happens. Could I trouble you to drive
there instead?
jpnChrName: ここは……
jpnSearchText: ここは……

engChrName: They'll give you a call once you're on the road. In the meantime, let me send you the meeting location.
engSearchText:
They'll give you a call once you're on the road. In the
meantime, let me send you the meeting location.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ宜しくね、 愛してるわ、チュッ❤
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ宜しくね、
愛してるわ、チュッ❤

engChrName: Oh, this is...
engSearchText: Oh, this is...
jpnChrName: うーん、やっぱり随分と 個性的な人みたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、やっぱり随分と
個性的な人みたいだね。

engChrName: Good luck, my love! Hugs and kisses! ❤
engSearchText: Good luck, my love! Hugs and kisses! ❤
jpnChrName: ふふっ、でも良い人ですよ？
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、でも良い人ですよ？

engChrName: That man is, umm, certainly a character, isn't he?
engSearchText: That man is, umm, certainly a character, isn't he?
jpnChrName: たまに日曜学校の帰りに寄ると 甘い物をサービスしてくれますし！
jpnSearchText:
たまに日曜学校の帰りに寄ると
甘い物をサービスしてくれますし！

engChrName: Yeah, but he's super nice! I like him a bunch!
engSearchText: Yeah, but he's super nice! I like him a bunch!
jpnChrName: なにぃ……？ 露骨に贔屓しやがって。
jpnSearchText:
なにぃ……？
露骨に贔屓しやがって。

engChrName: He gives me loads of free sweets when I stop by after Sunday School, so he's an awesome guy in my book.
engSearchText:
He gives me loads of free sweets when I stop by after
Sunday School, so he's an awesome guy in my book.
jpnChrName: 随分と優秀な方のようですね。
jpnSearchText: 随分と優秀な方のようですね。

engChrName: What?! No fair! He never gives ME free sweets!
engSearchText: What?! No fair! He never gives ME free sweets!
jpnChrName: 情報にしてもカクテルにしても 精緻なエレガントさを感じます。
jpnSearchText:
情報にしてもカクテルにしても
精緻なエレガントさを感じます。

engChrName: He is, indeed. And he's highly capable as well.
engSearchText: He is, indeed. And he's highly capable as well.
jpnChrName: まあ、そこは否定しねぇが。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そこは否定しねぇが。

engChrName: He's just as adept with handling information as he is with cocktails.
engSearchText:
He's just as adept with handling information as he is
with cocktails.
jpnChrName: ……えっと、今のは？
jpnSearchText: ……えっと、今のは？

engChrName: Heh. Won't argue with you there.
engSearchText: Heh. Won't argue with you there.
jpnChrName: カフェバーと情報屋をやっている ベルモッティさんです。
jpnSearchText:
カフェバーと情報屋をやっている
ベルモッティさんです。

engChrName: Could someone fill me in on who that was?
engSearchText: Could someone fill me in on who that was?
jpnChrName: レミフェリア出身だとかで ヤクガク？にも詳しいんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
レミフェリア出身だとかで
ヤクガク？にも詳しいんですよ。

engChrName: His name's Bermotti. He's an information dealer from Remiferia, and he runs a café and bar down by the river.
engSearchText:
His name's Bermotti. He's an information dealer
from Remiferia, and he runs a café and bar down by
the river.
jpnChrName: カフェバーと情報屋を営まれている ベルモッティ氏です。
jpnSearchText:
カフェバーと情報屋を営まれている
ベルモッティ氏です。

engChrName: He's also super knowledgeable about medicine and stuff.
engSearchText:
He's also super knowledgeable about medicine
and stuff.
jpnChrName: レミフェリア公国出身で 薬学にもお詳しいようですね。
jpnSearchText:
レミフェリア公国出身で
薬学にもお詳しいようですね。

engChrName: His name is Bermotti. He is an information dealer from Remiferia, and he owns a café and bar near the river.
engSearchText:
His name is Bermotti. He is an information dealer
from Remiferia, and he owns a café and bar near
the river.
jpnChrName: カフェバーと情報屋をやられている ベルモッティさんですね。
jpnSearchText:
カフェバーと情報屋をやられている
ベルモッティさんですね。

engChrName: He also has a vast array of pharmaceutical knowledge.
engSearchText: He also has a vast array of pharmaceutical knowledge.
jpnChrName: レミフェリア公国の出身だとかで 薬学にも詳しいそうです。
jpnSearchText:
レミフェリア公国の出身だとかで
薬学にも詳しいそうです。

engChrName: His name is Bermotti. He's an information dealer from Remiferia, and he owns a café and bar near the river.
engSearchText:
His name is Bermotti. He's an information dealer
from Remiferia, and he owns a café and bar near
the river.
jpnChrName: うーん…… なんか個性的な人みたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん……
なんか個性的な人みたいだね。

engChrName: He also knows a great deal about medicine.
engSearchText: He also knows a great deal about medicine.
jpnChrName: それでヴァンさん。 “ある地点”というのは？
jpnSearchText:
それでヴァンさん。
“ある地点”というのは？

engChrName: Ah. He sounds like an interesting person. I ought to get better acquainted with him.
engSearchText:
Ah. He sounds like an interesting person. I ought to
get better acquainted with him.
jpnChrName: ああ──首都の 環状三号線を流せだとよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──首都の
環状三号線を流せだとよ。

engChrName: So, where are we headed now?
engSearchText: So, where are we headed now?
jpnChrName: どこの誰か分からねえが…… 小癪な指定をするじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
どこの誰か分からねえが……
小癪な指定をするじゃねえか。

engChrName: We're gonna drive along the capital's third belt expressway.
engSearchText:
We're gonna drive along the capital's third
belt expressway.
jpnChrName: ハン、どんな依頼人なのか ちょいと気になるな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、どんな依頼人なのか
ちょいと気になるな。

engChrName: They chose an interesting spot to meet up. I'm pretty damn curious to see who our mystery client is.
engSearchText:
They chose an interesting spot to meet up. I'm pretty
damn curious to see who our mystery client is.
jpnChrName: はい、どんな依頼人なのか ちょっと気になりますねっ。
jpnSearchText:
はい、どんな依頼人なのか
ちょっと気になりますねっ。

engChrName: Same.
engSearchText: Same.
jpnChrName: ふぅん、あまり表立って 動けない立場の人なのかな？
jpnSearchText:
ふぅん、あまり表立って
動けない立場の人なのかな？

engChrName: Me, too.
engSearchText: Me, too.
jpnChrName: まあいいや──そろそろ 試用研修も一区切りだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
まあいいや──そろそろ
試用研修も一区切りだろうし。

engChrName: They've certainly gone to great lengths to conceal where they are and what they're doing.
engSearchText:
They've certainly gone to great lengths to conceal
where they are and what they're doing.
jpnChrName: やる事を済ませたら 事務所に戻って出発しようか。
jpnSearchText:
やる事を済ませたら
事務所に戻って出発しようか。

engChrName: Well, anyway, I believe my training is nearly at an end.
engSearchText:
Well, anyway, I believe my training is nearly at
an end.
jpnChrName: おお──ってちゃっかり 仕切ってんじゃねえっつの！
jpnSearchText:
おお──ってちゃっかり
仕切ってんじゃねえっつの！

engChrName: As soon as we're ready, let's make our way back to the office and pick up the car.
engSearchText:
As soon as we're ready, let's make our way back to the
office and pick up the car.
jpnChrName: ったくそこのクソガキといい、 最近の若いのは……（ブツブツ）
jpnSearchText:
ったくそこのクソガキといい、
最近の若いのは……（ブツブツ）

engChrName: Sounds good to me—
engSearchText: Sounds good to me—
jpnChrName: クク、その台詞が出ちまったら ジジイ化待ったナシだなぁ～？
jpnSearchText:
クク、その台詞が出ちまったら
ジジイ化待ったナシだなぁ～？

engChrName: Wait, who made you the boss?! ...Ugh. Kids these days.
engSearchText:
Wait, who made you the boss?! ...Ugh. Kids
these days.
jpnChrName: ったく赤毛のクソガキといい、 最近の若いのは……（ブツブツ）
jpnSearchText:
ったく赤毛のクソガキといい、
最近の若いのは……（ブツブツ）

engChrName: Spoken like a true old fart.
engSearchText: Spoken like a true old fart.
jpnChrName: ふふ、情報収集に物資の補給も 済ませておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、情報収集に物資の補給も
済ませておきましょうか。

engChrName: Wait, who made you the boss?! ...Ugh. Kids these days.
engSearchText:
Wait, who made you the boss?! ...Ugh. Kids
these days.
jpnChrName: あはは……事務所に戻ったら 他の２人にも声を掛けましょう。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……事務所に戻ったら
他の２人にも声を掛けましょう。

engChrName: Perhaps we should stop and resupply on our way to the office. Then we can head off.
engSearchText:
Perhaps we should stop and resupply on our way to
the office. Then we can head off.
jpnChrName: 首都の移動メニューに 『首都高環状三号線』が追加されました。
jpnSearchText:
首都の移動メニューに
『首都高環状三号線』が追加されました。

engChrName: Well, we should probably get the other two up to speed once we get back.
engSearchText:
Well, we should probably get the other two up to
speed once we get back.
jpnChrName: 選択すると事務所に戻って導力車で出発し、 メインストーリーが進むので注意してください。
jpnSearchText:
選択すると事務所に戻って導力車で出発し、
メインストーリーが進むので注意してください。

engChrName: Expressway Route 3 was added to the Travel menu.
engSearchText: Expressway Route 3 was added to the Travel menu.
jpnChrName: （首都高を流して待ってろか……   面白そうだが時間は取られそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（首都高を流して待ってろか……
面白そうだが時間は取られそうだな。）

engChrName: Choosing this will cause the main story to advance.
engSearchText: Choosing this will cause the main story to advance.
jpnChrName: （カトルの試用研修も含めて   今日の業務は一区切りで構わねぇか？）
jpnSearchText:
（カトルの試用研修も含めて
今日の業務は一区切りで構わねぇか？）

engChrName: (Sounds like a fun drive, but once we head out, we're not gonna be back for a good long while.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds like a fun drive, but once we head out, we're
not gonna be back for a good long while.)
jpnChrName: ……なんだ？ （助手どもからみたいだが。）
jpnSearchText:
……なんだ？
（助手どもからみたいだが。）

engChrName: (There anything else I gotta do before we call it?)
engSearchText: (There anything else I gotta do before we call it?)
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、今大丈夫ですか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンさん、今大丈夫ですか？

engChrName: Huh? (Looks like it's from one of my assistants.)
engSearchText:
Huh?
(Looks like it's from one of my assistants.)
jpnChrName: ああ、アニエスか。 何かトラブルでもあったか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アニエスか。
何かトラブルでもあったか？

engChrName: Hi, Van. Do you have a moment?
engSearchText: Hi, Van. Do you have a moment?
jpnChrName: その、トラブルと言うと ちょっと違うかもしれませんが……
jpnSearchText:
その、トラブルと言うと
ちょっと違うかもしれませんが……

engChrName: Yeah, of course. Everything all right?
engSearchText: Yeah, of course. Everything all right?
jpnChrName: ──駅前の掲示板に 『４ｓｐｇ』があったんです。
jpnSearchText:
──駅前の掲示板に
『４ｓｐｇ』があったんです。

engChrName: Yes, I'm fine. Something's come up, though.
engSearchText: Yes, I'm fine. Something's come up, though.
jpnChrName: ！　そいつは…… 結構前のモンだったりするか？
jpnSearchText:
！　そいつは……
結構前のモンだったりするか？

engChrName: I found a 4SPG on the bulletin board in front of the station.
engSearchText:
I found a 4SPG on the bulletin board in front of
the station.
jpnChrName: それが、ついさっき貼られた ばかりみたいでして。
jpnSearchText:
それが、ついさっき貼られた
ばかりみたいでして。

engChrName: Wait, what?! How long you think it's been up there?
engSearchText: Wait, what?! How long you think it's been up there?
jpnChrName: ……どうしましょう？ 放っておくというのも……
jpnSearchText:
……どうしましょう？
放っておくというのも……

engChrName: Not long. It had to have been put up very recently.
engSearchText: Not long. It had to have been put up very recently.
jpnChrName: いや、すぐに行く。 （他の連中にも声を掛けるか。）
jpnSearchText:
いや、すぐに行く。
（他の連中にも声を掛けるか。）

engChrName: What should we do? We aren't here to work, so we could ignore it.
engSearchText:
What should we do? We aren't here to work, so we
could ignore it.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_45_0198}あ、ヴァンさん。 今ちょっといいかな？
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_45_0198}あ、ヴァンさん。
今ちょっといいかな？

engChrName: Nah, I say we look into it. I'll be right there. (I'll have to let the others know, too.)
engSearchText:
Nah, I say we look into it. I'll be right there.
(I'll have to let the others know, too.)
jpnChrName: カトルか。 なんだ、迷子にでもなったか？
jpnSearchText:
カトルか。
なんだ、迷子にでもなったか？

engChrName: Hey, Van. Do you have a moment?
engSearchText: Hey, Van. Do you have a moment?
jpnChrName: そんなワケないでしょ。 えっと、妙なモノを見つけてさ。
jpnSearchText:
そんなワケないでしょ。
えっと、妙なモノを見つけてさ。

engChrName: Yeah, of course. Everything all right? You didn't get lost or something, did you?
engSearchText:
Yeah, of course. Everything all right? You didn't get
lost or something, did you?
jpnChrName: ──駅前の掲示板に 『４ｓｐｇ』があったんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
──駅前の掲示板に
『４ｓｐｇ』があったんだけど。

engChrName: No, of course not. I just found something that might interest you.
engSearchText:
No, of course not. I just found something that might
interest you.
jpnChrName: ！　本当か？ 結構前のモンだったりするか？
jpnSearchText:
！　本当か？
結構前のモンだったりするか？

engChrName: There's a 4SPG on the bulletin board that's in front of the station.
engSearchText:
There's a 4SPG on the bulletin board that's in front
of the station.
jpnChrName: それが、ついさっき貼られた ばかりみたいな感じで……
jpnSearchText:
それが、ついさっき貼られた
ばかりみたいな感じで……

engChrName: What? For real?! How long you think it's been up there?
engSearchText:
What? For real?! How long you think it's been
up there?
jpnChrName: どうする、放っておくべき？
jpnSearchText: <C1>どうする、放っておくべき？

engChrName: Not for long. In fact, I suspect it was put up very recently.
engSearchText:
Not for long. In fact, I suspect it was put up
very recently.
jpnChrName: いや、すぐに行く。 （他の連中にも声を掛けるか。）
jpnSearchText:
いや、すぐに行く。
（他の連中にも声を掛けるか。）

engChrName: What should we do? Should we just ignore it?
engSearchText: What should we do? Should we just ignore it?
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_45_0199}ヴァン様、今宜しいでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_45_0199}ヴァン様、今宜しいでしょうか？

engChrName: Nah, I say we look into it. I'll be right there. (I'll have to let the others know, too.)
engSearchText:
Nah, I say we look into it. I'll be right there.
(I'll have to let the others know, too.)
jpnChrName: ああ、お前さんか。 何かトラブルでもあったか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、お前さんか。
何かトラブルでもあったか？

engChrName: Hello, Mr. Arkride. Do you have a moment?
engSearchText: Hello, Mr. Arkride. Do you have a moment?
jpnChrName: いえ……ああ、確かにトラブルと 言えなくないかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
いえ……ああ、確かにトラブルと
言えなくないかもしれません。

engChrName: Yeah, of course. Everything all right?
engSearchText: Yeah, of course. Everything all right?
jpnChrName: ──駅前の掲示板に 『４ｓｐｇ』を確認いたしました。
jpnSearchText:
──駅前の掲示板に
『４ｓｐｇ』を確認いたしました。

engChrName: Yes, I'm fine. Though I did find something rather peculiar, and I thought it best to report.
engSearchText:
Yes, I'm fine. Though I did find something rather
peculiar, and I thought it best to report.
jpnChrName: ！　そいつは…… 結構前のモンだったりするか？
jpnSearchText:
！　そいつは……
結構前のモンだったりするか？

engChrName: There is a 4SPG on the bulletin board in front of the station.
engSearchText:
There is a 4SPG on the bulletin board in front of
the station.
jpnChrName: それが、つい先ほど 貼られたばかりのようでして。
jpnSearchText:
それが、つい先ほど
貼られたばかりのようでして。

engChrName: Wait, what?! How long you think it's been up there?
engSearchText: Wait, what?! How long you think it's been up there?
jpnChrName: 旅行の趣旨とは反しますし 捨て置きましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
旅行の趣旨とは反しますし
捨て置きましょうか？

engChrName: I suspect it was put up sometime today.
engSearchText: I suspect it was put up sometime today.
jpnChrName: いや、すぐに行く。 （他の連中にも声を掛けるか。）
jpnSearchText:
いや、すぐに行く。
（他の連中にも声を掛けるか。）

engChrName: Shall we ignore it? We aren't here to work.
engSearchText: Shall we ignore it? We aren't here to work.
jpnChrName: ……めぼしいネタはこんなもんか。
jpnSearchText: ……めぼしいネタはこんなもんか。

engChrName: Nah, I say we look into it. I'll be right there. (I'll have to let the others know, too.)
engSearchText:
Nah, I say we look into it. I'll be right there.
(I'll have to let the others know, too.)
jpnChrName: 色々と分かってきましたけど……
jpnSearchText: 色々と分かってきましたけど……

engChrName: I think that's about all the information we're gonna get for now.
engSearchText:
I think that's about all the information we're gonna
get for now.
jpnChrName: 深刻な状況ばかりで 溜息ばかり出てくるわね……
jpnSearchText:
深刻な状況ばかりで
溜息ばかり出てくるわね……

engChrName: Well, at least we managed to learn a lot in a short time.
engSearchText:
Well, at least we managed to learn a lot in a
short time.
jpnChrName: っと……ルネ方面からか。
jpnSearchText: っと……ルネ方面からか。

engChrName: Yeah, but it's all pretty darn grim...
engSearchText: Yeah, but it's all pretty darn grim...
jpnChrName: ？　どうやらいつもと同じ、 手配魔獣みたいだが……
jpnSearchText:
？　どうやらいつもと同じ、
手配魔獣みたいだが……

engChrName: Oh, I got a message from René. Maybe he's got some useful int—
engSearchText:
Oh, I got a message from René. Maybe he's got some
useful int—
jpnChrName: 場所は……あ。
jpnSearchText: 場所は……あ。

engChrName: ...Never mind. It's just a monster extermination request.
engSearchText:
...Never mind. It's just a monster
extermination request.
jpnChrName: 《オーベル地区》の地下にある 地下鉄廃路線、ですか……
jpnSearchText:
《オーベル地区》の地下にある
地下鉄廃路線、ですか……

engChrName: Wait, really? Where?
engSearchText: Wait, really? Where?
jpnChrName: オーベル地区── 大聖堂と有名な高校がある所ね。
jpnSearchText:
オーベル地区──
大聖堂と有名な高校がある所ね。

engChrName: Ah, so it's in an abandoned subway line underneath the Auber District...
engSearchText:
Ah, so it's in an abandoned subway line underneath
the Auber District...
jpnChrName: って確か在学生なんだっけ？
jpnSearchText: って確か在学生なんだっけ？

engChrName: Isn't that the place where the cathedral and that famous academy are?
engSearchText:
Isn't that the place where the cathedral and that
famous academy are?
jpnChrName: ええ、そうなんです。 でもどうしてこんな時に……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そうなんです。
でもどうしてこんな時に……

engChrName: ...Wait, don't you go to that school?
engSearchText: ...Wait, don't you go to that school?
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤのエリートだっけ？ 確かに空気読みなさいって感じね。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤのエリートだっけ？
確かに空気読みなさいって感じね。

engChrName: I do, yes. Anyway, this hardly seems to be an appropriate time to be sending out such ordinary requests.
engSearchText:
I do, yes. Anyway, this hardly seems to be an
appropriate time to be sending out such
ordinary requests.
jpnChrName: ……フン、まあいいだろう。
jpnSearchText: ……フン、まあいいだろう。

engChrName: You're telling me.
engSearchText: You're telling me.
jpnChrName: ある程度情報も集まった──他の用事を 済ませたらオーベル地区に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ある程度情報も集まった──他の用事を
済ませたらオーベル地区に向かうぞ。

engChrName: Well, whatever. Work's work.
engSearchText: Well, whatever. Work's work.
jpnChrName: メインストーリーを進める場合、地下鉄入口か 移動メニューからオーベル地区を選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
メインストーリーを進める場合、地下鉄入口か
移動メニューからオーベル地区を選んでください。

engChrName: As soon as we're done here, let's head on over to the Auber District.
engSearchText:
As soon as we're done here, let's head on over to the
Auber District.
jpnChrName: ……めぼしいネタはこんなもんか。
jpnSearchText: ……めぼしいネタはこんなもんか。

engChrName: To advance the main story, select 'Auber District' or make your way to the subway entrance.

jpnSearchText:
ええ、そうなんです。
でもどうしてこんな時に……

engChrName: ...Wait, don't you go to that school?
engSearchText: ...Wait, don't you go to that school?
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤのエリートだっけ？ 確かに空気読みなさいって感じね。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤのエリートだっけ？
確かに空気読みなさいって感じね。

engChrName: I do, yes. Anyway, this hardly seems to be an appropriate time to be sending out such ordinary requests.
engSearchText:
I do, yes. Anyway, this hardly seems to be an
appropriate time to be sending out such
ordinary requests.
jpnChrName: ……フン、まあいいだろう。
jpnSearchText: ……フン、まあいいだろう。

engChrName: You're telling me.
engSearchText: You're telling me.
jpnChrName: ある程度情報も集まった──他の用事を 済ませたらオーベル地区に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ある程度情報も集まった──他の用事を
済ませたらオーベル地区に向かうぞ。

engChrName: Well, whatever. Work's work.
engSearchText: Well, whatever. Work's work.
jpnChrName: メインストーリーを進める場合、地下鉄入口か 移動メニューからオーベル地区を選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
メインストーリーを進める場合、地下鉄入口か
移動メニューからオーベル地区を選んでください。

engChrName: As soon as we're done here, let's head on over to the Auber District.
engSearchText:
As soon as we're done here, let's head on over to the
Auber District.
jpnChrName: （ある程度情報も集まった……   そろそろ手配魔獣の対処に向かうか？）
jpnSearchText:
（ある程度情報も集まった……
そろそろ手配魔獣の対処に向かうか？）

engChrName: To advance the main story, select 'Auber District' or make your way to the subway entrance.
engSearchText:
To advance the main story, select 'Auber District' or
make your way to the subway entrance.
jpnChrName: オーベル地区に向かうと メインのストーリーが進行します。
jpnSearchText:
オーベル地区に向かうと
メインのストーリーが進行します。

engChrName: (We've gathered all the information there is to gather. Should we go take on those monsters now?)
engSearchText:
(We've gathered all the information there is to gather.
Should we go take on those monsters now?)
jpnChrName: 一部のクエスト・サブイベントが 消滅するので注意して下さい。
jpnSearchText:
一部のクエスト・サブイベントが
消滅するので注意して下さい。

engChrName: Visiting the Auber District will cause the main story to advance.
engSearchText:
Visiting the Auber District will cause the main story
to advance.
jpnChrName: おやおや、これは奇遇ですねぇ。
jpnSearchText: おやおや、これは奇遇ですねぇ。

engChrName: As a result, all unfinished quests and unseen sub-events will disappear.
engSearchText:
As a result, all unfinished quests and unseen
sub-events will disappear.
jpnChrName: ツァオ── それに《銀（イン）》だったか。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオ──
それに《銀（イン）》だったか。

engChrName: Oh, my. What a fortuitous coincidence.
engSearchText: Oh, my. What a fortuitous coincidence.
jpnChrName: チッ、厄介なのに遭遇したな。
jpnSearchText: チッ、厄介なのに遭遇したな。

engChrName: Of all the people we could've run into, it just HAD to be them.
engSearchText:
Of all the people we could've run into, it just HAD to
be them.
jpnChrName: そんじゃま、早速やるか。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃま、早速やるか。

engChrName: Ugh. We're really down on our luck today, huh?
engSearchText: Ugh. We're really down on our luck today, huh?
jpnChrName: いきなりですね……
jpnSearchText: いきなりですね……

engChrName: Well, nothing we can do about it now. We'll just have to beat you till you're black and blue.
engSearchText:
Well, nothing we can do about it now. We'll just have
to beat you till you're black and blue.
jpnChrName: フフ……皆さんとわたくし共でしたら 交渉の“余地”があると思いますが。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……皆さんとわたくし共でしたら
交渉の“余地”があると思いますが。

engChrName: Do we HAVE to jump straight to violence? We could try to talk it out for once.
engSearchText:
Do we HAVE to jump straight to violence?
We could try to talk it out for once.
jpnChrName: 先日も取り決めをしたばかりですし。
jpnSearchText: 先日も取り決めをしたばかりですし。

engChrName: The young lady is quite right. Why must we resort to such brutality from the outset?
engSearchText:
The young lady is quite right. Why must we resort to
such brutality from the outset?
jpnChrName: ありゃアルマータの暴走に備える 情報交換も含めた協定ってだけだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ありゃアルマータの暴走に備える
情報交換も含めた協定ってだけだろう。

engChrName: Did we not come to an amicable agreement just the other day?
engSearchText:
Did we not come to an amicable agreement just the
other day?
jpnChrName: それに、こういった“ゲーム”で アンタは一番油断ならない相手だからな。
jpnSearchText:
それに、こういった“ゲーム”で
アンタは一番油断ならない相手だからな。

engChrName: That was just to exchange information that'd help us keep Almata in check.
engSearchText:
That was just to exchange information that'd help us
keep Almata in check.
jpnChrName: ま、その通りだろうな。
jpnSearchText: ま、その通りだろうな。

engChrName: But in situations like these, negotiations are off the table. You're a shady bastard who'll screw us over in a heartbeat.
engSearchText:
But in situations like these, negotiations are off
the table. You're a shady bastard who'll screw us over
in a heartbeat.
jpnChrName: ふふ、心外ですねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、心外ですねぇ。

engChrName: He's got you there, pal.
engSearchText: He's got you there, pal.
jpnChrName: そもそもヴァンさんたちは 豊富な戦力をお持ちではありませんか。
jpnSearchText:
そもそもヴァンさんたちは
豊富な戦力をお持ちではありませんか。

engChrName: You wound me.
engSearchText: You wound me.
jpnChrName: もっと余裕を持ってください。 頼もしい“お友達”も連れてるみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
もっと余裕を持ってください。
頼もしい“お友達”も連れてるみたいですし。

engChrName: I would never do such a thing, especially when you are the one with the upper hand in numbers.
engSearchText:
I would never do such a thing, especially when you
are the one with the upper hand in numbers.
jpnChrName: ちなみに俺の意見も完全に アークライドと同じだからな？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに俺の意見も完全に
アークライドと同じだからな？

engChrName: You even recruited some powerful lackeys. I believe you have a good deal of leverage in this arrangement.
engSearchText:
You even recruited some powerful lackeys. I believe
you have a good deal of leverage in this arrangement.
jpnChrName: ん、《銀（リーシャ）》はともかく。
jpnSearchText: ん、《銀（リーシャ）》はともかく。

engChrName: Yeah, well, these 'lackeys' don't want to negotiate with you, either.
engSearchText:
Yeah, well, these 'lackeys' don't want to negotiate
with you, either.
jpnChrName: ……ファン大人だけでなく、 ギエン老とも近い貴方なら尚更ね。
jpnSearchText:
……ファン大人だけでなく、
ギエン老とも近い貴方なら尚更ね。

engChrName: Same. I don't distrust Rixia, but you're a whole other can of worms.
engSearchText:
Same. I don't distrust Rixia, but you're a whole other
can of worms.
jpnChrName: これは手厳しいですねえ。 かつて協力した仲だというのに。
jpnSearchText:
これは手厳しいですねえ。
かつて協力した仲だというのに。

engChrName: I can't trust anyone that's close to Gien.
engSearchText: I can't trust anyone that's close to Gien.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、妥当な評価かと。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、妥当な評価かと。

engChrName: Oh, my. What did I do to deserve these unflattering accusations?
engSearchText:
Oh, my. What did I do to deserve these
unflattering accusations?
jpnChrName: 《黒月》……同じ東方でも 私たちとルーツが違うんだっけ？
jpnSearchText:
《黒月》……同じ東方でも
私たちとルーツが違うんだっけ？

engChrName: Do you even have to ask?
engSearchText: Do you even have to ask?
jpnChrName: ええ──“九曜”最大の 一派の末裔（すえ）たちですな。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──“九曜”最大の
一派の末裔（すえ）たちですな。

engChrName: You're from the East like us, right?
engSearchText: You're from the East like us, right?
jpnChrName: ふふ、噂通りの いけずなヒトみたいやねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、噂通りの
いけずなヒトみたいやねぇ。

engChrName: They are, but Heiyue's roots differ from ours. They're the descendants of the largest of the nine peoples of the Navagraha.
engSearchText:
They are, but Heiyue's roots differ from ours.
They're the descendants of the largest of the nine
peoples of the Navagraha.
jpnChrName: クク……《月華》の 秘伝にも届いてるそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
クク……《月華》の
秘伝にも届いてるそうだが。

engChrName: ...Oh, are you calling us lackeys? How bold.
engSearchText: ...Oh, are you calling us lackeys? How bold.
jpnChrName: さて、戦力的にそちらが 圧倒的に有利のようですが──
jpnSearchText:
さて、戦力的にそちらが
圧倒的に有利のようですが──

engChrName: I don't appreciate the condescension, but I still respect ya for mastering the Gekka style.
engSearchText:
I don't appreciate the condescension, but I still
respect ya for mastering the Gekka style.
jpnChrName: このまま私共を下しますか？
jpnSearchText: このまま私共を下しますか？

engChrName: We are clearly at a disadvantage here, so why do you insist that we must fight?
engSearchText:
We are clearly at a disadvantage here, so why do you
insist that we must fight?
jpnChrName: ……だからその言葉を 真に受けたりしねえっつーの。
jpnSearchText:
……だからその言葉を
真に受けたりしねえっつーの。

engChrName: You have the two of us in the palm of your hand.
engSearchText: You have the two of us in the palm of your hand.
jpnChrName: アンタにしても《銀》にしても 達人クラス以上……
jpnSearchText:
アンタにしても《銀》にしても
達人クラス以上……

engChrName: Yeah, I'm not buying that for a second.
engSearchText: Yeah, I'm not buying that for a second.
jpnChrName: それ以外の手札もありそうだしな？
jpnSearchText: それ以外の手札もありそうだしな？

engChrName: For one, both you and Yin are easily capable of kickin' all our butts alone.
engSearchText:
For one, both you and Yin are easily capable of
kickin' all our butts alone.

engChrName: And honestly, I'm not even sure if you ARE alone here. I think you've got some men in this very room.
engSearchText:
And honestly, I'm not even sure if you ARE
alone here. I think you've got some men in this
very room.
jpnChrName: ま、まさか……
jpnSearchText: ま、まさか……

jpnChrName: チッ…… ……気配は全くねえが……
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
……気配は全くねえが……

engChrName: What? Where?
engSearchText: What? Where?
jpnChrName: 噂の凶手部隊…… 確かにこの上なく“厄介”ですね。
jpnSearchText:
噂の凶手部隊……
確かにこの上なく“厄介”ですね。

engChrName: It's definitely possible that he's got some xiongshou that're out of sight.
engSearchText:
It's definitely possible that he's got some xiongshou
that're out of sight.
jpnChrName: うむ──手勢を２人に集中したら 逆にこちらが危ういかもしれぬ。
jpnSearchText:
うむ──手勢を２人に集中したら
逆にこちらが危ういかもしれぬ。

engChrName: That would significantly shift the balance of power in this exchange.
engSearchText:
That would significantly shift the balance of power in
this exchange.
jpnChrName: （ＦＩＯのサーチにも掛からない……   ……そんな連中がいるなら……）
jpnSearchText:
（ＦＩＯのサーチにも掛からない……
……そんな連中がいるなら……）

engChrName: Right. They could ambush us at any time while our attention is on the two of them.
engSearchText:
Right. They could ambush us at any time while our
attention is on the two of them.

engChrName: (FIO's scan isn't picking up anything, but that doesn't necessarily mean they aren't here...)
engSearchText:
(FIO's scan isn't picking up anything, but that doesn't
necessarily mean they aren't here...)
jpnChrName: フフ、どうしました？ あらぬ想像を働かせているようですが。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、どうしました？
あらぬ想像を働かせているようですが。

jpnChrName: 来ないのであればこちらから──
jpnSearchText: 来ないのであればこちらから──

engChrName: My, my. You seem to have gotten some rather strange ideas into your heads.
engSearchText:
My, my. You seem to have gotten some rather strange
ideas into your heads.
jpnChrName: ──その前に。
jpnSearchText: ──その前に。

engChrName: Still, if you do not plan to make the first move, then allow us to do the honors—
engSearchText:
Still, if you do not plan to make the first move, then
allow us to do the honors—
jpnChrName: おや……？ ジュディス・ランスターさん。
jpnSearchText:
おや……？
ジュディス・ランスターさん。

engChrName: Just a second.
engSearchText: Just a second.
jpnChrName: 《ゴールデンブラッド》は拝見しました。 いやぁ、私的には今年一番でしたよ。
jpnSearchText:
《ゴールデンブラッド》は拝見しました。
いやぁ、私的には今年一番でしたよ。

engChrName: Ah. It's a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance, Judith Lanster.
engSearchText:
Ah. It's a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance,
Judith Lanster.
jpnChrName: それはどうもありがとう。 ──ま、それはそれとして。
jpnSearchText:
それはどうもありがとう。
──ま、それはそれとして。

engChrName: I'm something of a fan, myself. Golden Blood is undisputedly my movie of the year.
engSearchText:
I'm something of a fan, myself. Golden Blood is
undisputedly my movie of the year.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりね── まさかこんなことになるなんて。
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりね──
まさかこんなことになるなんて。

engChrName: Uh, thanks. Anyway...
engSearchText: Uh, thanks. Anyway...
jpnChrName: ……ええ、久々の再会、 できれば別の機会にしたかったけど。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、久々の再会、
できれば別の機会にしたかったけど。

engChrName: It's good to see you again. Been a while, hasn't it?
engSearchText: It's good to see you again. Been a while, hasn't it?

engChrName: That it has. You've been doing quite well for yourself while I've been away.
engSearchText:
That it has. You've been doing quite well for yourself
while I've been away.
jpnChrName: し、知り合いだったのかよ！？
jpnSearchText: し、知り合いだったのかよ！？

engChrName: Wait, hold the phone. You two know each other?
engSearchText: Wait, hold the phone. You two know each other?
jpnChrName: ええ── といっても“表の世界”じゃないわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──
といっても“表の世界”じゃないわ。

engChrName: For real? You, like, friends or something?
engSearchText: For real? You, like, friends or something?
jpnChrName: あたしと彼女は“裏”方面での デビュー時からのライバルでね。
jpnSearchText:
あたしと彼女は“裏”方面での
デビュー時からのライバルでね。

engChrName: Yeah. Although, we're not just friends. We're rivals.
engSearchText: Yeah. Although, we're not just friends. We're rivals.
jpnChrName: ８年前、同じく“先代”から継ぐため、 見習いとして活動してた頃に出会って……
jpnSearchText:
８年前、同じく“先代”から継ぐため、
見習いとして活動してた頃に出会って……

engChrName: And we've been that way since the day we met.
engSearchText: And we've been that way since the day we met.
jpnChrName: “立場”の違いはあったけど時に対立し、 時に協力し高め合ってきた──
jpnSearchText:
“立場”の違いはあったけど時に対立し、
時に協力し高め合ってきた──

engChrName: That was...eight years ago now? We had only just taken up the mantle from our predecessors at that point.
engSearchText:
That was...eight years ago now? We had only just
taken up the mantle from our predecessors at
that point.
jpnChrName: 同い年のライバルで…… 間違いなく“戦友”だったと思ってる。
jpnSearchText:
同い年のライバルで……
間違いなく“戦友”だったと思ってる。

engChrName: Sometimes our jobs put us in conflict with one another, but we got to team up every now and then.
engSearchText:
Sometimes our jobs put us in conflict with one
another, but we got to team up every now and then.

engChrName: We may have been rivals, but we were comrades, too.
engSearchText: We may have been rivals, but we were comrades, too.
jpnChrName: そ、そんな事情が……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな事情が……

jpnChrName: ……懐かしいな、お互いの背負っていた ものについても相談し合ったりしたよね。
jpnSearchText:
……懐かしいな、お互いの背負っていた
ものについても相談し合ったりしたよね。

engChrName: I never would've guessed.
engSearchText: I never would've guessed.
jpnChrName: でも貴女は、もう一つの世界で どんどん輝くようになって行って──
jpnSearchText:
でも貴女は、もう一つの世界で
どんどん輝くようになって行って──

engChrName: The memories are coming back to me. We spent many hours discussing the weight of what we had inherited.
engSearchText:
The memories are coming back to me. We spent
many hours discussing the weight of what we
had inherited.
jpnChrName: 嬉しく感じると同時に、どこか私だけ 取り残されたような気分にもなったわ。
jpnSearchText:
嬉しく感じると同時に、どこか私だけ
取り残されたような気分にもなったわ。

engChrName: Before I knew it, though, you had found your place amongst the stars. You were thriving in a world unbeknownst to me.
engSearchText:
Before I knew it, though, you had found your place
amongst the stars. You were thriving in a world
unbeknownst to me.
jpnChrName: だから──だからクロスベルで あんな道を選んだっていうの……！？
jpnSearchText:
だから──だからクロスベルで
あんな道を選んだっていうの……！？

engChrName: Oh, but don't misunderstand. I was truly happy for you, but I was a little sad as well. I felt left behind.
engSearchText:
Oh, but don't misunderstand. I was truly happy for
you, but I was a little sad as well. I felt left behind.
jpnChrName: ううん、違うわ。
jpnSearchText: ううん、違うわ。

engChrName: So you left for Crossbell and followed that other path...because of me?!
engSearchText:
So you left for Crossbell and followed that other
path...because of me?!
jpnChrName: “あの場所”はそれとは関係ない── でも、どこか貴女に影響されてたのも確か。
jpnSearchText:
“あの場所”はそれとは関係ない──
でも、どこか貴女に影響されてたのも確か。

engChrName: Not at all. The path I chose was entirely my own.
engSearchText: Not at all. The path I chose was entirely my own.
jpnChrName: “月”でしかない私が、貴女やあの人みたいに 輝くことは出来ないけど……
jpnSearchText:
“月”でしかない私が、貴女やあの人みたいに
輝くことは出来ないけど……

engChrName: Having said that, it's possible I was subconsciously influenced by you on some level.
engSearchText:
Having said that, it's possible I was subconsciously
influenced by you on some level.
jpnChrName: たった一つの舞台を高めるという喜びに どうしようもなく取り憑かれてしまっただけ。
jpnSearchText:
たった一つの舞台を高めるという喜びに
どうしようもなく取り憑かれてしまっただけ。

engChrName: You're like the brightest star in the sky. I'm just a moon—I can't shine like you...or her.
engSearchText:
You're like the brightest star in the sky. I'm just a
moon—I can't shine like you...or her.
jpnChrName: 貴女が映画に賭ける情熱と同じように。
jpnSearchText: 貴女が映画に賭ける情熱と同じように。

engChrName: But I came to know the joy of the stage—as well as being at the center of it. The life of theater has captivated me ever since...
engSearchText:
But I came to know the joy of the stage—as well as
being at the center of it. The life of theater has
captivated me ever since...
jpnSearchText: ……ぁ………

engChrName: ...just like how the life of cinema has done the same for you.
engSearchText:
...just like how the life of cinema has done the same
for you.
jpnChrName: ……ほんっとズルいわね。 あたしの方は何でも相談してきたのに。
jpnSearchText:
……ほんっとズルいわね。
あたしの方は何でも相談してきたのに。

jpnChrName: あんたは昔から、勝手に自分を決めつけて、 勝手に新たな道を選び取って──
jpnSearchText:
あんたは昔から、勝手に自分を決めつけて、
勝手に新たな道を選び取って──

engChrName: Y'know, I'm almost jealous. When I was struggling to find my way, you lent me an ear and your wisdom.
engSearchText:
Y'know, I'm almost jealous. When I was struggling to
find my way, you lent me an ear and your wisdom.
jpnChrName: ええ、だからこの機会に 私が新たに得た物を見てもらう……！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、だからこの機会に
私が新たに得た物を見てもらう……！

engChrName: You never needed my help, though. You found the path you wanted to follow all on your own.
engSearchText:
You never needed my help, though. You found the
path you wanted to follow all on your own.
jpnChrName: そっちも確かめてみなさい…… あたしがこの４年で掴んだ“力”を！！
jpnSearchText:
そっちも確かめてみなさい……
あたしがこの４年で掴んだ“力”を！！

engChrName: I did. And now I'm going to show you everything I've learned during the time we've been apart.
engSearchText:
I did. And now I'm going to show you everything I've
learned during the time we've been apart.
jpnChrName: ええ──望むところよ！！
jpnSearchText: ええ──望むところよ！！

engChrName: I'm curious to see which of us has grown more these past four years.
engSearchText:
I'm curious to see which of us has grown more these
past four years.
jpnSearchText: ───ハッ……！！

engChrName: As am I. Let's do this!
engSearchText: As am I. Let's do this!
jpnChrName: 熱くさせてくれんじゃねぇか…… ならついでに俺も乗らせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
熱くさせてくれんじゃねぇか……
ならついでに俺も乗らせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ツァオ──本気のアンタと 一度やり合うためにもなァ！！
jpnSearchText:
ツァオ──本気のアンタと
一度やり合うためにもなァ！！

engChrName: I think I'll add my own fuel to the fire.
engSearchText: I think I'll add my own fuel to the fire.
jpnChrName: フフ、いいでしょう。 私が買っている若者の一人──
jpnSearchText:
フフ、いいでしょう。
私が買っている若者の一人──

engChrName: Cao! I've got a score to settle, and I'm not gonna be satisfied until I beat the everloving shit outta you.
engSearchText:
Cao! I've got a score to settle, and I'm not gonna be
satisfied until I beat the everloving shit outta you.
jpnChrName: 《羅州の麒麟児》がどこまで殻を破れたか 存分に見せてもらいましょうか！
jpnSearchText:
《羅州の麒麟児》がどこまで殻を破れたか
存分に見せてもらいましょうか！

engChrName: Very well. I hold your potential in high regard, Little Conqueror.
engSearchText:
Very well. I hold your potential in high regard,
Little Conqueror.
jpnChrName: ハッ──上等だ！！
jpnSearchText: ハッ──上等だ！！

engChrName: Let's see if you managed to break out of your shell. Show me that my confidence in you is not misplaced!
engSearchText:
Let's see if you managed to break out of your shell.
Show me that my confidence in you is not misplaced!
jpnChrName: やれやれ……ま、 こういうノリの方がやりやすいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……ま、
こういうノリの方がやりやすいぜ。

engChrName: I'll do more than that, you four-eyed bastard!
engSearchText:
I'll do more than that, you four-eyed
bastard!
jpnChrName: 相手は《銀》に《白蘭竜》、 くれぐれも油断しないで！
jpnSearchText:
相手は《銀》に《白蘭竜》、
くれぐれも油断しないで！

engChrName: Well, I'm glad that he's fired up, at least.
engSearchText: Well, I'm glad that he's fired up, at least.
jpnChrName: 東方を源流とするもの同士、 その深奥──見せて頂こう！
jpnSearchText:
東方を源流とするもの同士、
その深奥──見せて頂こう！

engChrName: We're up against both Yin and the White Orchid Dragon. Don't let your guard down!
engSearchText:
We're up against both Yin and the White
Orchid Dragon. Don't let your guard down!
jpnChrName: クク……“先代”とは以前、 愉しくやり合わせてもらったが。
jpnSearchText:
クク……“先代”とは以前、
愉しくやり合わせてもらったが。

engChrName: I am interested to see just what the famous White Orchid Dragon can do.
engSearchText:
I am interested to see just what the famous White
Orchid Dragon can do.
jpnChrName: 勝負に水を差さねえ程度に 味見させてもらおうかァ……！
jpnSearchText:
勝負に水を差さねえ程度に
味見させてもらおうかァ……！

engChrName: I had a pretty damn good time fighting your predecessor.
engSearchText:
I had a pretty damn good time fighting
your predecessor.
jpnChrName: フフ……なるほど。
jpnSearchText: フフ……なるほど。

engChrName: Hopefully you can measure up!
engSearchText: Hopefully you can measure up!
jpnChrName: どうやらヴァンさんの所で 着実に研鑽を積んでいるようですね？
jpnSearchText:
どうやらヴァンさんの所で
着実に研鑽を積んでいるようですね？

engChrName: Interesting. Very interesting.
engSearchText: Interesting. Very interesting.
jpnChrName: はあはあはあ……実戦の機会だけは しこたまあったからな。
jpnSearchText:
はあはあはあ……実戦の機会だけは
しこたまあったからな。

engChrName: The time you have spent under Van has clearly done wonders in drawing out your latent potential.
engSearchText:
The time you have spent under Van has clearly done
wonders in drawing out your latent potential.
jpnChrName: アンタの《月華》の秘奥── 引き出すにはまだまだみてぇだが。
jpnSearchText:
アンタの《月華》の秘奥──
引き出すにはまだまだみてぇだが。

engChrName: *pant* I've been seeing a hell of a lot of combat, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
*pant* I've been seeing a hell of a lot of combat, that's
for sure.
jpnChrName: ふう……参ったわね。
jpnSearchText: ふう……参ったわね。

engChrName: You barely broke a sweat through that whole thing, though. Looks like I've got a ways to go.
engSearchText:
You barely broke a sweat through that whole
thing, though. Looks like I've got a ways to go.
jpnChrName: この戦力差でそこまで 粘り切られちゃうなんて……
jpnSearchText:
この戦力差でそこまで
粘り切られちゃうなんて……

engChrName: Whew... You sure are something.
engSearchText: Whew... You sure are something.
jpnChrName: ふふ……そんなことないわ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ……そんなことないわ。

engChrName: You were waaay outnumbered, but you still put up one heck of a fight. You're in a class of your own.
engSearchText:
You were waaay outnumbered, but you still put up
one heck of a fight. You're in a class of your own.
jpnChrName: 用意していた“符”を全て使って 全身全霊を出させてもらった……
jpnSearchText:
用意していた“符”を全て使って
全身全霊を出させてもらった……

engChrName: Haha. I don't think that's true at all.
engSearchText: Haha. I don't think that's true at all.
jpnChrName: ジュディスはどう？ ……ガッカリさせちゃったかな？
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスはどう？
……ガッカリさせちゃったかな？

engChrName: I came at you with everything I had, and that was still the best I could do.
engSearchText:
I came at you with everything I had, and that was still
the best I could do.
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: I hope my performance didn't leave you disappointed.
engSearchText: I hope my performance didn't leave you disappointed.

engChrName: Oh, you have GOT to be kidding me.
engSearchText: Oh, you have GOT to be kidding me.
jpnChrName: 強かったわよ── 本当に見違えるくらいに。
jpnSearchText:
強かったわよ──
本当に見違えるくらいに。

jpnChrName: ──ああもう、例の先輩ってのは 本当に腹が立つわね……！
jpnSearchText:
──ああもう、例の先輩ってのは
本当に腹が立つわね……！

engChrName: If I had to rate it on a scale of one to ten, I'd give you an eleven. You were that amazing.
engSearchText:
If I had to rate it on a scale of one to ten, I'd give you
an eleven. You were that amazing.
jpnChrName: 太陽だか不死鳥だか知らないけど あんたをここまで引き上げて……！
jpnSearchText:
太陽だか不死鳥だか知らないけど
あんたをここまで引き上げて……！

engChrName: Argh. I am SO jealous of that woman! She has you all to herself!
engSearchText:
Argh. I am SO jealous of that woman! She has you all
to herself!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ちょっと貴女と 似てるところもある人だけど……
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ちょっと貴女と
似てるところもある人だけど……

engChrName: And thanks to her, you've grown to be a shining star. She must be really special.
engSearchText:
And thanks to her, you've grown to be a shining star.
She must be really special.
jpnChrName: えっと、何だか色々と 垣間見えてしまった気が……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、何だか色々と
垣間見えてしまった気が……

engChrName: Haha. That's one quality the two of you share. You have more in common with her than you might realize.
engSearchText:
Haha. That's one quality the two of you share.
You have more in common with her than you
might realize.
jpnChrName: うん……クロスベルで活動、 太陽に不死鳥の舞台といえば……
jpnSearchText:
うん……クロスベルで活動、
太陽に不死鳥の舞台といえば……

engChrName: That was certainly enlightening.
engSearchText: That was certainly enlightening.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それ以上の詮索は 野暮というものでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それ以上の詮索は
野暮というものでしょう。

engChrName: Hmm... Crossbell... Performances... One woman immediately springs to mind when I think of those things together.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Crossbell... Performances... One woman
immediately springs to mind when I think of
those things together.
jpnChrName: よく分かりませんけど、 仲直りできて良かったですっ。
jpnSearchText:
よく分かりませんけど、
仲直りできて良かったですっ。

engChrName: Well, we shouldn't eavesdrop any more. It's rude to pry into someone else's personal life.
engSearchText:
Well, we shouldn't eavesdrop any more. It's rude to
pry into someone else's personal life.
jpnChrName: はは……いずれにせよ この人数差相手に大したものだ。
jpnSearchText:
はは……いずれにせよ
この人数差相手に大したものだ。

engChrName: True. Still, I'm glad this whole thing had a happy ending.
engSearchText:
True. Still, I'm glad this whole thing had a
happy ending.
jpnChrName: 代々受け継ぎ磨き上げし技、 しかと見届けさせてもらった。
jpnSearchText:
代々受け継ぎ磨き上げし技、
しかと見届けさせてもらった。

engChrName: I'm just amazed at how well they held up against the eleven of us.
engSearchText:
I'm just amazed at how well they held up against the
eleven of us.
jpnChrName: 《黒月》の次代を担う 実力者の一端もね。
jpnSearchText:
《黒月》の次代を担う
実力者の一端もね。

engChrName: It was an honor to see you in action, Yin. You really live up to your legend.
engSearchText:
It was an honor to see you in action, Yin. You really
live up to your legend.
jpnChrName: クク……その歳でもう、 親父の足元に届いてるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
クク……その歳でもう、
親父の足元に届いてるとはな。

engChrName: Same goes for you, Mister Future Heiyue Leader.
engSearchText: Same goes for you, Mister Future Heiyue Leader.
jpnChrName: うふふ、ええなぁ。 腕前もボディも好みやわぁ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、ええなぁ。
腕前もボディも好みやわぁ。

engChrName: You're already on par with your pops. I'm impressed.
engSearchText: You're already on par with your pops. I'm impressed.
jpnChrName: てなわけで、いいんだな？
jpnSearchText: てなわけで、いいんだな？

engChrName: Me, too. You're unrivaled in both strength AND looks. I think I may be falling for you!
engSearchText:
Me, too. You're unrivaled in both strength
AND looks. I think I may be falling for you!
jpnChrName: ええ──手札の方にも 備えられてしまいましたし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──手札の方にも
備えられてしまいましたし。

engChrName: All right. We good to call this match decided?
engSearchText: All right. We good to call this match decided?
jpnChrName: それではこちらを 既に二枚入手していますので。
jpnSearchText:
それではこちらを
既に二枚入手していますので。

engChrName: Yes. We admit defeat. I had hoped that we could catch you unawares with my trump card, but alas.
engSearchText:
Yes. We admit defeat. I had hoped that we could
catch you unawares with my trump card, but alas.
jpnChrName: あの最初の脱落者の片方は アンタらがやったのかよ……
jpnSearchText:
あの最初の脱落者の片方は
アンタらがやったのかよ……

engChrName: We have two keycards in our possession, and they are now yours.
engSearchText:
We have two keycards in our possession, and they are
now yours.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーを２つ手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アクセスキーを２つ手に入れた。

engChrName: So you guys drew first blood in this game, huh? Figures.
engSearchText:
So you guys drew first blood in this game, huh?
Figures.
jpnChrName: それではこちらを 三枚入手していますので。
jpnSearchText:
それではこちらを
三枚入手していますので。

engChrName: Received two keycards.
engSearchText: Received two keycards.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーを３つ手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アクセスキーを３つ手に入れた。

engChrName: We have three keycards in our possession, and they are now yours.
engSearchText:
We have three keycards in our possession, and they
are now yours.
jpnChrName: チーム　黒月貿易公司　　脱落
jpnSearchText: チーム　黒月貿易公司　　脱落

engChrName: Received three keycards.
engSearchText: Received three keycards.
jpnChrName: ……しかし良かったのか？ ギエン爺さんにどやされそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
……しかし良かったのか？
ギエン爺さんにどやされそうだが。

engChrName: Team Heiyue has been eliminated.
engSearchText: Team Heiyue has been eliminated.
jpnChrName: フフ、私たちがこのゲームの “勝者”になる必要はありませんから。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、私たちがこのゲームの
“勝者”になる必要はありませんから。

engChrName: You sure that was a good idea? Gien's gonna get pretty pissy with you.
engSearchText:
You sure that was a good idea? Gien's gonna get
pretty pissy with you.
jpnChrName: 我らの狙いは“アルマータの壊滅”── ゲーム内だろうと、ゲーム外だろうとね。
jpnSearchText:
我らの狙いは“アルマータの壊滅”──
ゲーム内だろうと、ゲーム外だろうとね。

engChrName: Oh, I very much doubt that. Whether we won or lost was never of any consequence.
engSearchText:
Oh, I very much doubt that. Whether we won or lost
was never of any consequence.
jpnChrName: うわあっ、ホ、ホントに出た！？
jpnSearchText: うわあっ、ホ、ホントに出た！？

engChrName: We came here with the express purpose of witnessing Almata's end—and we can accomplish that while off the game board.
engSearchText:
We came here with the express purpose of witnessing
Almata's end—and we can accomplish that while off
the game board.
jpnChrName: 成程……銀殿以外のカードを 温存していたというわけか。
jpnSearchText:
成程……銀殿以外のカードを
温存していたというわけか。

engChrName: Whoa! They really were here all along!
engSearchText: Whoa! They really were here all along!
jpnChrName: ふふ、とはいえルールもありますし、 ゲーム自体にこれ以上介入はしません。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、とはいえルールもありますし、
ゲーム自体にこれ以上介入はしません。

engChrName: You were playing your cards close to the chest, I see.
engSearchText: You were playing your cards close to the chest, I see.
jpnChrName: ですがヴァンさん達の勝利には 宜しければ貢献させて頂きますよ？
jpnSearchText:
ですがヴァンさん達の勝利には
宜しければ貢献させて頂きますよ？

engChrName: We fully intend to abide by the rules, so we will not interfere with the game or its players any further.
engSearchText:
We fully intend to abide by the rules, so we will not
interfere with the game or its players any further.
jpnChrName: 厄介な方々を下した時など── 警察などよりお力になれそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
厄介な方々を下した時など──
警察などよりお力になれそうですし。

engChrName: However, we can still offer aid from the sidelines. Should you defeat any of the bosses, we would be all too happy to take them into our care.
engSearchText:
However, we can still offer aid from the sidelines.
Should you defeat any of the bosses, we would be all
too happy to take them into our care.

engChrName: Consider giving them over to us instead of those brutes from the guild.
engSearchText:
Consider giving them over to us instead of those
brutes from the guild.
jpnChrName: ……それ、 わたしたちも含めてだよね？
jpnSearchText:
……それ、
わたしたちも含めてだよね？

jpnChrName: それでは健闘をお祈りしています。 ──行きましょうか、《銀》殿。
jpnSearchText:
それでは健闘をお祈りしています。
──行きましょうか、《銀》殿。

engChrName: ...Can I punch him? I REALLY want to punch him.
engSearchText: ...Can I punch him? I REALLY want to punch him.
jpnChrName: ええ…… ──ジュディスも、またね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……
──ジュディスも、またね。

engChrName: Regardless, I will be praying for your team's success. Yin and I will take our leave.
engSearchText:
Regardless, I will be praying for your team's success.
Yin and I will take our leave.
jpnChrName: ……ん、分かった。
jpnSearchText: ……ん、分かった。

engChrName: I'll see you around, Judith.
engSearchText: I'll see you around, Judith.
jpnChrName: ふう、だからアイツは苦手なんだよ。 いつも掌の上っつーか……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、だからアイツは苦手なんだよ。
いつも掌の上っつーか……

engChrName: See ya.
engSearchText: See ya.
jpnChrName: あはは……私たちが勝ち進むのも 計算に組み込まれてそうですね……
jpnSearchText:
あはは……私たちが勝ち進むのも
計算に組み込まれてそうですね……

engChrName: *sigh* I hate dealing with that guy. Even when you have a leg up on him, it always feels like he's ten steps ahead anyway.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I hate dealing with that guy. Even when you
have a leg up on him, it always feels like he's ten steps
ahead anyway.
jpnChrName: ハッ、俺たちなりの“裏技”で 食い下がってみるしかねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、俺たちなりの“裏技”で
食い下がってみるしかねぇだろ。

engChrName: It does feel like he accounted for the possibility of him losing that battle. He's quite the schemer.
engSearchText:
It does feel like he accounted for the possibility of
him losing that battle. He's quite the schemer.
jpnChrName: やあ、ヴァンたち。 それに《吼天獅子》殿だったかな？
jpnSearchText:
やあ、ヴァンたち。
それに《吼天獅子》殿だったかな？

engChrName: We'll just have to cook up some schemes of our own and pay him back tenfold!
engSearchText:
We'll just have to cook up some schemes of our own
and pay him back tenfold!
jpnChrName: それぞれ数日と半月ぶりだから 久しぶりってほどじゃないけどね。
jpnSearchText:
それぞれ数日と半月ぶりだから
久しぶりってほどじゃないけどね。

engChrName: What's up, guys? Oh, and if it isn't the famous Roaring Lion himself. Nice to see you again.
engSearchText:
What's up, guys? Oh, and if it isn't the famous
Roaring Lion himself. Nice to see you again.
jpnChrName: って師父（せんせい）も会ってたんですか？
jpnSearchText: って師父（せんせい）も会ってたんですか？

engChrName: It's been, what, three-ish weeks since we met? And even less for the rest of the gang.
engSearchText:
It's been, what, three-ish weeks since we met?
And even less for the rest of the gang.
jpnChrName: あくまで遠間でな。 見事気配を察せられてしまったが。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで遠間でな。
見事気配を察せられてしまったが。

engChrName: Hang on. You met my master?
engSearchText: Hang on. You met my master?
jpnChrName: あの時はろくに挨拶もできず 失礼した──《白銀の姫》よ。
jpnSearchText:
あの時はろくに挨拶もできず
失礼した──《白銀の姫》よ。

engChrName: 'Met' isn't the word I'd use. We merely exchanged glances from a distance.
engSearchText:
'Met' isn't the word I'd use. We merely exchanged
glances from a distance.
jpnChrName: フフ、こちらこそさ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、こちらこそさ。

engChrName: I regret that I was unable to greet you directly, Divine Blade of Silver.
engSearchText:
I regret that I was unable to greet you directly, Divine
Blade of Silver.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、早速始めるとしようか？
jpnSearchText: それじゃ、早速始めるとしようか？

engChrName: Heh. Likewise.
engSearchText: Heh. Likewise.
jpnChrName: いきなりだな……
jpnSearchText: いきなりだな……

engChrName: Okay! You guys ready to go at it?
engSearchText: Okay! You guys ready to go at it?
jpnChrName: 先日はちょっと消化不良だったからね。 “続き”を楽しみにしていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
先日はちょっと消化不良だったからね。
“続き”を楽しみにしていたんだ。

engChrName: What, like, right now?
