engSearchText: What, like, right now?
jpnChrName: 楽しめそうな顔触れなんかも 更に増えてるみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
楽しめそうな顔触れなんかも
更に増えてるみたいだし。

engChrName: Of course! I was super bummed that we couldn't finish our battle the other day. I've been itching for a rematch with you guys ever since.
engSearchText:
Of course! I was super bummed that we couldn't
finish our battle the other day. I've been itching for a
rematch with you guys ever since.
jpnChrName: 《白銀の剣聖》……
jpnSearchText: 《白銀の剣聖》……

engChrName: I see you've brought some guests with you, too. And some very tough ones, at that.
engSearchText:
I see you've brought some guests with you, too.
And some very tough ones, at that.
jpnChrName: 姉弟子だかなんだかは知らないけど 前にリィンが世話になったみたいだね？
jpnSearchText:
姉弟子だかなんだかは知らないけど
前にリィンが世話になったみたいだね？

engChrName: The Divine Blade of Silver.
engSearchText: The Divine Blade of Silver.
jpnChrName: ふふ、彼の関係者だったっけ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、彼の関係者だったっけ。

engChrName: I've heard stories about you. You trained under the same master as Rean—and had a brief confrontation with him not too long ago.
engSearchText:
I've heard stories about you. You trained under the
same master as Rean—and had a brief confrontation
with him not too long ago.
jpnChrName: 猟兵王殿にも見（まみ）えたことがある。 成長ぶりを見せてもらおうかな？
jpnSearchText:
猟兵王殿にも見（まみ）えたことがある。
成長ぶりを見せてもらおうかな？

engChrName: Heehee. So he's been telling all his little friends about me? How flattering.
engSearchText:
Heehee. So he's been telling all his little friends
about me? How flattering.
jpnChrName: ……なんかムカつく。
jpnSearchText: ……なんかムカつく。

engChrName: Oh, and I've heard about you, too. Did you know I met your boss once? I am VERY interested to see just what his little squirt is made of!
engSearchText:
Oh, and I've heard about you, too. Did you know I
met your boss once? I am VERY interested to see just
what his little squirt is made of!
jpnChrName: いやはや、名高き《白銀の剣聖》と この場でお目にかかれるとは。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、名高き《白銀の剣聖》と
この場でお目にかかれるとは。

engChrName: Call me 'little squirt' one more time and I will end you.
engSearchText:
Call me 'little squirt' one more time and I will
end you.
jpnChrName: アリオスさんやリィンさんと同じ── いえ、“とある方”の裏弟子でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
アリオスさんやリィンさんと同じ──
いえ、“とある方”の裏弟子でしたか。

engChrName: Well, now. I certainly didn't expect to find myself face to face with the famous Divine Blade of Silver.
engSearchText:
Well, now. I certainly didn't expect to find myself
face to face with the famous Divine Blade of Silver.
jpnChrName: おいおい…… こりゃ予想外のご馳走だなァ。
jpnSearchText:
おいおい……
こりゃ予想外のご馳走だなァ。

engChrName: So you're the unofficial student of the master who taught Arios and Rean.
engSearchText:
So you're the unofficial student of the master who
taught Arios and Rean.
jpnChrName: うーん、まさかウチを 上回りそうな子が来てたなんて。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、まさかウチを
上回りそうな子が来てたなんて。

engChrName: Well, isn't this a thrillin' surprise.
engSearchText: Well, isn't this a thrillin' surprise.
jpnChrName: そっちがやる気なら仕方がねぇ。 ──構えろ、手加減抜きで行くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
そっちがやる気なら仕方がねぇ。
──構えろ、手加減抜きで行くぞ。

engChrName: I wasn't expecting to find such a fearsome opponent here. Her strength may very well exceed ours.
engSearchText:
I wasn't expecting to find such a fearsome
opponent here. Her strength may very well
exceed ours.
jpnChrName: ……姫、お供いたします。
jpnSearchText: ……姫、お供いたします。

engChrName: If you wanna pick a fight with us, then so be it. We'll give you a hell of a beatdown.
engSearchText:
If you wanna pick a fight with us, then so be it.
We'll give you a hell of a beatdown.
jpnChrName: 一人でいいと言いたい所だけど……
jpnSearchText: 一人でいいと言いたい所だけど……

engChrName: Allow me to fight by your side, Princess.
engSearchText: Allow me to fight by your side, Princess.
jpnChrName: ふふ、こんな面子を独り占めしちゃ さすがに食い意地が張りすぎかな？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、こんな面子を独り占めしちゃ
さすがに食い意地が張りすぎかな？

engChrName: I'd like to tell you, 'Keep your hands off them and leave this to me...'
engSearchText:
I'd like to tell you, 'Keep your hands off them and
leave this to me...'
jpnChrName: ──存分に 《斑鳩》の力を示すといいよ。
jpnSearchText:
──存分に
《斑鳩》の力を示すといいよ。

engChrName: ...but that'd be selfish. It's not every day that we run into foes who are this exciting, so I'll be a good girl and share.
engSearchText:
...but that'd be selfish. It's not every day that we run
into foes who are this exciting, so I'll be a good girl
and share.
jpnChrName: 承知──
jpnSearchText: 承知──

engChrName: Show them the might of the Ikaruga.
engSearchText: Show them the might of the Ikaruga.
jpnChrName: 《朧月流》が使い手クロガネ、 お相手つかまつる──！
jpnSearchText:
《朧月流》が使い手クロガネ、
お相手つかまつる──！

engChrName: As you wish.
engSearchText: As you wish.
jpnChrName: チッ…… あの時の覆面野郎か！
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
あの時の覆面野郎か！

engChrName: I, Kurogane of the Rougetsu school, shall face you in battle!
engSearchText:
I, Kurogane of the Rougetsu school, shall face you
in battle!
jpnChrName: 共に脅威度Ｓ以上と推定── どうかご注意を！
jpnSearchText:
共に脅威度Ｓ以上と推定──
どうかご注意を！

engChrName: We're going up against the masked dude, too? What a pain.
engSearchText:
We're going up against the masked dude, too?
What a pain.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ行こうか── いざ尋常に、勝負！！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ行こうか──
いざ尋常に、勝負！！

engChrName: Both of them are the same as an S-level threat— perhaps even greater! Be careful, everyone!
engSearchText:
Both of them are the same as an S-level threat—
perhaps even greater! Be careful, everyone!
jpnChrName: っ……厳しかったですけど……
jpnSearchText: っ……厳しかったですけど……

engChrName: Now, I'm not very easy to impress, so you better blow me away—or I'll blow you off the face of the earth!
engSearchText:
Now, I'm not very easy to impress, so you better blow
me away—or I'll blow you off the face of the earth!
jpnChrName: 何とか……勝てた……？
jpnSearchText: 何とか……勝てた……？

engChrName: That was rough...
engSearchText: That was rough...
jpnChrName: はい……他の方々の 増援もありませんでしたし……
jpnSearchText:
はい……他の方々の
増援もありませんでしたし……

engChrName: But I think we got them, at least?
engSearchText: But I think we got them, at least?
jpnChrName: ……リィンの代わりに一本…… ううん半本は返せたかな……？
jpnSearchText:
……リィンの代わりに一本……
ううん半本は返せたかな……？

engChrName: Yeah... It doesn't look like they have any reinforcements, so I think we're in the clear.
engSearchText:
Yeah... It doesn't look like they have any
reinforcements, so I think we're in the clear.

engChrName: Good. I got some long overdue payback for Rean, so I'm pretty happy.
engSearchText:
Good. I got some long overdue payback for Rean, so
I'm pretty happy.
jpnChrName: フフ……フフフフ…………
jpnSearchText: フフ……フフフフ…………

engChrName: ...Hmm? Wait.
engSearchText: ...Hmm? Wait.
jpnChrName: いいね……ゲスト込みで、 とても良い感じだ…………
jpnSearchText:
いいね……ゲスト込みで、
とても良い感じだ…………

engChrName: Heh... Heheheh...
engSearchText: Heh... Heheheh...
jpnChrName: 準備運動はこの辺でいいかな。
jpnSearchText: 準備運動はこの辺でいいかな。

engChrName: That...was awesome. You and your friends really are quite something.
engSearchText:
That...was awesome. You and your friends really are
quite something.
jpnChrName: そろそろ本気で、死合おうか？
jpnSearchText: そろそろ本気で、死合おうか？

engChrName: All right. Warmup time's over.
engSearchText: All right. Warmup time's over.
jpnChrName: あ、あの時の……！
jpnSearchText: あ、あの時の……！

engChrName: No more playing around. Ready to die?
engSearchText: No more playing around. Ready to die?
jpnChrName: いけません、あれは──
jpnSearchText: いけません、あれは──

engChrName: I-It's that same battle aura again!
engSearchText: I-It's that same battle aura again!
jpnChrName: ちいッ……！ スイッチを入れちまったか！
jpnSearchText:
ちいッ……！
スイッチを入れちまったか！

engChrName: We're no match for her in that state.
engSearchText: We're no match for her in that state.
jpnChrName: これが《白銀の剣聖》か……！
jpnSearchText: これが《白銀の剣聖》か……！

engChrName: Damn it. Maybe we shouldn't have went so hard in that fight!
engSearchText:
Damn it. Maybe we shouldn't have went so hard in
that fight!
jpnChrName: これほどまでとは。 さすがに想定外ですねぇ……！
jpnSearchText:
これほどまでとは。
さすがに想定外ですねぇ……！

engChrName: So this is the Divine Blade of Silver at her best, huh?
engSearchText: So this is the Divine Blade of Silver at her best, huh?
jpnChrName: クハハ……！ 剣聖の名は伊達じゃねえってか。
jpnSearchText:
クハハ……！
剣聖の名は伊達じゃねえってか。

engChrName: I did not realize she possessed so much power.
engSearchText: I did not realize she possessed so much power.
jpnChrName: 姫、恐れながらこのあたりで 抑えていただければと。
jpnSearchText:
姫、恐れながらこのあたりで
抑えていただければと。

engChrName: Haha! She isn't a Divine Blade for nothing.
engSearchText: Haha! She isn't a Divine Blade for nothing.
jpnChrName: どういう意味だい？
jpnSearchText: どういう意味だい？

engChrName: If I may be so bold, Princess, I would ask that you exercise self-restraint.
engSearchText:
If I may be so bold, Princess, I would ask that you
exercise self-restraint.
jpnChrName: これ以上は“主契約”の方に 支障をきたしかねませぬ。
jpnSearchText:
これ以上は“主契約”の方に
支障をきたしかねませぬ。

engChrName: Oh? And just why should I do that?
engSearchText: Oh? And just why should I do that?
jpnChrName: どうか、この場は──
jpnSearchText: どうか、この場は──

engChrName: If you continue along this path, we will run the risk of interfering with our primary contract.
engSearchText:
If you continue along this path, we will run the risk of
interfering with our primary contract.
jpnChrName: いや……退けないな。 こんなに昂ぶるのは久しぶりなんだ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……退けないな。
こんなに昂ぶるのは久しぶりなんだ。

engChrName: So please, I again ask that you—
engSearchText: So please, I again ask that you—
jpnChrName: 今なら見える気がするよ…… ……零の境地、そのさらに先が……！
jpnSearchText:
今なら見える気がするよ……
……零の境地、そのさらに先が……！

engChrName: Mmm. Nah, not happening. It's been AGES since I last felt this excited.
engSearchText:
Mmm. Nah, not happening. It's been AGES since I
last felt this excited.
jpnChrName: この場は私が片付ける。 君は下がって。
jpnSearchText:
この場は私が片付ける。
君は下がって。

engChrName: And I can't pass up this opportunity to finally see what lies beyond zero's frontier. It's almost within sight!
engSearchText:
And I can't pass up this opportunity to finally see
what lies beyond zero's frontier. It's almost
within sight!
jpnChrName: ですが、姫──
jpnSearchText: ですが、姫──

engChrName: Sorry, but I think I'm gonna be a little selfish today. This one's mine, so back off.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but I think I'm gonna be a little selfish today.
This one's mine, so back off.
jpnChrName: 下がれ。
jpnSearchText: 下がれ。

engChrName: But—
engSearchText: But—
jpnChrName: ……御意。
jpnSearchText: ……御意。

engChrName: Back. Off.
engSearchText: Back. Off.
jpnChrName: 姫がこうなっては もはや拙者にも止められぬ。
jpnSearchText:
姫がこうなっては
もはや拙者にも止められぬ。

engChrName: ...As you wish.
engSearchText: ...As you wish.
jpnChrName: 恐らく何人かは屍と化そう。 ──どうかご覚悟を。
jpnSearchText:
恐らく何人かは屍と化そう。
──どうかご覚悟を。

engChrName: I regret to inform you that there is no stopping the princess when she gets like this.
engSearchText:
I regret to inform you that there is no stopping the
princess when she gets like this.
jpnChrName: じょ、冗談でしょ……
jpnSearchText: じょ、冗談でしょ……

engChrName: Some of you will die. I extend my apologies and condolences.
engSearchText:
Some of you will die. I extend my apologies
and condolences.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……！

engChrName: Th-Thanks... I think?
engSearchText: Th-Thanks... I think?
jpnChrName: こうなったらやるしかねえ……！
jpnSearchText: こうなったらやるしかねえ……！

engChrName: Should we fall back?!
engSearchText: Should we fall back?!
jpnChrName: 丹田に力を入れろ！　神経を研ぎ澄ませ！ 最大限に連携して迎撃する──！
jpnSearchText:
丹田に力を入れろ！　神経を研ぎ澄ませ！
最大限に連携して迎撃する──！

engChrName: No. She'd just chase after us, and I don't like our chances of outrunning her.
engSearchText:
No. She'd just chase after us, and I don't like our
chances of outrunning her.
jpnChrName: はい、全力でサポートします……！
jpnSearchText: はい、全力でサポートします……！

engChrName: We'll just have to stand our ground and fight back!
engSearchText: We'll just have to stand our ground and fight back!
jpnChrName: さあ、始めようか──
jpnSearchText: さあ、始めようか──

engChrName: Right! We can do this!
engSearchText: Right! We can do this!

engChrName: Can you? Guess we'll find out.
engSearchText: Can you? Guess we'll find out.
jpnChrName: なっ──
jpnSearchText: なっ──

engChrName: (I'm not gonna make it!)
engSearchText: (I'm not gonna make it!)
jpnChrName: 何者だい……？
jpnSearchText: 何者だい……？

jpnChrName: ああ───“そこか”。
jpnSearchText: ああ───“そこか”。

engChrName: Now where...?
engSearchText: Now where...?
jpnChrName: がっ！
jpnSearchText: がっ！

engChrName: Aha. Found you.
engSearchText: Aha. Found you.
jpnChrName: ぐふ……！
jpnSearchText: ぐふ……！

engChrName: Gah!
engSearchText: Gah!
jpnChrName: あれは──！
jpnSearchText: あれは──！

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnChrName: 黒月の“凶手”か……！？
jpnSearchText: 黒月の“凶手”か……！？

engChrName: The xiongshou?!
engSearchText: The xiongshou?!
jpnChrName: まだいるね。
jpnSearchText: まだいるね。

engChrName: What're they doing here?!
engSearchText: What're they doing here?!
jpnSearchText: 破───ッ！！

engChrName: Can't hide from me.
engSearchText: Can't hide from me.
jpnChrName: なッ！？
jpnSearchText: なッ！？

engChrName: Haaah!
engSearchText: Haaah!
jpnChrName: ギエン爺さんの──！？ いや、被ってる面が違う！
jpnSearchText:
ギエン爺さんの──！？
いや、被ってる面が違う！

jpnChrName: ええ、ご存じの通り 黒月も一枚岩ではありません。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ご存じの通り
黒月も一枚岩ではありません。

engChrName: Are they Gien's?! No, their masks are different!
engSearchText: Are they Gien's?! No, their masks are different!
jpnChrName: 彼らはルウ家ではなく、 とある別の長老が擁する凶手たち──
jpnSearchText:
彼らはルウ家ではなく、
とある別の長老が擁する凶手たち──

engChrName: Indeed. As you should know, not everyone in Heiyue is on the same page.
engSearchText:
Indeed. As you should know, not everyone in Heiyue
is on the same page.
jpnChrName: どうやら私たちとは“別口”で ゲームに参加していたようですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら私たちとは“別口”で
ゲームに参加していたようですねぇ。

engChrName: Those xiongshou serve one of the other elders.
engSearchText: Those xiongshou serve one of the other elders.
jpnChrName: ええ…… 睨んでいた通りですか。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……
睨んでいた通りですか。

engChrName: Naturally, that means we are not the only team from Heiyue participating in this game.
engSearchText:
Naturally, that means we are not the only team from
Heiyue participating in this game.
jpnChrName: ルウ家じゃねえ、他の長老が 子飼いにしてやがる凶手どもか……！
jpnSearchText:
ルウ家じゃねえ、他の長老が
子飼いにしてやがる凶手どもか……！

engChrName: As we suspected.
engSearchText: As we suspected.
jpnChrName: ……あーあ。 良い感じで乗れていたのに。
jpnSearchText:
……あーあ。
良い感じで乗れていたのに。

engChrName: These xiongshou must be serving one of the other elders!
engSearchText:
These xiongshou must be serving one of the
other elders!
jpnChrName: よくも水を差してくれたね？
jpnSearchText: よくも水を差してくれたね？

engChrName: Ugh. Well, that was lame. Totally killed my vibe.
engSearchText: Ugh. Well, that was lame. Totally killed my vibe.

engChrName: You just had to go and spoil my fun.
engSearchText: You just had to go and spoil my fun.
jpnChrName: ……見誤っていたか、 これほどの底だったとは。
jpnSearchText:
……見誤っていたか、
これほどの底だったとは。

jpnChrName: 《白銀の剣聖》──規格外の化物か。 せめてこちらのキーだけは……
jpnSearchText:
《白銀の剣聖》──規格外の化物か。
せめてこちらのキーだけは……

engChrName: I fear we underestimated her true capabilities.
engSearchText: I fear we underestimated her true capabilities.
jpnChrName: キー？　ああ、アクセスキーのことか。
jpnSearchText: キー？　ああ、アクセスキーのことか。

engChrName: You may be right. Let's retreat for now. We have to protect our key—
engSearchText:
You may be right. Let's retreat for now. We have to
protect our key—
jpnChrName: ぐはあぁっ──！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ぐはあぁっ──！！

engChrName: Key? Oh, you were about to say 'keycards,' weren't you?
engSearchText:
Key? Oh, you were about to say 'keycards,'
weren't you?
jpnChrName: 興味ないね、そんなもの。
jpnSearchText: 興味ないね、そんなもの。

engChrName: Gah!
engSearchText: Gah!
jpnChrName: 手加減はした。 死にたくなければ──
jpnSearchText:
手加減はした。
死にたくなければ──

engChrName: I don't care about those things one bit.
engSearchText: I don't care about those things one bit.
jpnChrName: 今すぐ消えるといい。
jpnSearchText: 今すぐ消えるといい。

engChrName: Okay, here's the deal. I'm going to give you guys two choices:
engSearchText:
Okay, here's the deal. I'm going to give you guys two
choices:

engChrName: Flee or die.
engSearchText: Flee or die.
jpnChrName: ──散（サン）ッ！！
jpnSearchText: ──散（サン）ッ！！

jpnChrName: ……やれやれ………
jpnSearchText: ……やれやれ………

engChrName: Retreat!
engSearchText: Retreat!
jpnChrName: こ、これが“剣聖”……
jpnSearchText: こ、これが“剣聖”……

engChrName: Whew...
engSearchText: Whew...
jpnChrName: ……いえ…… 最早その枠に収まるとも……
jpnSearchText:
……いえ……
最早その枠に収まるとも……

engChrName: S-So this is what it's like to see a Divine Blade in action.
engSearchText:
S-So this is what it's like to see a Divine Blade
in action.
jpnChrName: 邪魔が入ったけどもう大丈夫。 ──それじゃあ、続けようか？
jpnSearchText:
邪魔が入ったけどもう大丈夫。
──それじゃあ、続けようか？

engChrName: I don't believe any of them are quite like her.
engSearchText: I don't believe any of them are quite like her.
jpnSearchText: ……………ふう。

engChrName: Okay, now that the trash has been dealt with, shall we pick up where we left off?
engSearchText:
Okay, now that the trash has been dealt with, shall we
pick up where we left off?
jpnChrName: 駄目だ── 興が削がれたみたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
駄目だ──
興が削がれたみたいだ。

engChrName: ...*sigh*
engSearchText: ...*sigh*
jpnChrName: はぁ、あんなどうでもいい連中に 心乱されるなんて、まだまだかな。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、あんなどうでもいい連中に
心乱されるなんて、まだまだかな。

engChrName: Never mind. Not feeling it anymore.
engSearchText: Never mind. Not feeling it anymore.
jpnChrName: ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: ヴァン。

engChrName: Man. Those worthless goons were such killjoys, weren't they? Can't believe I let them break my focus.
engSearchText:
Man. Those worthless goons were such killjoys,
weren't they? Can't believe I let them break my focus.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーを３つ手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アクセスキーを３つ手に入れた。

engChrName: You can have these.
engSearchText: You can have these.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーを４つ手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アクセスキーを４つ手に入れた。

engChrName: Received three keycards.
engSearchText: Received three keycards.
jpnChrName: こいつは……
jpnSearchText: こいつは……

engChrName: Received four keycards.
engSearchText: Received four keycards.
jpnChrName: 私たちの負けでいいよ。
jpnSearchText: 私たちの負けでいいよ。

engChrName: Wait, what?
engSearchText: Wait, what?
jpnChrName: ちゃんと戦ったし、 戦意喪失ってことでよろしく。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんと戦ったし、
戦意喪失ってことでよろしく。

engChrName: Let's just call this our loss, 'kay?
engSearchText: Let's just call this our loss, 'kay?
jpnChrName: チーム　斑鳩　　脱落
jpnSearchText: チーム　斑鳩　　脱落

engChrName: I lost the will to keep going, and that's all she wrote.
engSearchText: I lost the will to keep going, and that's all she wrote.
jpnChrName: ……いいのか？
jpnSearchText: ……いいのか？

engChrName: Team Ikaruga has been eliminated.
engSearchText: Team Ikaruga has been eliminated.
jpnChrName: いいさ、どうせゲームは “主契約”の範疇じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
いいさ、どうせゲームは
“主契約”の範疇じゃない。

engChrName: You sure about this?
engSearchText: You sure about this?
jpnChrName: 息抜きさえできれば こちらも満足だったからね。
jpnSearchText:
息抜きさえできれば
こちらも満足だったからね。

engChrName: Uh-huh! Taking part in this game wasn't even a part of our contract.
engSearchText:
Uh-huh! Taking part in this game wasn't even a part
of our contract.
jpnChrName: ……我らは我らでこの地での “本命”に当たらせていただく。
jpnSearchText:
……我らは我らでこの地での
“本命”に当たらせていただく。

engChrName: I was just here to have a bit of fun, and I got my fill of it!
engSearchText:
I was just here to have a bit of fun, and I got my fill
of it!
jpnChrName: そちらは好きに進めるがよかろう。
jpnSearchText: そちらは好きに進めるがよかろう。

engChrName: And now that she has, we shall return to the city and fulfill our contractual duties.
engSearchText:
And now that she has, we shall return to the city and
fulfill our contractual duties.
jpnChrName: ま、そういう事なら遠慮なくだ。
jpnSearchText: ま、そういう事なら遠慮なくだ。

engChrName: You may do as you please.
engSearchText: You may do as you please.
jpnChrName: そうそう、結局今回も “あの君”と戦い損ねちゃったね。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、結局今回も
“あの君”と戦い損ねちゃったね。

engChrName: All right. As long as you're cool with the result.
engSearchText: All right. As long as you're cool with the result.
jpnChrName: でも、残り期間はまだある── 暇だったらどこかで付き合ってよ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、残り期間はまだある──
暇だったらどこかで付き合ってよ。

engChrName: I AM still disappointed that our fight ended before you could pull out that other form of yours. I'd looove to see it sometime.
engSearchText:
I AM still disappointed that our fight ended before
you could pull out that other form of yours. I'd looove
to see it sometime.
jpnChrName: これにて失礼。
jpnSearchText: これにて失礼。

engChrName: Anyway, we're off. If you see us in the city, give us a holler! Don't be a stranger, okay?
engSearchText:
Anyway, we're off. If you see us in the city, give us
a holler! Don't be a stranger, okay?
jpnChrName: な、なんかまだ 足がガクガクしてるんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
な、なんかまだ
足がガクガクしてるんだけど……

engChrName: If you will excuse us.
engSearchText: If you will excuse us.
jpnChrName: チッ、しかも凶手どもの不意打ちを 防いでもらった形になんのか……
jpnSearchText:
チッ、しかも凶手どもの不意打ちを
防いでもらった形になんのか……

engChrName: M-My legs are still shaking...
engSearchText: M-My legs are still shaking...
jpnChrName: 器の大きさと無邪気さと危うさ…… 確かに規格外の娘のようだな。
jpnSearchText:
器の大きさと無邪気さと危うさ……
確かに規格外の娘のようだな。

engChrName: Gah. That whole thing pissed me off. She got to flex AND save our asses from the xiongshou.
engSearchText:
Gah. That whole thing pissed me off. She got to flex
AND save our asses from the xiongshou.
jpnChrName: ルウ家の精鋭ではありませんが、 彼らも準じる強者（つわもの）揃いです。
jpnSearchText:
ルウ家の精鋭ではありませんが、
彼らも準じる強者（つわもの）揃いです。

engChrName: That girl is somethin' else. She hides a great deal of power behind that innocent smile.
engSearchText:
That girl is somethin' else. She hides a great deal of
power behind that innocent smile.
jpnChrName: それをああも容易く圧するとは…… いやはや、言葉もありませんね。
jpnSearchText:
それをああも容易く圧するとは……
いやはや、言葉もありませんね。

engChrName: Those men may not be the elites of the Lu family, but they are well trained and powerful in their own right.
engSearchText:
Those men may not be the elites of the Lu family, but
they are well trained and powerful in their own right.
jpnChrName: んー、もうちょっとで“至境”が 見られたかもしれへんのに残念やわぁ。
jpnSearchText:
んー、もうちょっとで“至境”が
見られたかもしれへんのに残念やわぁ。

engChrName: Yet she defeated each of them with a single swing of her sword. How frightening.
engSearchText:
Yet she defeated each of them with a single swing of
her sword. How frightening.
jpnChrName: ま、アクセスキーは手に入れたし、 強敵も退場、胡乱な連中も炙り出せた。
jpnSearchText:
ま、アクセスキーは手に入れたし、
強敵も退場、胡乱な連中も炙り出せた。

engChrName: If the fight had been allowed to go on, I would have witnessed the heights of swordsmanship. A pity.
engSearchText:
If the fight had been allowed to go on, I would have
witnessed the heights of swordsmanship. A pity.
jpnChrName: 上々だろう──このまま先に進むぞ。
jpnSearchText: 上々だろう──このまま先に進むぞ。

engChrName: In any case, we nabbed ourselves some keycards, and a dangerous team's out of the running. I'd call that a huge win.
engSearchText:
In any case, we nabbed ourselves some keycards, and
a dangerous team's out of the running. I'd call that a
huge win.
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: But we can't rest on our laurels, so let's get movin'.
engSearchText: But we can't rest on our laurels, so let's get movin'.
jpnChrName: よりによってアンタたちか……
jpnSearchText: よりによってアンタたちか……

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!

engChrName: Ah, hell.
engSearchText: Ah, hell.
jpnChrName: クク、そんなに嫌そうな顔するなよ。 これでも今回の依頼主だぜ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、そんなに嫌そうな顔するなよ。
これでも今回の依頼主だぜ？

jpnChrName: ハッ、しかし賑やかなメンツに なったじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、しかし賑やかなメンツに
なったじゃねえか。

engChrName: Aww. Why the dirty look? Do you glare at all of your clients like that? It's a wonder you're still in business.
engSearchText:
Aww. Why the dirty look? Do you glare at all of your
clients like that? It's a wonder you're still in business.
jpnChrName: ヴァルターはんとしては 感慨深いんちゃう？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァルターはんとしては
感慨深いんちゃう？

engChrName: Damn, Arkride. You joined up with them and not us? I'm heartbroken.
engSearchText:
Damn, Arkride. You joined up with them and not us?
I'm heartbroken.
jpnChrName: クク、そうでもねえさ。 ついこの前も“挨拶”したしな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、そうでもねえさ。
ついこの前も“挨拶”したしな。

engChrName: Aww, cheer up, Walter dear. Look, it's your old rival! Aren't you thrilled to see him again after all these years?
engSearchText:
Aww, cheer up, Walter dear. Look, it's your old rival!
Aren't you thrilled to see him again after all
these years?
jpnChrName: （そう言えばこのお二人は……）
jpnSearchText: （そう言えばこのお二人は……）

engChrName: Actually, we ran into each other just the other day.
engSearchText: Actually, we ran into each other just the other day.
jpnChrName: （ああ、兄弟弟子だ。   相当因縁があるようだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、兄弟弟子だ。
相当因縁があるようだが……）

engChrName: (It seems like they have some history.)
engSearchText: (It seems like they have some history.)
jpnChrName: 来てるとは思ってたが、 こうも早く当たるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
来てるとは思ってたが、
こうも早く当たるとはな。

engChrName: (Yeah. They both studied under the same master.)
engSearchText: (Yeah. They both studied under the same master.)
jpnChrName: お互いクジ運が悪かったか、 それとも良かったと言うべきか。
jpnSearchText:
お互いクジ運が悪かったか、
それとも良かったと言うべきか。

engChrName: I figured we'd cross paths in here sooner or later, but I didn't think it'd happen so soon.
engSearchText:
I figured we'd cross paths in here sooner or later, but I
didn't think it'd happen so soon.
jpnChrName: ま、うるせえ妹弟子もいねぇし、 存分にやり合うとしようぜ？
jpnSearchText:
ま、うるせえ妹弟子もいねぇし、
存分にやり合うとしようぜ？

engChrName: Not sure whether to call this a stroke of luck or a bad break.
engSearchText:
Not sure whether to call this a stroke of luck or a
bad break.
jpnChrName: あいにく今回はチーム 《アークライド解決事務所》でな。
jpnSearchText:
あいにく今回はチーム
《アークライド解決事務所》でな。

engChrName: Well, that nosy woman ain't here, so how about we finally have our no-holds-barred match?
engSearchText:
Well, that nosy woman ain't here, so how about we
finally have our no-holds-barred match?
jpnChrName: お前さんたちと違って 勝手にやり始める訳にもいかん。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんたちと違って
勝手にやり始める訳にもいかん。

engChrName: Sorry, but that's up to my pal Arkride. He's the one calling the shots for me and Fie.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but that's up to my pal Arkride. He's the one
calling the shots for me and Fie.
jpnChrName: クク、よく言うぜ。
jpnSearchText: クク、よく言うぜ。

engChrName: So if he says no, then that's that. I know you're the 'my way or the highway' type, but that's not how I roll.
engSearchText:
So if he says no, then that's that. I know you're the
'my way or the highway' type, but that's not how
I roll.
jpnChrName: お気になさらず──こちらは 彼らのおまけのようなものでして。
jpnSearchText:
お気になさらず──こちらは
彼らのおまけのようなものでして。

engChrName: Always got an excuse to wuss out, don't ya?
engSearchText: Always got an excuse to wuss out, don't ya?
jpnChrName: なるほど……噂に違わぬ 錚々たる実力者たちみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……噂に違わぬ
錚々たる実力者たちみたいだね。

engChrName: Heh. I was quite touched that we were his first choice.
engSearchText:
Heh. I was quite touched that we were his
first choice.
jpnChrName: ──ほな挨拶を兼ねて、 まずはサクッと殺り合おか？
jpnSearchText:
──ほな挨拶を兼ねて、
まずはサクッと殺り合おか？

engChrName: I mean, you can't blame him too much. Kurogane and I ARE pretty awesome!
engSearchText:
I mean, you can't blame him too much. Kurogane and
I ARE pretty awesome!
jpnChrName: ってどういう挨拶よ！？
jpnSearchText: ってどういう挨拶よ！？

engChrName: Anyway, I'm in the mood for a little murder spree. Would anyone care to offer themselves up for a quick butchering?
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'm in the mood for a little murder spree.
Would anyone care to offer themselves up for a
quick butchering?
jpnChrName: やっぱり無茶苦茶だなぁ……
jpnSearchText: やっぱり無茶苦茶だなぁ……

engChrName: Who would say yes to that?!
engSearchText: Who would say yes to that?!
jpnChrName: おいおい、忘れたのか？ 依頼する時に言ったじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、忘れたのか？
依頼する時に言ったじゃねえか。

engChrName: Honestly, I would rather avoid a fight, if it's all the same to you.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I would rather avoid a fight, if it's all the
same to you.
jpnChrName: その上で俺たちとカチ合ったら 遠慮なく殺り合ってくれていいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
その上で俺たちとカチ合ったら
遠慮なく殺り合ってくれていいぜ？

engChrName: That's a pity. Seems like you kids forgot what I told you back at your office.
engSearchText:
That's a pity. Seems like you kids forgot what I told
you back at your office.
jpnChrName: そういうのもオジサン、大歓迎だ。
jpnSearchText: そういうのもオジサン、大歓迎だ。

engChrName: Oh, and should you happen to run into us, I'd like you to come at me knives out—and ready to cut me into a million little pieces.
engSearchText:
Oh, and should you happen to run into us, I'd like
you to come at me knives out—and ready to cut me
into a million little pieces.
jpnChrName: クク、話がついてんならちょうどいい。 “ゲーム”の内容にも合ってるしなァ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、話がついてんならちょうどいい。
“ゲーム”の内容にも合ってるしなァ？

engChrName: I'm very much into that sort of thing.
engSearchText: I'm very much into that sort of thing.
jpnChrName: ──ま、とはいえ 無理にやり合う必要もねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、とはいえ
無理にやり合う必要もねぇだろ。

engChrName: Oh, you guys had an agreement like that in place? Guess that means you're obligated to fight me.
engSearchText:
Oh, you guys had an agreement like that in place?
Guess that means you're obligated to fight me.
jpnChrName: ミラをはたいて雇った相手だ、 ここで退場させても面白くねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ミラをはたいて雇った相手だ、
ここで退場させても面白くねぇ。

engChrName: No, no. We won't force them. If they aren't interested, then I'm all for respecting their wishes.
engSearchText:
No, no. We won't force them. If they aren't
interested, then I'm all for respecting their wishes.
jpnChrName: なに……？
jpnSearchText: なに……？

engChrName: Besides, they charged us an arm and a leg for their services, so there's no sense in eliminating them now.
engSearchText:
Besides, they charged us an arm and a leg for their
services, so there's no sense in eliminating them now.
jpnChrName: ラブ＆ピースってな。 ここは平和的に行こうって話さ。
jpnSearchText:
ラブ＆ピースってな。
ここは平和的に行こうって話さ。

engChrName: ...You're really gonna let us go?
engSearchText: ...You're really gonna let us go?
jpnChrName: ……戯言を。 いったい何を考えている？
jpnSearchText:
……戯言を。
いったい何を考えている？

engChrName: Of course. Defeating you here would give me no pleasure, anyway.
engSearchText:
Of course. Defeating you here would give me no
pleasure, anyway.
jpnChrName: 美味いモンは最後まで取っとくタチでね。
jpnSearchText: 美味いモンは最後まで取っとくタチでね。

engChrName: You'll have to excuse me for finding that hard to believe.
engSearchText:
You'll have to excuse me for finding that hard
to believe.
jpnChrName: お互い別の相手でも見繕って、 この場は会わなかったことにしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お互い別の相手でも見繕って、
この場は会わなかったことにしようぜ。

engChrName: I've no reason to lie. I'm simply the kind of man who saves the tastiest treat for last.
engSearchText:
I've no reason to lie. I'm simply the kind of man who
saves the tastiest treat for last.
jpnChrName: どうだね、裏解決屋諸君？
jpnSearchText: どうだね、裏解決屋諸君？

engChrName: Let's just pretend we never saw each other and be on our merry way.
engSearchText:
Let's just pretend we never saw each other and be on
our merry way.
jpnChrName: ……どうしますか、ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ……どうしますか、ヴァンさん？

engChrName: Does that sound fair?
engSearchText: Does that sound fair?
jpnChrName: 交戦を避けられるのであれば またとない提案でしょうが……
jpnSearchText:
交戦を避けられるのであれば
またとない提案でしょうが……

engChrName: Should we take them up on their offer?
engSearchText: Should we take them up on their offer?
jpnChrName: ……ま、確かにそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、確かにそうだな。

engChrName: I believe we should, if only to conserve our energy for the battles ahead.
engSearchText:
I believe we should, if only to conserve our energy for
the battles ahead.
jpnChrName: クク、それじゃあな。 一足先に行かせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、それじゃあな。
一足先に行かせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Fair point.
engSearchText: Fair point.
jpnChrName: 行くぞ、レティ、ヴァルターも。
jpnSearchText: 行くぞ、レティ、ヴァルターも。

engChrName: Good. Glad we're in agreement.
engSearchText: Good. Glad we're in agreement.
jpnChrName: ハ……まあ、いいだろう。
jpnSearchText: ハ……まあ、いいだろう。

engChrName: Let's go, you two. We're leaving.
engSearchText: Let's go, you two. We're leaving.
jpnChrName: あんじょうしぃや、お兄はんたち。
jpnSearchText: あんじょうしぃや、お兄はんたち。

engChrName: Whatever you say.
engSearchText: Whatever you say.
jpnChrName: （……微妙に引っかかりやがる……）
jpnSearchText: （……微妙に引っかかりやがる……）

engChrName: Best of luck, everyone.
engSearchText: Best of luck, everyone.
jpnChrName: （このまま行かせていいのか……？）
jpnSearchText: （このまま行かせていいのか……？）

engChrName: (Something's not right here...)
engSearchText: (Something's not right here...)
jpnChrName: せめて《千の破戒者》以外の、裏の世界での 彼の“もう一つの”異名を教えてあげる。
jpnSearchText:
せめて《千の破戒者》以外の、裏の世界での
彼の“もう一つの”異名を教えてあげる。

engChrName: (Is this really the right call? Should I let them go?)
engSearchText: (Is this really the right call? Should I let them go?)
jpnChrName: 『犯罪の天才』──そんな風に呼ばれてるわ。
jpnSearchText: <C8>『犯罪の天才』──そんな風に呼ばれてるわ。

engChrName: But I will share one little known fact: the Thousand Oathbreaker isn't his only title.
engSearchText:
But I will share one little known fact: the Thousand
Oathbreaker isn't his only title.
jpnChrName: ──待ちな。
jpnSearchText: ──待ちな。

engChrName: He's also known as the Savant Lawbreaker.
engSearchText: He's also known as the Savant Lawbreaker.
jpnChrName: まだ何かあんのか？
jpnSearchText: まだ何かあんのか？

engChrName: ...Wait. I got a question for you.
engSearchText: ...Wait. I got a question for you.
jpnChrName: とりあえず他の連中を下してから どうするか話し合うべきじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず他の連中を下してから
どうするか話し合うべきじゃねえか？

engChrName: Ugh. Really, now?
engSearchText: Ugh. Really, now?
jpnChrName: それはいい…… ──だがアンタ、何を企んでる？
jpnSearchText:
それはいい……
──だがアンタ、何を企んでる？

engChrName: Can't it wait till after we take out the other teams?
engSearchText: Can't it wait till after we take out the other teams?
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん？

engChrName: No, it can't. Tell me, Ellroy. Are you up to something?
engSearchText:
No, it can't. Tell me, Ellroy. Are you up
to something?
jpnChrName: ハハ、つまらねぇ質問だな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、つまらねぇ質問だな。

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: これでもオジサン、働き者でなぁ。 企んでねぇ時間の方が短いくらいだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
これでもオジサン、働き者でなぁ。
企んでねぇ時間の方が短いくらいだぜ。

engChrName: Haha. Now that's a silly question.
engSearchText: Haha. Now that's a silly question.
jpnChrName: なら質問を変えるが……
jpnSearchText: なら質問を変えるが……

engChrName: Allow me to let you in on a little secret: I'm always up to something.
engSearchText:
Allow me to let you in on a little secret: I'm always up
to something.
jpnChrName: 俺たちとの交戦を避ける 本当の理由はなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
俺たちとの交戦を避ける
本当の理由はなんだ？

engChrName: Okay, let me rephrase.
engSearchText: Okay, let me rephrase.
jpnChrName: クク……レンあたりの忠告ってトコか？
jpnSearchText: クク……レンあたりの忠告ってトコか？

engChrName: What's your real reason for avoiding a fight?
engSearchText: What's your real reason for avoiding a fight?
jpnChrName: あいつがガキの頃、博士よりは 優しく接してやったつもりなんだがなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あいつがガキの頃、博士よりは
優しく接してやったつもりなんだがなぁ。

engChrName: Oh? Did Renne give you a word of warning about me, perhaps?
engSearchText:
Oh? Did Renne give you a word of warning about
me, perhaps?
jpnChrName: ガキだから、だろう。 あの天稟（てんぴん）に加えて本質を見抜く年頃だ。
jpnSearchText:
ガキだから、だろう。
あの天稟（てんぴん）に加えて本質を見抜く年頃だ。

engChrName: And here I was thinking she took a liking to me. Unlike the professor, I was reasonably nice to her when she was a child.
engSearchText:
And here I was thinking she took a liking to me.
Unlike the professor, I was reasonably nice to her
when she was a child.
jpnChrName: アンタ──この地下遺構自体に 何か仕掛けようとしてるんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
アンタ──この地下遺構自体に
何か仕掛けようとしてるんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: If you thought you could fool Renne with fake smiles and honeyed words, then you clearly didn't know her.
engSearchText:
If you thought you could fool Renne with fake smiles
and honeyed words, then you clearly didn't know her.
jpnSearchText: …………………………

engChrName: And you can't fool me, either. You're setting up some kinda trap in this place, aren't you?
engSearchText:
And you can't fool me, either. You're setting up some
kinda trap in this place, aren't you?
jpnChrName: な、何か、ですか……？
jpnSearchText: な、何か、ですか……？

jpnChrName: ＦＩＯが索敵しながら進んでるけど 上位属性以外に目立った異常は……
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯが索敵しながら進んでるけど
上位属性以外に目立った異常は……

engChrName: Wait, really?
engSearchText: Wait, really?
jpnChrName: 具体的な方法までは分からねぇ。
jpnSearchText: 具体的な方法までは分からねぇ。

engChrName: The only abnormality FIO picked up was the presence of the higher elements.
engSearchText:
The only abnormality FIO picked up was the
presence of the higher elements.
jpnChrName: だが、アンタとこれまで敵対した組織は どこも少なからず“自滅”してるそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
だが、アンタとこれまで敵対した組織は
どこも少なからず“自滅”してるそうだな？

engChrName: I'm not exactly sure what stunt you're pullin' here...
engSearchText: I'm not exactly sure what stunt you're pullin' here...
jpnChrName: 不幸な事故、何らかの偶然、 あるいは突発的な“同士討ち”──
jpnSearchText:
不幸な事故、何らかの偶然、
あるいは突発的な“同士討ち”──

engChrName: ...but I'm on to you. We know that most groups that've opposed you got silenced—permanently.
engSearchText:
...but I'm on to you. We know that most groups
that've opposed you got silenced—permanently.
jpnChrName: どれも偶然か、原因不明の変死として 当局も片付けるしかなかったようだが……
jpnSearchText:
どれも偶然か、原因不明の変死として
当局も片付けるしかなかったようだが……

engChrName: Their cases were labeled as 'accidents,' 'resulting from internal conflict,' and other things of that nature.
engSearchText:
Their cases were labeled as 'accidents,' 'resulting from
internal conflict,' and other things of that nature.
jpnChrName: 恐らくは未発見の細菌やウイルス── もしくは検出不能な“毒物”あたりか？
jpnSearchText:
恐らくは未発見の細菌やウイルス──
もしくは検出不能な“毒物”あたりか？

engChrName: The authorities wrote off every death in those cases as 'cause unknown' or coincidental.
engSearchText:
The authorities wrote off every death in those cases as
'cause unknown' or coincidental.

engChrName: Though I'm thinkin' you're using some kind of unknown bacteria or virus—or an untraceable poison.
engSearchText:
Though I'm thinkin' you're using some kind of
unknown bacteria or virus—or an untraceable poison.
jpnChrName: ……あらまあ…………
jpnSearchText: ……あらまあ…………

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnSearchText: ……………………………

engChrName: Oh, my.
engSearchText: Oh, my.
jpnChrName: さ、細菌にウイルス…… もしくは毒物ですって……！？
jpnSearchText:
さ、細菌にウイルス……
もしくは毒物ですって……！？

jpnChrName: ……ＢＣ兵器………
jpnSearchText: ……ＢＣ兵器………

engChrName: He's using WHAT?!
engSearchText: He's using WHAT?!
jpnChrName: 国際的にも既に禁止されている……
jpnSearchText: 国際的にも既に禁止されている……

engChrName: So he possesses biological and chemical weapons...
engSearchText: So he possesses biological and chemical weapons...
jpnChrName: クク……オジサン驚いちゃったぜ。 どうやらマジで鼻が利くようじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
クク……オジサン驚いちゃったぜ。
どうやらマジで鼻が利くようじゃねえか？

engChrName: Those are illegal under international law.
engSearchText: Those are illegal under international law.
jpnChrName: ──ああ、ちなみに基本は“Ｃ”だ。 “Ｂ”もたまに使うが扱いが面倒でなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
──ああ、ちなみに基本は“Ｃ”だ。
“Ｂ”もたまに使うが扱いが面倒でなぁ。

engChrName: Heheh. That nose of yours really is something, isn't it?
engSearchText:
Heheh. That nose of yours really is something,
isn't it?

engChrName: I do indeed use both, but I prefer the chemical variety. Biological weapons are harder to handle.
engSearchText:
I do indeed use both, but I prefer the
chemical variety. Biological weapons are harder
to handle.

jpnChrName: だから言っただろう、 マジモンの最悪なんだよ、旦那は。
jpnSearchText:
だから言っただろう、
マジモンの最悪なんだよ、旦那は。

jpnChrName: やるじゃねえかアークライド。 首の皮一枚、何とか繋がったな？
jpnSearchText:
やるじゃねえかアークライド。
首の皮一枚、何とか繋がったな？

engChrName: Now you know why I said there isn't a bigger monster in all of Zemuria than him.
engSearchText:
Now you know why I said there isn't a bigger monster
in all of Zemuria than him.
jpnChrName: うふふ、気付いた時には全身が弛緩して 女神行きにならへんでよかったねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、気付いた時には全身が弛緩して
女神行きにならへんでよかったねぇ。

engChrName: Nice detective work, Arkride. Looks like you might walk outta this alive after all.
engSearchText:
Nice detective work, Arkride. Looks like you might
walk outta this alive after all.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… 参加者全員ってことか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
参加者全員ってことか。

engChrName: Now you won't have to die in the most painful way imaginable. Death by asphyxiation is a dreadful way to go.
engSearchText:
Now you won't have to die in the most painful
way imaginable. Death by asphyxiation is a dreadful
way to go.
jpnChrName: 《破戒》…… 良くない噂ばかり聞いたが。
jpnSearchText:
《破戒》……
良くない噂ばかり聞いたが。

engChrName: So your plan is to win the game by murdering all the players at once.
engSearchText:
So your plan is to win the game by murdering all the
players at once.
jpnChrName: 一気に参加者全員を……
jpnSearchText: 一気に参加者全員を……

engChrName: The rumors don't do you justice. You're far more evil than they make you out to be.
engSearchText:
The rumors don't do you justice. You're far more evil
than they make you out to be.
jpnChrName: さすがは“犯罪の天才”、 やることの次元が違いますねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
さすがは“犯罪の天才”、
やることの次元が違いますねぇ。

engChrName: So you were planning to eliminate all of the players in one move...
engSearchText:
So you were planning to eliminate all of the players in
one move...
jpnChrName: ふむ……《朧月流》でも そんな戦法があったっけ？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……《朧月流》でも
そんな戦法があったっけ？

engChrName: You've quite the imagination. You may be a more cunning schemer than I.
engSearchText:
You've quite the imagination. You may be a more
cunning schemer than I.
jpnChrName: ええ──この広範囲となると 簡単にはいきませんが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ──この広範囲となると
簡単にはいきませんが……

engChrName: Hmm... Isn't there a technique in the Rougetsu school that can do something similar?
engSearchText:
Hmm... Isn't there a technique in the Rougetsu
school that can do something similar?
jpnChrName: 一応、連中の提示した“ルール”には 抵触していないはずだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
一応、連中の提示した“ルール”には
抵触していないはずだぜ？

engChrName: There is. Though it would not be easy to use on this large of a scale.
engSearchText:
There is. Though it would not be easy to use on this
large of a scale.
jpnChrName: ま、“破戒”としては 破っちまうのもアリだとは思うが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、“破戒”としては
破っちまうのもアリだとは思うが……

engChrName: My plan doesn't break any of the rules they laid out.
engSearchText: My plan doesn't break any of the rules they laid out.
jpnChrName: ──連中込みで、手っ取り早くゲームを 終わらせるいい方法だとは思わねえか？
jpnSearchText:
──連中込みで、手っ取り早くゲームを
終わらせるいい方法だとは思わねえか？

engChrName: Though that was never a concern of mine. After all, I am the Oathbreaker. Breaking oaths and rules is what I do.
engSearchText:
Though that was never a concern of mine. After all, I
am the Oathbreaker. Breaking oaths and rules is what
I do.
jpnChrName: 見抜いた特典としてお前らは助かる── ４ｓｐｇをやりながら朗報を待ちゃあいい。
jpnSearchText:
見抜いた特典としてお前らは助かる──
４ｓｐｇをやりながら朗報を待ちゃあいい。

engChrName: And you can't deny it's the most effective way to win the game. I'm taking out all the players—and the organizers—in one fell swoop.
engSearchText:
And you can't deny it's the most effective way to win
the game. I'm taking out all the players—and the
organizers—in one fell swoop.
jpnChrName: どうだ──お互い悪くない落とし所だろう？
jpnSearchText: どうだ──お互い悪くない落とし所だろう？

engChrName: I'll spare you alone. That's your reward for figuring out my plan. You can run along back to the city and take care of requests while we wrap this up.
engSearchText:
I'll spare you alone. That's your reward for figuring
out my plan. You can run along back to the city and
take care of requests while we wrap this up.
jpnChrName: ざけんじゃねえ……！ アルマータと同じじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText:
ざけんじゃねえ……！
アルマータと同じじゃねえか！

engChrName: Not a bad deal, huh?
engSearchText: Not a bad deal, huh?
jpnChrName: 戦場でも“外道”のやり方…… そんな虐殺を許すわけにはいきません！
jpnSearchText:
戦場でも“外道”のやり方……
そんな虐殺を許すわけにはいきません！

engChrName: 'Not a bad deal,' my ass! You're no better than Almata!
engSearchText:
'Not a bad deal,' my ass! You're no better
than Almata!
jpnChrName: ま、市民を巻き込まないだけ 連中よりはマシかもしれねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、市民を巻き込まないだけ
連中よりはマシかもしれねぇが……

engChrName: There are rules that have to be followed—even during war. We won't let you get away with this!
engSearchText:
There are rules that have to be followed—even
during war. We won't let you get away with this!
jpnChrName: ルールに抵触しなけりゃやってたな？
jpnSearchText: ルールに抵触しなけりゃやってたな？

engChrName: Well, at least you're not involvin' innocent civilians...
engSearchText: Well, at least you're not involvin' innocent civilians...
jpnChrName: ハハ、そりゃ状況次第だろ。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、そりゃ状況次第だろ。

engChrName: ...is what I'd like to say, but you and I both know that the rules are the only reason why you're leaving them out of this.
engSearchText:
...is what I'd like to say, but you and I both know that
the rules are the only reason why you're leaving them
out of this.
jpnChrName: だったらアンタらには ここで脱落（リタイア）してもらう。
jpnSearchText:
だったらアンタらには
ここで脱落（リタイア）してもらう。

engChrName: Heh. I make decisions like that on a case-by-case basis.
engSearchText:
Heh. I make decisions like that on a
case-by-case basis.
jpnChrName: ──ルール上、参加者にも 手出しできなくなるだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
──ルール上、参加者にも
手出しできなくなるだろうからな。

engChrName: And I'm makin' the executive decision to smash your face in.
engSearchText:
And I'm makin' the executive decision to smash your
face in.
jpnChrName: クク、道理だな。
jpnSearchText: クク、道理だな。

engChrName: As soon as you're out of the game, you can't interfere with any of the players, which means your plan will be dead in the water.
engSearchText:
As soon as you're out of the game, you can't interfere
with any of the players, which means your plan will be
dead in the water.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ予定通り── “殺し合い”と洒落込もうか。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあ予定通り──
“殺し合い”と洒落込もうか。

engChrName: Heheh. So you're going to stand in my way?
engSearchText: Heheh. So you're going to stand in my way?
jpnChrName: ま、こっちの方が ウチはやっぱり好みかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、こっちの方が
ウチはやっぱり好みかなぁ。

engChrName: Back to Plan A, then. We're going to murder you all. I look forward to seeing you writhe in agony.
engSearchText:
Back to Plan A, then. We're going to murder you all.
I look forward to seeing you writhe in agony.
jpnChrName: 好みの問題じゃねえだろ…… ま、本気でやり合えるなら文句はねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
好みの問題じゃねえだろ……
ま、本気でやり合えるなら文句はねぇ。

engChrName: Splendid! I find this plan to be much more to my tastes.
engSearchText:
Splendid! I find this plan to be much more to
my tastes.
jpnChrName: やるからには容赦なく喰らってやるぜ……？
jpnSearchText: やるからには容赦なく喰らってやるぜ……？

engChrName: Your tastes are wack as hell, but for once, you and I are on the same page. Nothin' excites me more than tradin' blows with some strong opponents.
engSearchText:
Your tastes are wack as hell, but for once, you and I
are on the same page. Nothin' excites me more than
tradin' blows with some strong opponents.
jpnChrName: くっ…… なんてプレッシャーなの……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ……
なんてプレッシャーなの……！

engChrName: Hope you kids can give me a run for my money, 'cause you aren't weaselin' your way outta this one!
engSearchText:
Hope you kids can give me a run for my money,
'cause you aren't weaselin' your way outta this one!
jpnChrName: ですが…… 絶対に負けられません……！
jpnSearchText:
ですが……
絶対に負けられません……！

engChrName: Ugh... These guys are gonna be tough!
engSearchText: Ugh... These guys are gonna be tough!
jpnChrName: ああ──毒、いや化学兵器の 使用なんて認められない……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ──毒、いや化学兵器の
使用なんて認められない……！

engChrName: I know, but we can't afford to lose. We have to stop them!
engSearchText:
I know, but we can't afford to lose. We have to
stop them!
jpnChrName: 最初から全開で行く── 師父もどうか頼みます！
jpnSearchText:
最初から全開で行く──
師父もどうか頼みます！

engChrName: Right. I won't allow them to make use of chemical weapons. Many lives are on the line!
engSearchText:
Right. I won't allow them to make use of
chemical weapons. Many lives are on the line!
jpnChrName: うむ、任せるがいい！
jpnSearchText: うむ、任せるがいい！

engChrName: And ours are, too, so don't hold back! We'll be counting on you, Master!
engSearchText:
And ours are, too, so don't hold back! We'll be
counting on you, Master!
jpnChrName: へえ……？
jpnSearchText: へえ……？

engChrName: You will have my full support!
engSearchText: You will have my full support!
jpnChrName: はあはあ、この化物どもが……！
jpnSearchText: はあはあ、この化物どもが……！

engChrName: Oho.
engSearchText: Oho.
jpnChrName: っ…… しかもあの人がまだ控えて……！
jpnSearchText:
っ……
しかもあの人がまだ控えて……！

engChrName: *pant* Those guys are...inhuman.
engSearchText: *pant* Those guys are...inhuman.
jpnChrName: まだだ──油断するな！
jpnSearchText: まだだ──油断するな！

engChrName: At least we took two of them down.
engSearchText: At least we took two of them down.
jpnChrName: どうか気をつけて── まだ終わっていません！
jpnSearchText:
どうか気をつけて──
まだ終わっていません！

engChrName: I'm not so sure about that.
engSearchText: I'm not so sure about that.
jpnChrName: いやいや── まだこれからじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
いやいや──
まだこれからじゃない？

engChrName: I wouldn't be so sure of that.
engSearchText: I wouldn't be so sure of that.
jpnChrName: クク……味見だけのつもりだったが いよいよ我慢できなくなってきたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク……味見だけのつもりだったが
いよいよ我慢できなくなってきたぜ。

engChrName: You sure about that?
engSearchText: You sure about that?
jpnChrName: うふふ、旦さんを止めてもいいさかい、 もうちょっとだけ付き合ってもらおかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、旦さんを止めてもいいさかい、
もうちょっとだけ付き合ってもらおかなぁ？

engChrName: Heh. I thought I'd be fine with just having a taste, but I was dead wrong. I want the full course.
engSearchText:
Heh. I thought I'd be fine with just having a taste,
but I was dead wrong. I want the full course.
jpnChrName: ウソ、でしょ……
jpnSearchText: ウソ、でしょ……

engChrName: We're happy to aid you in stopping his scheme if you play with us for just a while longer.
engSearchText:
We're happy to aid you in stopping his scheme if you
play with us for just a while longer.
jpnChrName: こ、こちらにもう余裕は……
jpnSearchText: こ、こちらにもう余裕は……

engChrName: You've got to be kidding me...
engSearchText: You've got to be kidding me...
jpnSearchText: …………クク………………

engChrName: I-I can barely move a muscle...
engSearchText: I-I can barely move a muscle...
jpnChrName: 参戦か──だがやらせん。
jpnSearchText: 参戦か──だがやらせん。

engChrName: ...Heh.
engSearchText: ...Heh.
jpnChrName: （こうなったらアレを使ってでも──）
jpnSearchText: （こうなったらアレを使ってでも──）

engChrName: Finally ready to fight, are you? I won't let you lay a finger on them!
engSearchText:
Finally ready to fight, are you? I won't let you lay a
finger on them!
jpnChrName: お疲れさん── オジサンたちの負けだ。
jpnSearchText:
お疲れさん──
オジサンたちの負けだ。

engChrName: (I was hoping I wouldn't have to transform yet, but it looks like I don't have a choice...)
engSearchText:
(I was hoping I wouldn't have to transform yet, but it
looks like I don't have a choice...)
jpnChrName: アクセスキーを３つ手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アクセスキーを３つ手に入れた。

engChrName: Well done. You beat us fair and square.
engSearchText: Well done. You beat us fair and square.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーを４つ手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アクセスキーを４つ手に入れた。

engChrName: Received three keycards.
engSearchText: Received three keycards.
jpnChrName: ！？　こいつは──
jpnSearchText: ！？　こいつは──

engChrName: Received four keycards.
engSearchText: Received four keycards.
jpnChrName: チーム　身喰らう蛇　　脱落
jpnSearchText: チーム　身喰らう蛇　　脱落

engChrName: Wait, what?!
engSearchText: Wait, what?!

engChrName: Team Ouroboros has been eliminated.
engSearchText: Team Ouroboros has been eliminated.

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: ──ハアアアアアアアッ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>──ハアアアアアアアッ！？

engChrName: I don't understand...
engSearchText: I don't understand...
jpnChrName: マジかこのオッサン……
jpnSearchText: マジかこのオッサン……

engChrName: WHAT?! You're forfeiting?!
engSearchText: WHAT?! You're forfeiting?!
jpnChrName: アハハ、旦さんの 気まぐれにも困ったものやねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、旦さんの
気まぐれにも困ったものやねぇ。

engChrName: Are you for real?
engSearchText: Are you for real?
jpnChrName: ……どういうつもりだ？
jpnSearchText: ……どういうつもりだ？

engChrName: Heehee. I should have expected as much. He is nothing if not capricious.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I should have expected as much. He is
nothing if not capricious.
jpnChrName: ま、言っちまえば萎えたってとこだ。
jpnSearchText: ま、言っちまえば萎えたってとこだ。

engChrName: ...This is a trick, ain't it? What're you plotting this time?
engSearchText:
...This is a trick, ain't it? What're you plotting
this time?
jpnChrName: そこの連中も含めてだと皆殺しは ちと難しそうだし、他にもバレそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
そこの連中も含めてだと皆殺しは
ちと難しそうだし、他にもバレそうだ。

engChrName: Nothing. I'm just bored.
engSearchText: Nothing. I'm just bored.
jpnChrName: そうなりゃこぞって止めてきそうだし、 面倒そうだから手を引くぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そうなりゃこぞって止めてきそうだし、
面倒そうだから手を引くぜ。

engChrName: I doubt we could kill all of you, and if word of my plan got out, everyone and their mother would come out to try and stop it.
engSearchText:
I doubt we could kill all of you, and if word of my
plan got out, everyone and their mother would come
out to try and stop it.
jpnChrName: えと、だったら 先ほどの戦いはどうして……？
jpnSearchText:
えと、だったら
先ほどの戦いはどうして……？

engChrName: If I can't have my fun, I'd rather bail.
engSearchText: If I can't have my fun, I'd rather bail.
jpnChrName: クク、その方が 面白いからに決まってるだろ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、その方が
面白いからに決まってるだろ？

engChrName: Then why did you pick a fight with us in the first place?
engSearchText:
Then why did you pick a fight with us in the
first place?
jpnChrName: チッ、旦那の仕掛けはどうでもいいが もう手出しできなくなっちまったわけか。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、旦那の仕掛けはどうでもいいが
もう手出しできなくなっちまったわけか。

engChrName: Because sitting back and watching you kids go at it sounded like a good time.
engSearchText:
Because sitting back and watching you kids go at it
sounded like a good time.
jpnChrName: ……じゃあな、俺は先に上がるぜ。 不完全燃焼だしそこらの魔獣でも狩るか。
jpnSearchText:
……じゃあな、俺は先に上がるぜ。
不完全燃焼だしそこらの魔獣でも狩るか。

engChrName: I never wanted to go along with his plan in the first place, and now I can't even have the joy of fighting you... This sucks.
engSearchText:
I never wanted to go along with his plan in the first
place, and now I can't even have the joy of
fighting you... This sucks.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……あいつもあいつで 苦労はしてるみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……あいつもあいつで
苦労はしてるみたいだな。

engChrName: I need to go hit something. Maybe I'll beat up some monsters or something. Catch you later.
engSearchText:
I need to go hit something. Maybe I'll beat up some
monsters or something. Catch you later.
jpnChrName: フフ、ウチらもそろそろ失礼しよか。 ほなまたな～。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ウチらもそろそろ失礼しよか。
ほなまたな～。

engChrName: Never thought I'd say this, but I kinda feel bad for him.
engSearchText:
Never thought I'd say this, but I kinda feel bad
for him.
jpnChrName: ま、俺らに代わって進むんだ。 報酬分以上の働きを期待してるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺らに代わって進むんだ。
報酬分以上の働きを期待してるぜ。

engChrName: I suppose we should get going as well. Toodeloo!
engSearchText: I suppose we should get going as well. Toodeloo!
jpnChrName: ──最後の最後まで どうか退屈させないでくれよ……？
jpnSearchText:
──最後の最後まで
どうか退屈させないでくれよ……？

engChrName: We're counting on you to bring down the house. You better earn that mira we're paying you.
engSearchText:
We're counting on you to bring down the house.
You better earn that mira we're paying you.
jpnChrName: 執行者のお二人も脅威でしたが ……使徒の方はまた別格でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
執行者のお二人も脅威でしたが
……使徒の方はまた別格でしたね。

engChrName: Make this game exciting until the very end.
engSearchText: Make this game exciting until the very end.
jpnChrName: ええ……流石あの《庭園》を 立ち上げさせた黒幕なだけはあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……流石あの《庭園》を
立ち上げさせた黒幕なだけはあるわ。

engChrName: The two Enforcers were fearsome foes all on their own, but he was on another level entirely.
engSearchText:
The two Enforcers were fearsome foes all on their
own, but he was on another level entirely.
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさんが見抜いてなかったと 考えるとゾッとします。
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァンさんが見抜いてなかったと
考えるとゾッとします。

engChrName: Yeah. We would've been royally screwed if he joined in on that fight.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We would've been royally screwed if he joined
in on that fight.
jpnChrName: ま、ギリギリだったが── 何とか阻止してキーも手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ギリギリだったが──
何とか阻止してキーも手に入れた。

engChrName: And we might've been in even more trouble if you didn't see through his scheme.
engSearchText:
And we might've been in even more trouble if you
didn't see through his scheme.
jpnChrName: このまま先に進むぞ。
jpnSearchText: このまま先に進むぞ。

engChrName: I'm glad we prevented the worst-case scenario.
engSearchText: I'm glad we prevented the worst-case scenario.
jpnChrName: （昨日回れなかった分も含めて   これで一通りは回れたな。）
jpnSearchText:
（昨日回れなかった分も含めて
これで一通りは回れたな。）

engChrName: Anyway, we persevered and came out the other end with some keycards. Let's keep this up, you guys.
engSearchText:
Anyway, we persevered and came out the other end
with some keycards. Let's keep this up, you guys.
jpnChrName: （第二フェーズの開始は正午──   頃合いを見て地下に移動するか。）
jpnSearchText:
（第二フェーズの開始は正午──
頃合いを見て地下に移動するか。）

engChrName: (We've seen all the main areas of the city now, including the ones we couldn't visit yesterday.)
engSearchText:
(We've seen all the main areas of the city now,
including the ones we couldn't visit yesterday.)
jpnChrName: メインのストーリーを進める場合、移動メニューから 『地下で中層攻略開始を待つ』を選択してください。
jpnSearchText:
メインのストーリーを進める場合、移動メニューから
『地下で中層攻略開始を待つ』を選択してください。

engChrName: (Second round starts at noon. Maybe now's a good time to head underground.)
engSearchText:
(Second round starts at noon. Maybe now's a good
time to head underground.)
jpnChrName: 『地下で中層攻略開始を待つ』を進むと、 メインのストーリーが進行します。
jpnSearchText:
『地下で中層攻略開始を待つ』を進むと、
メインのストーリーが進行します。

engChrName: To advance the main story, select 'Wait in Cent. Underground Area' from the Travel menu.
engSearchText:
To advance the main story, select 'Wait in
Cent. Underground Area' from the Travel menu.
jpnChrName: 一部のクエスト・サブイベントが 消滅するので注意して下さい。
jpnSearchText:
一部のクエスト・サブイベントが
消滅するので注意して下さい。

engChrName: Once you choose to wait in the central underground area, the main story will advance.
engSearchText:
Once you choose to wait in the central underground
area, the main story will advance.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは協力者たちと 再び合流して地下に向かい……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは協力者たちと
再び合流して地下に向かい……

engChrName: As a result, all unfinished quests and unseen sub-events will disappear.
engSearchText:
As a result, all unfinished quests and unseen
sub-events will disappear.
jpnChrName: 指定された第２フェーズの開始時刻まで 昨日の終点で待機するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
指定された第２フェーズの開始時刻まで
昨日の終点で待機するのだった。

engChrName: Van's group met up with their collaborators, and together, they made their way into the underground.
engSearchText:
Van's group met up with their collaborators, and
together, they made their way into the underground.
jpnChrName: 仲間と合流して王宮跡に向かうと、 メインのストーリーが進行します。
jpnSearchText:
仲間と合流して王宮跡に向かうと、
メインのストーリーが進行します。

engChrName: They arrived in the area where the first round concluded and waited for the second one to start.
engSearchText:
They arrived in the area where the first round
concluded and waited for the second one to start.
jpnChrName: クエスト・サブイベントなどが 全て消滅するので注意して下さい。
jpnSearchText:
クエスト・サブイベントなどが
全て消滅するので注意して下さい。

engChrName: Once you choose to go to Vashtar Palace, the main story will advance.
engSearchText:
Once you choose to go to Vashtar Palace, the main
story will advance.

engChrName: As a result, all unfinished quests and unseen sub-events will disappear.
engSearchText:
As a result, all unfinished quests and unseen
sub-events will disappear.
jpnChrName: ……？ ヴァンさん、どうしたんですか？
jpnSearchText:
……？
ヴァンさん、どうしたんですか？

jpnChrName: ああ……ちょっとな。
jpnSearchText: ああ……ちょっとな。

engChrName: You okay, Van?
engSearchText: You okay, Van?
jpnChrName: えっと、ひょっとして……
jpnSearchText: えっと、ひょっとして……

engChrName: Huh? Oh, yeah, I'm fine. Just thinkin'.
engSearchText: Huh? Oh, yeah, I'm fine. Just thinkin'.
jpnChrName: 当局から逃れたアルマータの残党や 半グレどもの話か？
jpnSearchText:
当局から逃れたアルマータの残党や
半グレどもの話か？

engChrName: Is there something bothering you?
engSearchText: Is there something bothering you?
jpnChrName: まあ、な。
jpnSearchText: まあ、な。

engChrName: Guessing the stories about the gangsters and Almata remnants are on your mind.
engSearchText:
Guessing the stories about the gangsters and Almata
remnants are on your mind.
jpnChrName: ベルモッティにジャック、 室長殿まで口にしてるとなると……
jpnSearchText:
ベルモッティにジャック、
室長殿まで口にしてるとなると……

engChrName: Yeah.
engSearchText: Yeah.
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんが残した一件でも 気になる情報があったね。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんが残した一件でも
気になる情報があったね。

engChrName: If Bermotti, Jack, and Kilika were all talkin' about them, then it's definitely worth mulling over.
engSearchText:
If Bermotti, Jack, and Kilika were all talkin' about
them, then it's definitely worth mulling over.
jpnChrName: ディンゴ様が残した一件でも 気になる情報がありましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴ様が残した一件でも
気になる情報がありましたね。

engChrName: We heard something interesting while following up on Dingo's case as well.
engSearchText:
We heard something interesting while following up
on Dingo's case as well.
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんが残した一件でも 気になる情報があったわね。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんが残した一件でも
気になる情報があったわね。

engChrName: We heard something interesting while following up on Mr. Brad's case as well.
engSearchText:
We heard something interesting while following up
on Mr. Brad's case as well.
jpnChrName: ふむ……確かタイレル地区での 目撃情報があるという話だったか。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……確かタイレル地区での
目撃情報があるという話だったか。

engChrName: We heard something interesting while following up on Dingo's case, too.
engSearchText:
We heard something interesting while following up
on Dingo's case, too.
jpnChrName: えっと……確かタイレル地区での 目撃情報があるって話だったっけ？
jpnSearchText:
えっと……確かタイレル地区での
目撃情報があるって話だったっけ？

engChrName: You're referring to the account of them being sighted in the Tyrell District, correct?
engSearchText:
You're referring to the account of them being sighted
in the Tyrell District, correct?
jpnChrName: たしか、タイレル地区での 目撃情報があるという話でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
たしか、タイレル地区での
目撃情報があるという話でしたか。

engChrName: You're talking about how they were spotted in the Tyrell District, right?
engSearchText:
You're talking about how they were spotted in the
Tyrell District, right?
jpnChrName: い、言われてみると ちょっと気になってきますね。
jpnSearchText:
い、言われてみると
ちょっと気になってきますね。

engChrName: You are referring to the account of them being sighted in the Tyrell District, yes?
engSearchText:
You are referring to the account of them being
sighted in the Tyrell District, yes?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ念のためタイレル地区を？
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ念のためタイレル地区を？

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Now that you mention it, that IS kinda worrying.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Now that you mention it, that IS
kinda worrying.
jpnChrName: ま、さっきも立ち寄ったが 改めて回ってもいいかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、さっきも立ち寄ったが
改めて回ってもいいかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: Maybe we should drop by Tyrell. Just in case, y'know?
engSearchText: Maybe we should drop by Tyrell. Just in case, y'know?
jpnChrName: ま、今日はまだ立ち寄ってねぇし 少し回ってもいいかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、今日はまだ立ち寄ってねぇし
少し回ってもいいかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: Not a bad idea. Can't hurt to check the area out again.
engSearchText:
Not a bad idea. Can't hurt to check the area
out again.
jpnChrName: つっても人通りの多い場所は 外しても構わないだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
つっても人通りの多い場所は
外しても構わないだろうが。

engChrName: Good idea. We need to check that area out anyway.
engSearchText: Good idea. We need to check that area out anyway.
jpnChrName: それと黒月系列の酒家の近くも 除外してもいいかもしれねーな。
jpnSearchText:
それと黒月系列の酒家の近くも
除外してもいいかもしれねーな。

engChrName: We can probably rule out the busier parts of the district.
engSearchText:
We can probably rule out the busier parts of
the district.
jpnChrName: タイレル地区のとある地点に 必須調査ポイントが追加されました。
jpnSearchText:
タイレル地区のとある地点に
必須調査ポイントが追加されました。

engChrName: Same for the area near the restaurant that's run by Heiyue.
engSearchText:
Same for the area near the restaurant that's run
by Heiyue.
jpnChrName: （一通り回れるだけ回ったが……   濃いメンツ以外に異常は無さそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（一通り回れるだけ回ったが……
濃いメンツ以外に異常は無さそうだな。）

engChrName: An additional mandatory investigation point has been added in the Tyrell District.
engSearchText:
An additional mandatory investigation point has been
added in the Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: （──ただまあ一応、念のため。）
jpnSearchText: （──ただまあ一応、念のため。）

engChrName: (Okay, we've combed the city pretty thoroughly, and the only thing outta place was the number of weirdos around.)
engSearchText:
(Okay, we've combed the city pretty thoroughly, and
the only thing outta place was the number of
weirdos around.)
jpnChrName: （４ｓｐｇや野暮用に区切りがついたら   車でそれ以外のエリアも巡ってみるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（４ｓｐｇや野暮用に区切りがついたら
車でそれ以外のエリアも巡ってみるか。）

engChrName: (Can't be too careful, I guess. Might be worth doin' another sweep of the city in the car just to be safe.)
engSearchText:
(Can't be too careful, I guess. Might be worth doin'
another sweep of the city in the car just to be safe.)
jpnChrName: メインストーリーを進める場合、移動メニューの旧市街にある 「各エリアの巡回を終了する」を選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
メインストーリーを進める場合、移動メニューの旧市街にある
「各エリアの巡回を終了する」を選んでください。

engChrName: (I should do that once I've taken care of all the 4SPGs and the other stuff on our plate.)
engSearchText:
(I should do that once I've taken care of all the
4SPGs and the other stuff on our plate.)
jpnChrName: （どうする──いったん区切りにして   車でそれ以外のエリアも巡ってみるか？）
jpnSearchText:
（どうする──いったん区切りにして
車でそれ以外のエリアも巡ってみるか？）

engChrName: To advance the main story, select 'Finish Walking Around' from the Travel menu.
engSearchText:
To advance the main story, select 'Finish Walking
Around' from the Travel menu.
jpnChrName: （ただの杞憂だったみたいだが……   ま、一応念のためな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ただの杞憂だったみたいだが……
ま、一応念のためな。）

engChrName: (Should I get in the car now?)
engSearchText: (Should I get in the car now?)
jpnChrName: 各エリアの巡回を終了するとメインストーリーが進行し、 クエストやサブイベントなどのやり込みが終了します。
jpnSearchText:
各エリアの巡回を終了するとメインストーリーが進行し、
クエストやサブイベントなどのやり込みが終了します。

engChrName: (Hopefully I'm just bein' paranoid about all this. Best to err on the side of caution, though.)
engSearchText:
(Hopefully I'm just bein' paranoid about all this.
Best to err on the side of caution, though.)
jpnChrName: （カウントダウンが進んでいる……   ここからは効率的に移動するしかねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（カウントダウンが進んでいる……
ここからは効率的に移動するしかねぇ。）

engChrName: The main story will advance if you choose to get in the car. Unfinished quests and unseen sub-events will disappear.
engSearchText:
The main story will advance if you choose to get in
the car. Unfinished quests and unseen sub-events
will disappear.
jpnChrName: （まずはサイデン、それからオーベルだ。）
jpnSearchText: （まずはサイデン、それからオーベルだ。）

engChrName: (We're up against the clock now. Gotta make every move count.)
engSearchText:
(We're up against the clock now. Gotta make every
move count.)
jpnChrName: 一度行き先を選択するとしばらくの間、 他のエリアに行くことは出来ません。
jpnSearchText:
一度行き先を選択するとしばらくの間、
他のエリアに行くことは出来ません。

engChrName: (Our next destination's the Seiden District. Then we'll go to the Auber District.)
engSearchText:
(Our next destination's the Seiden District.
Then we'll go to the Auber District.)
jpnChrName: （ここの担当はジュディスだったか……   今の通信でどう動くかは分からんが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここの担当はジュディスだったか……
今の通信でどう動くかは分からんが。）

engChrName: Once a district has been selected, the others will be temporarily unavailable.
engSearchText:
Once a district has been selected, the others will be
temporarily unavailable.
jpnChrName: （時間がない──とにかく向かうぞ！）
jpnSearchText: （時間がない──とにかく向かうぞ！）

engChrName: (Judith was in charge of Seiden. Dunno what she's gonna do in response to the time limit, but I wanna find her all the same.)
engSearchText:
(Judith was in charge of Seiden. Dunno what she's
gonna do in response to the time limit, but I wanna
find her all the same.)
jpnChrName: （まだ予定時刻まで時間はあるが   ──どうする、早めに行っておくか？）
jpnSearchText:
（まだ予定時刻まで時間はあるが
──どうする、早めに行っておくか？）

engChrName: (Let's get a move on!)
engSearchText: (Let's get a move on!)
jpnChrName: この場所に向かうと後戻りできず、 本作のやり込みが全て終了します。
jpnSearchText:
この場所に向かうと後戻りできず、
本作のやり込みが全て終了します。

engChrName: (We've still got some time left. Should we head off early?)
engSearchText:
(We've still got some time left. Should we head
off early?)
jpnChrName: （そうだな、最後に一応、   整備してもらってから向かうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（そうだな、最後に一応、
整備してもらってから向かうか。）

engChrName: Should you choose to set off, there will be no turning back. Be sure to do everything you want to do in the city before you leave.
engSearchText:
Should you choose to set off, there will be no
turning back. Be sure to do everything you want to do
in the city before you leave.
jpnChrName: （まったく、この期に及んで   皆に借りを作る羽目になるとはな。）
jpnSearchText:
（まったく、この期に及んで
皆に借りを作る羽目になるとはな。）

engChrName: (Actually, might be worth getting my girl seen to before we head off.)
engSearchText:
(Actually, might be worth getting my girl seen to
before we head off.)
jpnChrName: （………ま、勘弁してもらうかね。）
jpnSearchText: （………ま、勘弁してもらうかね。）

engChrName: (I'm rackin' up debts like there's no tomorrow. Didn't think I'd ever owe so much to so many people...)
engSearchText:
(I'm rackin' up debts like there's no tomorrow.
Didn't think I'd ever owe so much to so
many people...)
jpnChrName: 旧市街はこんなところだな。
jpnSearchText: 旧市街はこんなところだな。

engChrName: (Oh, well. Gotta do what you've gotta do.)
engSearchText: (Oh, well. Gotta do what you've gotta do.)
jpnChrName: ロットさんからの依頼…… 駅前通りに向かう必要がありますね。
jpnSearchText:
ロットさんからの依頼……
駅前通りに向かう必要がありますね。

engChrName: I think that's about all there is to see in Old Town.
engSearchText: I think that's about all there is to see in Old Town.
jpnChrName: そっちでも４ｓｐｇが来てないか チェックする必要もありそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
そっちでも４ｓｐｇが来てないか
チェックする必要もありそうだが。

engChrName: All right. Next, we need to head to Station Street so we can take care of Lott's request.
engSearchText:
All right. Next, we need to head to Station Street so
we can take care of Lott's request.
jpnChrName: ま、ひとまず行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText: ま、ひとまず行ってみるか。

engChrName: Got'cha. We can also check out the bulletin board while we're there. Might have some 4SPGs.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. We can also check out the bulletin board
while we're there. Might have some 4SPGs.
jpnChrName: 駅前通りに向かえるようになった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>駅前通りに向かえるようになった。

engChrName: Let's head on over.
engSearchText: Let's head on over.
jpnChrName: 今日の目標は大体達成だな。 ご苦労さん。
jpnSearchText:
今日の目標は大体達成だな。
ご苦労さん。

engChrName: You can now visit Station Street.
engSearchText: You can now visit Station Street.
jpnChrName: ふう、なんとかなりましたか…… まだ結構早い時間ですけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、なんとかなりましたか……
まだ結構早い時間ですけど。

engChrName: Okay, I think it's about time we clock out. Good work today.
engSearchText:
Okay, I think it's about time we clock out.
Good work today.
jpnChrName: 初日だし、こんなもんでいいだろ。
jpnSearchText: 初日だし、こんなもんでいいだろ。

engChrName: That was more difficult than I expected... Though isn't it a bit early? I don't mind putting in a few more hours.
engSearchText:
That was more difficult than I expected...
Though isn't it a bit early? I don't mind putting in a
few more hours.
jpnChrName: この時間なら、そうだな…… 駅前の《オーバルカフェ》にでも行くか？
jpnSearchText:
この時間なら、そうだな……
駅前の《オーバルカフェ》にでも行くか？

engChrName: My girl, it's your first day. No need to go so hard right off the bat.
engSearchText:
My girl, it's your first day. No need to go so hard
right off the bat.
jpnChrName: 歓迎会代わりに何か奢ってやるぜ。
jpnSearchText: 歓迎会代わりに何か奢ってやるぜ。

engChrName: But if you've got some spare hours, we can hit up the orbal café in front of the station. Whaddaya say?
engSearchText:
But if you've got some spare hours, we can hit up the
orbal café in front of the station. Whaddaya say?
jpnChrName: いいんですか？
jpnSearchText: いいんですか？

engChrName: I'll even treat you. Think of it as a sign-on bonus.
engSearchText: I'll even treat you. Think of it as a sign-on bonus.
jpnChrName: ま、裏解決業務の戦力としちゃ 悪くねぇのも分かったことだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、裏解決業務の戦力としちゃ
悪くねぇのも分かったことだしな。

engChrName: Ooh, really? Are you sure?
engSearchText: Ooh, really? Are you sure?
jpnChrName: いや～、それにしても楽しみだぜ。 新作ラテのあのクリームがまた絶妙でな……！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、それにしても楽しみだぜ。
新作ラテのあのクリームがまた絶妙でな……！

engChrName: Course I'm sure. You've more than earned it—and I can tell you're gonna be a great asset.
engSearchText:
Course I'm sure. You've more than earned it—and I
can tell you're gonna be a great asset.
jpnChrName: （歓迎会というより   自分が行きたいだけなんじゃ……）
jpnSearchText:
（歓迎会というより
自分が行きたいだけなんじゃ……）

engChrName: Man, I can almost taste the cream on that new latte already! I'm gonna die and go to dessert heaven!
engSearchText:
Man, I can almost taste the cream on that new
latte already! I'm gonna die and go to dessert heaven!
jpnChrName: ふふ、それじゃあ行ってみましょうか。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それじゃあ行ってみましょうか。

engChrName: (...He just wants to go so he can indulge himself in sweets, doesn't he? Figures.)
engSearchText:
(...He just wants to go so he can indulge himself in
sweets, doesn't he? Figures.)
jpnChrName: 東方人街で集められる情報はこんなもんだろ。 キリがいい所で新市街に行くか。
jpnSearchText:
東方人街で集められる情報はこんなもんだろ。
キリがいい所で新市街に行くか。

engChrName: Heehee. Well, I'm ready to go when you are.
engSearchText: Heehee. Well, I'm ready to go when you are.
jpnChrName: 新市街というのは 煌都に到着した辺りのエリアですか？
jpnSearchText:
新市街というのは
煌都に到着した辺りのエリアですか？

engChrName: Okay, I think that's all the info we're gonna get here. Next stop is New Town.
engSearchText:
Okay, I think that's all the info we're gonna get here.
Next stop is New Town.
jpnChrName: ああそうだ、橋を渡ってすぐだから わざわざ車に乗る必要もねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああそうだ、橋を渡ってすぐだから
わざわざ車に乗る必要もねえだろう。

engChrName: Wasn't that the first place we went to when we arrived in Langport?
engSearchText:
Wasn't that the first place we went to when we
arrived in Langport?
jpnChrName: ん？　誰からだ？
jpnSearchText: ん？　誰からだ？

engChrName: Yep. It's just over the bridge, so we can just walk right on over. No need to take the car.
engSearchText:
Yep. It's just over the bridge, so we can just walk right
on over. No need to take the car.
jpnChrName: ハ～イ、３人ともさっきぶりね。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ハ～イ、３人ともさっきぶりね。

engChrName: ...Hmm? I wonder who that is?
engSearchText: ...Hmm? I wonder who that is?
jpnChrName: アシェンさん……
jpnSearchText: アシェンさん……

engChrName: Hello again!
engSearchText: Hello again!
jpnChrName: 別れてからそんなに経ってねえと思うが…… 何か状況に変化でもあったのか？
jpnSearchText:
別れてからそんなに経ってねえと思うが……
何か状況に変化でもあったのか？

engChrName: Oh, it's Ashen.
engSearchText: Oh, it's Ashen.
jpnChrName: そういうわけじゃないから安心して。
jpnSearchText: <C1>そういうわけじゃないから安心して。

engChrName: Didn't think we'd be hearing from you again so soon. Did the situation take a turn for the worse?
engSearchText:
Didn't think we'd be hearing from you again so soon.
Did the situation take a turn for the worse?
jpnChrName: ほら、あの“４ｓｐｇ”。 ちょっと頼みたいことがあるから連絡したの。
jpnSearchText:
ほら、あの“４ｓｐｇ”。
ちょっと頼みたいことがあるから連絡したの。

engChrName: No, don't worry. That's not why I'm calling.
engSearchText: No, don't worry. That's not why I'm calling.
jpnChrName: 依頼か…… 内容とミラ次第だな。
jpnSearchText:
依頼か……
内容とミラ次第だな。

engChrName: I actually wanted to give you all a request.
engSearchText: I actually wanted to give you all a request.
jpnChrName: 実は、黒月が管理している 観光事業方面でトラブルがあったみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
実は、黒月が管理している
観光事業方面でトラブルがあったみたいでね。

engChrName: Oh, got'cha. Then give me the details, and I'll decide if the job's right for us.
engSearchText:
Oh, got'cha. Then give me the details, and I'll decide
if the job's right for us.
jpnChrName: ツアーの観光地に危険な魔獣が出たみたいなの。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ツアーの観光地に危険な魔獣が出たみたいなの。

engChrName: All righty. Here's the rundown: there's a problem in a tourist area that's managed by Heiyue.
engSearchText:
All righty. Here's the rundown: there's a problem in a
tourist area that's managed by Heiyue.
jpnChrName: その討伐を俺たちに依頼したいってわけか……
jpnSearchText: その討伐を俺たちに依頼したいってわけか……

engChrName: A dangerous monster showed up out of nowhere, so tours are being put on hold.
engSearchText:
A dangerous monster showed up out of nowhere, so
tours are being put on hold.
jpnChrName: 察するに、アルマータへの警戒で 黒月は迂闊には動けない。
jpnSearchText:
察するに、アルマータへの警戒で
黒月は迂闊には動けない。

engChrName: And you need us to take care of it?
engSearchText: And you need us to take care of it?
jpnChrName: かと言って縄張りのことで遊撃士に依頼するのも メンツがあるからできないって所か？
jpnSearchText:
かと言って縄張りのことで遊撃士に依頼するのも
メンツがあるからできないって所か？

engChrName: I heard Heiyue's on guard 'cause of Almata, so I'm guessing their hands are a bit tied at the moment.
engSearchText:
I heard Heiyue's on guard 'cause of Almata, so I'm
guessing their hands are a bit tied at the moment.
jpnChrName: ふふ、さすがヴァンさん、話が早くて助かるわ。 報酬もギルドより弾ませてもらうから、どう？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、さすがヴァンさん、話が早くて助かるわ。
報酬もギルドより弾ませてもらうから、どう？

engChrName: And if they turned to the guild, it'd seem like they couldn't handle problems on their own turf. Got an image to protect, right?
engSearchText:
And if they turned to the guild, it'd seem like they
couldn't handle problems on their own turf. Got an
image to protect, right?
jpnChrName: こういう依頼なら受けてもいいが、 時間に余裕があるかどうかだな。
jpnSearchText:
こういう依頼なら受けてもいいが、
時間に余裕があるかどうかだな。

engChrName: You got it. Think you can handle this? I'll pay above the guild's rate.
engSearchText:
You got it. Think you can handle this? I'll pay above
the guild's rate.
jpnChrName: もちろん、手が空いたらでいいわ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>もちろん、手が空いたらでいいわ。

engChrName: Well, I think it meets our standards, but we've got a packed schedule. I gotta see if we have time to fit it in.
engSearchText:
Well, I think it meets our standards, but we've got a
packed schedule. I gotta see if we have time to fit
it in.
jpnChrName: 明日以降だったらこっちでも なんとか処理できるだろうし気にしないで。
jpnSearchText:
明日以降だったらこっちでも
なんとか処理できるだろうし気にしないで。

engChrName: Oh, of course. If you don't have the time, that's perfectly fine.
engSearchText:
Oh, of course. If you don't have the time, that's
perfectly fine.
jpnChrName: 詳細は東方人街の波止場にいる 渡し守から聞いてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
詳細は東方人街の波止場にいる
渡し守から聞いてちょうだい。

engChrName: We'll be able to take care of it by ourselves eventually, but we'd just rather have the matter settled sooner rather than later.
engSearchText:
We'll be able to take care of it by ourselves eventually,
but we'd just rather have the matter settled sooner
rather than later.
jpnChrName: 魔獣の討伐依頼ですか、 いい気分転換になりそうです。
jpnSearchText:
魔獣の討伐依頼ですか、
いい気分転換になりそうです。

engChrName: The ferryman by the wharf in the Eastern Quarter will fill you in on the specifics if you decide to take the job.
engSearchText:
The ferryman by the wharf in the Eastern Quarter
will fill you in on the specifics if you decide to take
the job.
jpnChrName: って、どんな気分転換ですか……
jpnSearchText: って、どんな気分転換ですか……

engChrName: Taking on a big monster sounds like it'd be a fun change of pace.
engSearchText:
Taking on a big monster sounds like it'd be a fun
change of pace.
jpnChrName: ま、余裕があったら対処すんぞ。
jpnSearchText: ま、余裕があったら対処すんぞ。

engChrName: That qualifies as a fun change of pace to you? That's...mildly concerning.
engSearchText:
That qualifies as a fun change of pace to you?
That's...mildly concerning.
jpnChrName: （折角だから新市街の店で   装備を調えてから向かってもいいかもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（折角だから新市街の店で
装備を調えてから向かってもいいかもな。）

engChrName: Either way, if we got the time to do it, we should.
engSearchText: Either way, if we got the time to do it, we should.
jpnChrName: 一通り回ったが、目ぼしい情報はないな。
jpnSearchText: 一通り回ったが、目ぼしい情報はないな。

engChrName: (Might be worth dropping by New Town to get our equipment in order.)
engSearchText:
(Might be worth dropping by New Town to get
our equipment in order.)
jpnChrName: これからどうしますか？
jpnSearchText: これからどうしますか？

engChrName: All right, that's it for this area, I think. Shame we didn't learn anything worthwhile.
engSearchText:
All right, that's it for this area, I think. Shame we
didn't learn anything worthwhile.
jpnChrName: リスクはあるが、あとは “あそこ”に踏み込むしかねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
リスクはあるが、あとは
“あそこ”に踏み込むしかねえだろう。

engChrName: So what's our next move?
engSearchText: So what's our next move?
jpnChrName: 《メッセルダム商事》……ですね。
jpnSearchText: 《メッセルダム商事》……ですね。

engChrName: I think we're gonna have to resort to venturin' into enemy turf.
engSearchText:
I think we're gonna have to resort to venturin' into
enemy turf.
jpnChrName: ああ、無駄足になる可能性もあるが、 避けては通れねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、無駄足になる可能性もあるが、
避けては通れねえだろう。

engChrName: By 'enemy turf,' do you mean the Messeldam Trading Company building?
engSearchText:
By 'enemy turf,' do you mean the Messeldam Trading
Company building?
jpnChrName: 慎重にいくぞ。 フェリも前に出すぎねえようにな。
jpnSearchText:
慎重にいくぞ。
フェリも前に出すぎねえようにな。

engChrName: That's right. It's a risky play, and it might just end up being a waste of time. We don't got many other options, though.
engSearchText:
That's right. It's a risky play, and it might just end up
being a waste of time. We don't got many other
options, though.
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）。
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）。

engChrName: Watch your backs, and don't get too far ahead of me.
engSearchText: Watch your backs, and don't get too far ahead of me.
jpnChrName: はい。
jpnSearchText: はい。

engChrName: Understood.
engSearchText: Understood.
jpnChrName: 色々回ってたら、もう結構時間が経ったな。
jpnSearchText: 色々回ってたら、もう結構時間が経ったな。

engChrName: Got it.
engSearchText: Got it.
jpnChrName: そろそろ昼食をとっても よさそうな時間帯ですね。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ昼食をとっても
よさそうな時間帯ですね。

engChrName: Man, time sure flies when you're hard at work.
engSearchText: Man, time sure flies when you're hard at work.
jpnChrName: そうだな……午後の活動も体力を使いそうだ。 腹ごしらえしとくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……午後の活動も体力を使いそうだ。
腹ごしらえしとくとするか。

engChrName: Indeed. It's nearly lunchtime, in fact. We should probably take a break soon.
engSearchText:
Indeed. It's nearly lunchtime, in fact. We should
probably take a break soon.
jpnChrName: 昼も宿の食堂にしますか？
jpnSearchText: 昼も宿の食堂にしますか？

engChrName: Yeah, good idea. We'll probably be swamped in the afternoon.
engSearchText:
Yeah, good idea. We'll probably be swamped in
the afternoon.
jpnChrName: せっかくのサルバッドだ。 色々回りてー気もするがな。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくのサルバッドだ。
色々回りてー気もするがな。

engChrName: Should we grab a bite to eat at the inn?
engSearchText: Should we grab a bite to eat at the inn?
jpnChrName: でしたら、市場で色々買い出しするのはどうですか？ 色んな珍しい食べ物が売っているみたいですし！
jpnSearchText:
でしたら、市場で色々買い出しするのはどうですか？
色んな珍しい食べ物が売っているみたいですし！

engChrName: We always do that, though. Can't we shake things up a bit?
engSearchText:
We always do that, though. Can't we shake things up
a bit?
jpnChrName: ああ、それはよさそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、それはよさそうだな。

engChrName: How about we go down to the marketplace? They've got all sorts of unique food there.
engSearchText:
How about we go down to the marketplace?
They've got all sorts of unique food there.
jpnChrName: 昨日も使ったフリースペースの テーブルを確保しにいくか。
jpnSearchText:
昨日も使ったフリースペースの
テーブルを確保しにいくか。

engChrName: I'd be down for that.
engSearchText: I'd be down for that.
jpnChrName: （他に用事がなければ、どこかで   パレードの開始を待つとするか。）
jpnSearchText:
（他に用事がなければ、どこかで
パレードの開始を待つとするか。）

engChrName: Let's find ourselves a table in the open area and chow down.
engSearchText:
Let's find ourselves a table in the open area and
chow down.
jpnChrName: パレードまで待機するとメインストーリーが進行し クエストなど一部のやり込みが終了します。
jpnSearchText:
パレードまで待機するとメインストーリーが進行し
クエストなど一部のやり込みが終了します。

engChrName: (If we've finished our business, we might as well chill and wait for the parade to start.)
engSearchText:
(If we've finished our business, we might as well chill
and wait for the parade to start.)
jpnChrName: 材料は大分集まった感じだな。
jpnSearchText: 材料は大分集まった感じだな。

engChrName: If you choose to wait for the parade, the main story will advance. Unfinished quests will disappear.
engSearchText:
If you choose to wait for the parade, the main story
will advance. Unfinished quests will disappear.
jpnChrName: つっても、まだ結論は見えねえがな。
jpnSearchText: つっても、まだ結論は見えねえがな。

engChrName: We've got a lot of info to work with now.
engSearchText: We've got a lot of info to work with now.
jpnChrName: どこか落ち着いたところで 整理してみた方がよさそうです。
jpnSearchText:
どこか落ち着いたところで
整理してみた方がよさそうです。

engChrName: Yeah, but I can't wrap my head around how it all fits together.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but I can't wrap my head around how it all
fits together.
jpnChrName: 宿に戻りますか？
jpnSearchText: 宿に戻りますか？
