engChrName: Maybe talking it out will help. Is there a place we can chat in private?
engSearchText:
Maybe talking it out will help. Is there a place we can
chat in private?
jpnChrName: いや──せっかくだから 僕の家に招待させてもらえないかな？
jpnSearchText:
いや──せっかくだから
僕の家に招待させてもらえないかな？

engChrName: We can always head back to the inn.
engSearchText: We can always head back to the inn.
jpnChrName: その方が落ち着いて話ができそうだし。
jpnSearchText: その方が落ち着いて話ができそうだし。

engChrName: Actually, how about you all come to my place?
engSearchText: Actually, how about you all come to my place?
jpnChrName: カトル君の家って、確か……
jpnSearchText: カトル君の家って、確か……

engChrName: You won't have to worry about people listening in there.
engSearchText:
You won't have to worry about people listening
in there.
jpnChrName: うん、正確にはグランマ── ハミルトン博士の家だけどね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、正確にはグランマ──
ハミルトン博士の家だけどね。

engChrName: Oh, no. We couldn't impose on you like that.
engSearchText: Oh, no. We couldn't impose on you like that.
jpnChrName: 今は僕しか住んでないけど。
jpnSearchText: 今は僕しか住んでないけど。

engChrName: I really don't mind, and neither would Gran—erm, Professor Hamilton.
engSearchText:
I really don't mind, and neither would Gran—erm,
Professor Hamilton.
jpnChrName: 三高弟の一人が住んでいる屋敷か…… 微妙に興味がありやがるな。
jpnSearchText:
三高弟の一人が住んでいる屋敷か……
微妙に興味がありやがるな。

engChrName: It's her house, but I'm the only one who lives there right now.
engSearchText:
It's her house, but I'm the only one who lives there
right now.
jpnChrName: 言っとくけど別に面白いものはないからね。
jpnSearchText: 言っとくけど別に面白いものはないからね。

engChrName: Cool. We'll take you up on your offer. Kinda curious to see the home of one of Epstein's three disciples.
engSearchText:
Cool. We'll take you up on your offer. Kinda curious
to see the home of one of Epstein's three disciples.
jpnChrName: とにかく用事を一通り済ませたら そこに行こう。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく用事を一通り済ませたら
そこに行こう。

engChrName: Oh, I wouldn't expect too much. It's just a normal family home.
engSearchText:
Oh, I wouldn't expect too much. It's just a normal
family home.
jpnChrName: さて、一通り情報がありそうな ところは回ったが……
jpnSearchText:
さて、一通り情報がありそうな
ところは回ったが……

engChrName: Anyway, we can head over whenever you'd like.
engSearchText: Anyway, we can head over whenever you'd like.
jpnChrName: ユメちゃんの行動には違和感も多いけど…… だいたいの動きは掴めそうな感じね。
jpnSearchText:
ユメちゃんの行動には違和感も多いけど……
だいたいの動きは掴めそうな感じね。

engChrName: Okay, that's enough info gathering. Doubt we'll learn anything new here.
engSearchText:
Okay, that's enough info gathering. Doubt we'll learn
anything new here.
jpnChrName: ああ、ここらで情報を整理した方が良いだろう。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ここらで情報を整理した方が良いだろう。

engChrName: I still have no clue why she's acting like this, though...
engSearchText: I still have no clue why she's acting like this, though...
jpnChrName: 他の連中も呼んで、一旦旅館に戻るぞ。
jpnSearchText: 他の連中も呼んで、一旦旅館に戻るぞ。

engChrName: Maybe it'll all start makin' sense once we put our heads together.
engSearchText:
Maybe it'll all start makin' sense once we put our
heads together.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあな。 俺たちはこれで失礼するぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあな。
俺たちはこれで失礼するぜ。

engChrName: Let's call the others. We can all meet up at the hotel and start hashing this out.
engSearchText:
Let's call the others. We can all meet up at the hotel
and start hashing this out.
jpnChrName: また何かあれば連絡して。
jpnSearchText: また何かあれば連絡して。

engChrName: Okay, we're gonna head off now. See you around.
engSearchText: Okay, we're gonna head off now. See you around.
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: Let us know if anything comes up.
engSearchText: Let us know if anything comes up.
jpnChrName: ジンたちがパーティから離脱した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ジンたちがパーティから離脱した。

engChrName: Will do. Thanks.
engSearchText: Will do. Thanks.
jpnChrName: ん？　この番号は……
jpnSearchText: ん？　この番号は……

engChrName: Zin and Fie left the party.
engSearchText: Zin and Fie left the party.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋、エレインさんを見なかったか！
jpnSearchText: <C1>裏解決屋、エレインさんを見なかったか！

engChrName: ...Huh? Who's this?
engSearchText: ...Huh? Who's this?
jpnChrName: お前さんか、 すごい剣幕だがどうしたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
お前さんか、
すごい剣幕だがどうしたんだ？

engChrName: Spriggan! You haven't seen Elaine anywhere, have you?!
engSearchText:
Spriggan! You haven't seen Elaine anywhere,
have you?!
jpnChrName: 見なかったかと聞いている！ 早く答えろ！
jpnSearchText:
見なかったかと聞いている！
早く答えろ！

engChrName: Oh, it's you. What's got you so worked up?
engSearchText: Oh, it's you. What's got you so worked up?
jpnChrName: 見てないが…… まさか、また何かあったのか？
jpnSearchText:
見てないが……
まさか、また何かあったのか？

engChrName: Just answer the question! Have you seen her or not?
engSearchText: Just answer the question! Have you seen her or not?
jpnChrName: ……エレインさんがまた………
jpnSearchText: <C1>……エレインさんがまた………

engChrName: I haven't, no. Did something happen?
engSearchText: I haven't, no. Did something happen?
jpnChrName: ……ギルドにいるんだな？ 今からそっちに行く。
jpnSearchText:
……ギルドにいるんだな？
今からそっちに行く。

engChrName: She's done it again...
engSearchText: She's done it again...
jpnChrName: ……分かった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>……分かった。

engChrName: You're at the guild, right? I wanna hear more about this, so I'm heading over.
engSearchText:
You're at the guild, right? I wanna hear more about
this, so I'm heading over.
jpnChrName: とにかく来るなら急いでくれ！ 詳しい話はその時にする。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく来るなら急いでくれ！
詳しい話はその時にする。

engChrName: ...All right.
engSearchText: ...All right.
jpnChrName: エレインさんが……？
jpnSearchText: エレインさんが……？

engChrName: But be quick about it! I'll tell you more when you get here.
engSearchText:
But be quick about it! I'll tell you more when you
get here.
jpnChrName: エレインさんが……？
jpnSearchText: エレインさんが……？

engChrName: That didn't sound good...
engSearchText: That didn't sound good...
jpnChrName: ふむ……しかも前回よりも 切羽詰まった様子だったな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……しかも前回よりも
切羽詰まった様子だったな。

engChrName: That didn't sound good...
engSearchText: That didn't sound good...
jpnChrName: どうするの？ アニエスたちもまだ戻っていないけど。
jpnSearchText:
どうするの？
アニエスたちもまだ戻っていないけど。

engChrName: He seemed...perturbed.
engSearchText: He seemed...perturbed.
jpnChrName: どうなっているかは分からねえが、 待っている時間もなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
どうなっているかは分からねえが、
待っている時間もなさそうだ。

engChrName: Should we go right away? Or should we wait for the others?
engSearchText:
Should we go right away? Or should we wait for
the others?
jpnChrName: 念のため準備してからギルドに向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText: 念のため準備してからギルドに向かうぞ。

engChrName: Nah, this sounds urgent.
engSearchText: Nah, this sounds urgent.
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋》の仕事に一区切りがついた頃──
jpnSearchText: 《裏解決屋》の仕事に一区切りがついた頃──

engChrName: Let's get to the guild ASAP.
engSearchText: Let's get to the guild ASAP.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達は休憩をとるため、 一時的に解散して自由行動をする事になった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達は休憩をとるため、
一時的に解散して自由行動をする事になった。

engChrName: Eventually, they reached a point where they could take a break.
engSearchText:
Eventually, they reached a point where they could
take a break.
jpnChrName: そういやアニエスのやつ…… たまに浮かない顔をしてやがるんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
そういやアニエスのやつ……
たまに浮かない顔をしてやがるんだよな。

engChrName: As such, everyone went their separate ways for a while.
engSearchText:
As such, everyone went their separate ways for
a while.
jpnChrName: 悩み事か何か知らねえが、 ここは所長として首を突っ込んでみるか。
jpnSearchText:
悩み事か何か知らねえが、
ここは所長として首を突っ込んでみるか。

engChrName: Something was off about Agnès earlier. She looked kinda down. Maybe she's got something on her mind?
engSearchText:
Something was off about Agnès earlier. She looked
kinda down. Maybe she's got something on
her mind?
jpnChrName: アイツは確か 駅前通り方面に行くとか言ってたか……？
jpnSearchText:
アイツは確か
駅前通り方面に行くとか言ってたか……？

engChrName: Dunno if she wants to talk about it, but I'll at least offer to lend an ear. A good boss should always be lookin' after their employees.
engSearchText:
Dunno if she wants to talk about it, but I'll at least
offer to lend an ear. A good boss should always be
lookin' after their employees.
jpnChrName: （これで４ｓｐｇは一通り片付いたな。   ──おかげで“匂い”もしなくなった。）
jpnSearchText:
（これで４ｓｐｇは一通り片付いたな。
──おかげで“匂い”もしなくなった。）

engChrName: Now where did she say she was headed... I think it was Station Street, maybe?
engSearchText:
Now where did she say she was headed... I think it
was Station Street, maybe?
jpnChrName: （ここらで休憩を挟みつつ、   残りの時間は適当に流すとすっか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここらで休憩を挟みつつ、
残りの時間は適当に流すとすっか。）

engChrName: (That's the last of the 4SPGs. I can't smell anythin' out of place now.)
engSearchText:
(That's the last of the 4SPGs. I can't smell anythin'
out of place now.)
jpnChrName: ４ｓｐｇを全て片付けたことで ストックタイムが１追加された。
jpnSearchText:
４ｓｐｇを全て片付けたことで
ストックタイムが１追加された。

engChrName: (This'd be a good time for a break. Then we can take it easy after that.)
engSearchText:
(This'd be a good time for a break. Then we can take
it easy after that.)
jpnChrName: ではさっそく調査を始めましょうか。
jpnSearchText: ではさっそく調査を始めましょうか。

engChrName: One additional free time point was added for completing all of the 4SPGs.
engSearchText:
One additional free time point was added for
completing all of the 4SPGs.
jpnChrName: ジェシカさんを知ってる人がいないか 色々な人に聞き込みしなきゃですね。
jpnSearchText:
ジェシカさんを知ってる人がいないか
色々な人に聞き込みしなきゃですね。

engChrName: Are we ready to get to work?
engSearchText: Are we ready to get to work?
jpnChrName: ああ、それなんだが 聞き込み先として第一候補がいてな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それなんだが
聞き込み先として第一候補がいてな。

engChrName: Uh-huh. We should start by finding someone who knows Jessica.
engSearchText:
Uh-huh. We should start by finding someone who
knows Jessica.
jpnChrName: よくタイレル地区でスカウトをしてる ファッションモデルのプロデューサーがいるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
よくタイレル地区でスカウトをしてる
ファッションモデルのプロデューサーがいるんだ。

engChrName: And I know the perfect person to ask.
engSearchText: And I know the perfect person to ask.
jpnChrName: まずはそいつに話を聞いてみようぜ。
jpnSearchText: まずはそいつに話を聞いてみようぜ。

engChrName: There's a producer who often hangs out around the Tyrell District to try and recruit new people to be mannequins.
engSearchText:
There's a producer who often hangs out around the
Tyrell District to try and recruit new people to
be mannequins.
jpnChrName: ふぁっしょんもでるの ぷろでゅーさー、ですか……？
jpnSearchText:
ふぁっしょんもでるの
ぷろでゅーさー、ですか……？

engChrName: Let's talk to him before we try askin' anyone else. Might save us a lot of wandering around.
engSearchText:
Let's talk to him before we try askin' anyone else.
Might save us a lot of wandering around.
jpnChrName: 妹さんは美人な方でしたから 目撃情報が得られるかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
妹さんは美人な方でしたから
目撃情報が得られるかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Manny...kin? I've never heard of that. What do they do?
engSearchText:
Manny...kin? I've never heard of that. What do
they do?
jpnChrName: ああ、てなわけでタイレル地区に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、てなわけでタイレル地区に向かうぞ。

engChrName: He means models—people who wear clothes to advertise new outfits. And Van's right that Jessica is pretty enough to be noticed by a producer.
engSearchText:
He means models—people who wear clothes to
advertise new outfits. And Van's right that Jessica is
pretty enough to be noticed by a producer.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、ちょいと海蝕洞を離れさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: 悪いな、ちょいと海蝕洞を離れさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: So as soon as we're ready, we should make for the Tyrell District.
engSearchText:
So as soon as we're ready, we should make for the
Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: 分かりました！ それでは一旦解散しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
分かりました！
それでは一旦解散しましょうか。

engChrName: Sorry. We're gonna have to turn back for a while.
engSearchText: Sorry. We're gonna have to turn back for a while.
jpnChrName: 皆様が海蝕洞に戻って来られた際に 合流させて頂きますね！
jpnSearchText:
皆様が海蝕洞に戻って来られた際に
合流させて頂きますね！

engChrName: No worries! Just let me know when you're ready to resume.
engSearchText:
No worries! Just let me know when you're ready
to resume.
jpnChrName: はい、宜しくお願いします。
jpnSearchText: はい、宜しくお願いします。

engChrName: I'll be waiting to join you!
engSearchText: I'll be waiting to join you!
jpnChrName: ハン、思った以上に手がかりになりそうな 情報が出てきやがったな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、思った以上に手がかりになりそうな
情報が出てきやがったな。

engChrName: Thank you.
engSearchText: Thank you.
jpnChrName: ええ、荷台の中から聞こえてきた音に、 誰も乗ってなかったような運転席ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、荷台の中から聞こえてきた音に、
誰も乗ってなかったような運転席ですね。

engChrName: Nice. We got way more clues here than I expected.
engSearchText: Nice. We got way more clues here than I expected.
jpnChrName: どちらもレッドスターの大型運搬車…… 同じ車の可能性は高そうです。
jpnSearchText:
どちらもレッドスターの大型運搬車……
同じ車の可能性は高そうです。

engChrName: The two accounts we heard both involved a Red Star transport...
engSearchText:
The two accounts we heard both involved a Red
Star transport...
jpnChrName: はい、誰も乗ってないっていうのは ゾッとしませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
はい、誰も乗ってないっていうのは
ゾッとしませんけど……

engChrName: ...which leads me to believe we are dealing with one—and only one—vehicle.
engSearchText:
...which leads me to believe we are dealing with
one—and only one—vehicle.
jpnChrName: ま、夜のシチュエーションといい、 いかにもな雰囲気ではあるだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、夜のシチュエーションといい、
いかにもな雰囲気ではあるだろうが……

engChrName: I'm still freaking out about the whole 'driverless truck' thing.
engSearchText:
I'm still freaking out about the whole 'driverless
truck' thing.
jpnChrName: カトル──お前さんならカラクリについて ある程度見当が付いてんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
カトル──お前さんならカラクリについて
ある程度見当が付いてんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Don't blame ya. The fact that it happened at night turns this whole thing into a bona fide ghost story.
engSearchText:
Don't blame ya. The fact that it happened at night
turns this whole thing into a bona fide ghost story.
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですかっ？
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんですかっ？

engChrName: There's probably a logical explanation, though, and I'm sure Quatre can provide it.
engSearchText:
There's probably a logical explanation, though, and
I'm sure Quatre can provide it.
jpnChrName: カトル君ならという事は もしかして……
jpnSearchText:
カトル君ならという事は
もしかして……

engChrName: Wait, for real?
engSearchText: Wait, for real?
jpnChrName: うん……完全実用化はされてないけど 各国で研究されてる技術があってね。
jpnSearchText:
うん……完全実用化はされてないけど
各国で研究されてる技術があってね。

engChrName: Oh, is it related to technology you have insider knowledge about?
engSearchText:
Oh, is it related to technology you have insider
knowledge about?
jpnChrName: 『ＡＩによる自動運転技術』── ホロウが人間の代わりに運転するイメージかな。
jpnSearchText:
『ＡＩによる自動運転技術』──
ホロウが人間の代わりに運転するイメージかな。

engChrName: Correct. I believe it is utilizing tech that is currently in the R&D phase of development in many countries.
engSearchText:
Correct. I believe it is utilizing tech that is currently
in the R&D phase of development in many countries.
jpnChrName: 空き缶にも動じずに運転し続けたのなんか まさにＡＩらしい反応とも言えるかな。
jpnSearchText:
空き缶にも動じずに運転し続けたのなんか
まさにＡＩらしい反応とも言えるかな。

engChrName: It's called an automated vehicle, and it allows a person to go from place to place without lifting a finger— because a holo core is doing the driving.
engSearchText:
It's called an automated vehicle, and it allows a person
to go from place to place without lifting a finger—
because a holo core is doing the driving.
jpnChrName: やっぱり……レン先輩から ちょっと聞いたことがありましたが。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり……レン先輩から
ちょっと聞いたことがありましたが。

engChrName: The fact that it kept going in spite of the empty soda can makes me strongly suspect it's an AI-controlled vehicle.
engSearchText:
The fact that it kept going in spite of the empty
soda can makes me strongly suspect it's an
AI-controlled vehicle.
jpnChrName: ふわあ～……そんな技術が。 そ、それじゃあ霊（ジン）の仕業とかじゃ──
jpnSearchText:
ふわあ～……そんな技術が。
そ、それじゃあ霊（ジン）の仕業とかじゃ──

engChrName: My suspicions were correct, then. Renne told me a little about this before.
engSearchText:
My suspicions were correct, then. Renne told me a
little about this before.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、分からねえぞ～？
jpnSearchText: いやぁ、分からねえぞ～？

engChrName: Wow! That's so cool! So that means it wasn't a ghost. Phew...
engSearchText:
Wow! That's so cool! So that means it wasn't a ghost.
Phew...
jpnChrName: ブラックな環境で過労死したトラック運転手が 現世に未練を残して──ほらお前の後ろに！
jpnSearchText:
ブラックな環境で過労死したトラック運転手が
現世に未練を残して──ほらお前の後ろに！

engChrName: Well, you never know. Maybe there WAS a driver— until his shitty job worked him to death. Now he lives on as a vengeful ghost behind the wheel...
engSearchText:
Well, you never know. Maybe there WAS a driver—
until his shitty job worked him to death. Now he lives
on as a vengeful ghost behind the wheel...
jpnChrName: ！！？？ひゃあああっ！？
jpnSearchText: ！！？？ひゃあああっ！？

engChrName: Wait, what's that? Oh, SHIT! It's right behind you, Ferida!
engSearchText:
Wait, what's that? Oh, SHIT! It's right behind
you, Ferida!
jpnChrName: ──って何もないじゃないですかっ！
jpnSearchText: ──って何もないじゃないですかっ！

engChrName: Wha...?! EEEEEK!
engSearchText: Wha...?! EEEEEK!
jpnChrName: ブハハ、引っかかってやんの。
jpnSearchText: ブハハ、引っかかってやんの。

engChrName: ...Hey! There's nothing there!
engSearchText: ...Hey! There's nothing there!
jpnChrName: もう、アーロンさん…… そんな場合じゃないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
もう、アーロンさん……
そんな場合じゃないでしょう。

engChrName: BAHAHAHA! You should've seen the look on your face!
engSearchText:
BAHAHAHA! You should've seen the look on
your face!
jpnChrName: 真面目にやれ、真面目に。
jpnSearchText: 真面目にやれ、真面目に。

engChrName: Why are you like this...?
engSearchText: Why are you like this...?
jpnChrName: ──無人の自動運転技術については 数年前から裏の世界で事件を起こしている。
jpnSearchText:
──無人の自動運転技術については
数年前から裏の世界で事件を起こしている。

engChrName: You want me to stop calling you a kid, stop acting like one.
engSearchText:
You want me to stop calling you a kid, stop acting
like one.
jpnChrName: ま、事故も起こさず市内を回り続けてるってのは なかなかハードルの高そうな技術だろうがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、事故も起こさず市内を回り続けてるってのは
なかなかハードルの高そうな技術だろうがな。

engChrName: Back on topic. There was an incident regarding unmanned driving tech. Everyone in the underworld was goin' on and on about it at the time.
engSearchText:
Back on topic. There was an incident regarding
unmanned driving tech. Everyone in the underworld
was goin' on and on about it at the time.
jpnChrName: うん……それでも市内の道路情報や 交通管理システムと繋がれば不可能じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
うん……それでも市内の道路情報や
交通管理システムと繋がれば不可能じゃない。

engChrName: So I'm amazed this thing is driving around the city without causing any problems. It's kinda insane.
engSearchText:
So I'm amazed this thing is driving around the city
without causing any problems. It's kinda insane.
jpnChrName: ひょっとしたら──キャラハン先生が ああなった技術を応用してる可能性もある。
jpnSearchText:
ひょっとしたら──キャラハン先生が
ああなった技術を応用してる可能性もある。

engChrName: I'm not too surprised. You could prevent most accidents by connecting it to the traffic management system and the info on the city roads.
engSearchText:
I'm not too surprised. You could prevent most
accidents by connecting it to the traffic management
system and the info on the city roads.

engChrName: The technology should be state of the art. In fact, I suspect it's the same tech that caused Professor Callaghan's downfall.
engSearchText:
The technology should be state of the art. In fact, I
suspect it's the same tech that caused Professor
Callaghan's downfall.

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnChrName: はは……気にしないでよ。 今は感傷に浸ってる場合じゃないし。
jpnSearchText:
はは……気にしないでよ。
今は感傷に浸ってる場合じゃないし。

engChrName: I-I'm sorry, Quatre...
engSearchText: I-I'm sorry, Quatre...
jpnChrName: でも──どうするのヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: でも──どうするのヴァンさん？

engChrName: You've nothing to be sorry for. And I'm all right, promise. Now's not the time to wallow in sentimentality.
engSearchText:
You've nothing to be sorry for. And I'm all
right, promise. Now's not the time to wallow
in sentimentality.
jpnChrName: 積んでるＡＩの性能やパターン次第では 簡単には捕まえられないかもしれないよ？
jpnSearchText:
積んでるＡＩの性能やパターン次第では
簡単には捕まえられないかもしれないよ？

engChrName: So what's the plan, Van?
engSearchText: So what's the plan, Van?
jpnChrName: ああ、後はあの少尉に連絡して警察あたりに 丸投げしてもいいかもしれねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、後はあの少尉に連絡して警察あたりに
丸投げしてもいいかもしれねぇが……

engChrName: The AI's functionality and patterns could make it quite difficult to capture.
engSearchText:
The AI's functionality and patterns could make it
quite difficult to capture.
jpnChrName: 車好きの端くれとして、ヤベエ代物を運んだ 無人暴走車を見過ごすわけにもいかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
車好きの端くれとして、ヤベエ代物を運んだ
無人暴走車を見過ごすわけにもいかねぇ。

engChrName: I know. Normally, I'd be fine with dumping this on the second lieutenant or the cops.
engSearchText:
I know. Normally, I'd be fine with dumping this on
the second lieutenant or the cops.
jpnChrName: ハッ、てめぇらしい物言いだが、 ──そんじゃあどうすんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、てめぇらしい物言いだが、
──そんじゃあどうすんだ？

engChrName: But I'm a car lover at heart, and I do NOT like seein' them be used as vehicles for bringing weapons into the city. This shit is personal.
engSearchText:
But I'm a car lover at heart, and I do NOT like seein'
them be used as vehicles for bringing weapons into
the city. This shit is personal.
jpnChrName: そのＡＩとやらがどこまでやるのか 直接、確かめさせてもらうだけの話だ。
jpnSearchText:
そのＡＩとやらがどこまでやるのか
直接、確かめさせてもらうだけの話だ。

engChrName: Figures. Well, any bright ideas, chief?
engSearchText: Figures. Well, any bright ideas, chief?
jpnChrName: ただし手段を選ぶつもりはねぇ── “助っ人”を見込ませてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ただし手段を選ぶつもりはねぇ──
“助っ人”を見込ませてもらうぜ。

engChrName: First order of business is seeing how far this AI can really go.
engSearchText:
First order of business is seeing how far this AI can
really go.
jpnChrName: す、助っ人……？
jpnSearchText: す、助っ人……？

engChrName: Also, I'm gonna bring on some outside help for this gig.
engSearchText:
Also, I'm gonna bring on some outside help for
this gig.
jpnChrName: あ、ひょっとして ちょうどバーゼルに来ている……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、ひょっとして
ちょうどバーゼルに来ている……！

engChrName: What kind of outside help?
engSearchText: What kind of outside help?
jpnChrName: ああ、一応連絡を入れておくか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、一応連絡を入れておくか。

engChrName: Wait, you don't mean them, do you?
engSearchText: Wait, you don't mean them, do you?
jpnChrName: ヴァンはザイファで走り屋の ユニファたちに連絡を入れ……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはザイファで走り屋の
ユニファたちに連絡を入れ……

engChrName: Bingo. And they're right here in Basel, so I'm gonna call 'em up right now.
engSearchText:
Bingo. And they're right here in Basel, so I'm gonna
call 'em up right now.
jpnChrName: 彼らが待っている新市街の モーターパビリオンに向かうことにした。
jpnSearchText:
彼らが待っている新市街の
モーターパビリオンに向かうことにした。

engChrName: Van used his Xipha to get in touch with Junifer and the others.
engSearchText:
Van used his Xipha to get in touch with Junifer and
the others.
jpnChrName: えっと、どなたか心当たりでも？
jpnSearchText: えっと、どなたか心当たりでも？

engChrName: The party then headed to the Motor Pavilion in New Town where they were waiting.
engSearchText:
The party then headed to the Motor Pavilion in New
Town where they were waiting.
jpnChrName: ああ──（たしか中古整備屋で こっちに来てると聞いたが……）
jpnSearchText:
ああ──（たしか中古整備屋で
こっちに来てると聞いたが……）

engChrName: Umm, do you have somebody in mind?
engSearchText: Umm, do you have somebody in mind?
jpnChrName: ヴァンはザイファでとある面々が バーゼルに来ていることを確認し……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはザイファでとある面々が
バーゼルに来ていることを確認し……

engChrName: Yep. (I heard that they'd be here...)
engSearchText:
Yep.
(I heard that they'd be here...)
jpnChrName: 彼らが待っているという新市街の モーターパビリオンへと向かうことにした。
jpnSearchText:
彼らが待っているという新市街の
モーターパビリオンへと向かうことにした。

engChrName: Van used his Xipha to get in touch with some familiar faces in Basel.
engSearchText:
Van used his Xipha to get in touch with some familiar
faces in Basel.
jpnChrName: そういや“アイドル”が 相方の行方を捜してるっつう話だったな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや“アイドル”が
相方の行方を捜してるっつう話だったな。

engChrName: The party then headed to the Motor Pavilion in New Town where they were waiting.
engSearchText:
The party then headed to the Motor Pavilion in New
Town where they were waiting.
jpnChrName: 話を聞きに行くか？
jpnSearchText: 話を聞きに行くか？

engChrName: Should I go talk to that idol about her friend now?
engSearchText: Should I go talk to that idol about her friend now?
jpnChrName: この４ＳＰＧを開始すると ストックタイムがリセットされます。
jpnSearchText:
この４ＳＰＧを開始すると
ストックタイムがリセットされます。

engChrName: I've gotta do it soon, but it doesn't have to be right now.
engSearchText:
I've gotta do it soon, but it doesn't have to be
right now.
jpnChrName: 夜の首都も自由に回れなくなるので 注意して下さい。
jpnSearchText:
夜の首都も自由に回れなくなるので
注意して下さい。

engChrName: Once you start this 4SPG, you will no longer be able to use your free time points.
engSearchText:
Once you start this 4SPG, you will no longer be able
to use your free time points.
jpnChrName: よし、依頼者の元へ出向くとすっか。
jpnSearchText: よし、依頼者の元へ出向くとすっか。

engChrName: You will also no longer be able to walk around the capital freely.
engSearchText:
You will also no longer be able to walk around the
capital freely.
jpnChrName: そういやまだ十分に街を回れてなかったな。
jpnSearchText: そういやまだ十分に街を回れてなかったな。

engChrName: All right. Let me go see my client.
engSearchText: All right. Let me go see my client.
jpnChrName: 一通り他を片付けてから取り掛かるとすっか。
jpnSearchText: 一通り他を片付けてから取り掛かるとすっか。

engChrName: Actually, I think there was some other stuff I wanted to do.
engSearchText:
Actually, I think there was some other stuff I wanted
to do.
jpnChrName: これで３か所、回り終えましたね。
jpnSearchText: これで３か所、回り終えましたね。

engChrName: I'll take care of that first before goin' to see her.
engSearchText: I'll take care of that first before goin' to see her.
jpnChrName: 残っているのは赤いトラムですね。
jpnSearchText: 残っているのは赤いトラムですね。

engChrName: Okay. That's three locations down.
engSearchText: Okay. That's three locations down.
jpnChrName: 今のこの時間なら……そうだな……
jpnSearchText: 今のこの時間なら……そうだな……

engChrName: Now all that's left is the red tram.
engSearchText: Now all that's left is the red tram.
jpnChrName: ちょうど北街区の停留所辺りに 停まっているかもしれねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど北街区の停留所辺りに
停まっているかもしれねえ。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: ハッ、流石に詳しいじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、流石に詳しいじゃねえか。

engChrName: At this time of day, it's gonna be at the stop in the North District.
engSearchText:
At this time of day, it's gonna be at the stop in the
North District.
jpnChrName: ま、ガキの頃に興味半分で 探して回ったことがあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ガキの頃に興味半分で
探して回ったことがあるからな。

engChrName: Wait, you've got the tram schedule memorized? What a nerd.
engSearchText:
Wait, you've got the tram schedule memorized?
What a nerd.
jpnChrName: とにかく向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText: とにかく向かうぞ。

engChrName: Hey, I ain't a nerd. I just spent a lot of time looking for the thing as a kid, so its schedule is burned into my memory.
engSearchText:
Hey, I ain't a nerd. I just spent a lot of time looking
for the thing as a kid, so its schedule is burned into
my memory.
jpnChrName: オラシオンクイズの答え、 ４つとも揃ったようだな。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンクイズの答え、
４つとも揃ったようだな。

engChrName: Anyway, let's get on over there.
engSearchText: Anyway, let's get on over there.
jpnChrName: では早速あの若人たちの所に 帰るとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
では早速あの若人たちの所に
帰るとしよう。

engChrName: Okay, we've got all four answers.
engSearchText: Okay, we've got all four answers.
jpnChrName: 早くしねえと爆発しちまうかもな。
jpnSearchText: 早くしねえと爆発しちまうかもな。

engChrName: Let's return to our clients quickly, then.
engSearchText: Let's return to our clients quickly, then.
jpnChrName: そ、そういう冗談はやめてください……
jpnSearchText: そ、そういう冗談はやめてください……

engChrName: Good idea. I'd rather not find a pile of splattered remains when we get back.
engSearchText:
Good idea. I'd rather not find a pile of splattered
remains when we get back.
jpnChrName: 依頼にあったヤツで間違いねえな。
jpnSearchText: 依頼にあったヤツで間違いねえな。

engChrName: Aaron! Not appropriate!
engSearchText: Aaron! Not appropriate!
jpnChrName: 元気そうだね。
jpnSearchText: 元気そうだね。

engChrName: Looks like we've found our prey.
engSearchText: Looks like we've found our prey.
jpnChrName: かなり凶暴みたいですね。
jpnSearchText: かなり凶暴みたいですね。

engChrName: They look perky.
engSearchText: They look perky.
jpnChrName: なかなか活きがいいね！
jpnSearchText: なかなか活きがいいね！

engChrName: They look fierce.
engSearchText: They look fierce.
jpnChrName: 活きがいいじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: 活きがいいじゃねぇか。

engChrName: They look lively.
engSearchText: They look lively.
jpnChrName: こんなヤツ、前はいなかったよな？
jpnSearchText: こんなヤツ、前はいなかったよな？

engChrName: Nice. Fresh meat.
engSearchText: Nice. Fresh meat.
jpnChrName: こんな敵、前はいなかったはずです……！
jpnSearchText: こんな敵、前はいなかったはずです……！

engChrName: I don't remember seeing other monsters like them down here before.
engSearchText:
I don't remember seeing other monsters like them
down here before.
jpnChrName: こんな敵、前はいなかったと思うけど……
jpnSearchText: こんな敵、前はいなかったと思うけど……

engChrName: I don't remember seeing other monsters like them down here before!
engSearchText:
I don't remember seeing other monsters like them
down here before!
jpnChrName: たまたま行き会わなかったか、 それともアルマータの置き土産か……
jpnSearchText:
たまたま行き会わなかったか、
それともアルマータの置き土産か……

engChrName: I don't remember seeing other monsters like them down here before.
engSearchText:
I don't remember seeing other monsters like them
down here before.
jpnChrName: どっちにしろ、今はとにかく撃破するぞ！
jpnSearchText: どっちにしろ、今はとにかく撃破するぞ！

engChrName: Me, neither. Maybe Almata unleashed 'em today or somethin'.
engSearchText:
Me, neither. Maybe Almata unleashed 'em today
or somethin'.
jpnChrName: 対象の沈黙、確認しました。
jpnSearchText: 対象の沈黙、確認しました。

engChrName: Doesn't change what we've gotta do, though. Let's tear 'em up!
engSearchText:
Doesn't change what we've gotta do, though.
Let's tear 'em up!
jpnChrName: ふう……お疲れさん。
jpnSearchText: ふう……お疲れさん。

engChrName: Mission complete.
engSearchText: Mission complete.
jpnChrName: アンタらも、こんなことにまで 付き合ってもらって悪いな。
jpnSearchText:
アンタらも、こんなことにまで
付き合ってもらって悪いな。

engChrName: Whew. Good work, everyone.
engSearchText: Whew. Good work, everyone.
jpnChrName: いや、本来ならギルドが率先して 対応すべきものでもあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、本来ならギルドが率先して
対応すべきものでもあるからな。

engChrName: Thanks for the help, guys. Sorry we dragged you into this.
engSearchText:
Thanks for the help, guys. Sorry we dragged you
into this.
jpnChrName: はは、それもそうか。
jpnSearchText: はは、それもそうか。

engChrName: Don't be sorry! This kinda work normally falls in our jurisdiction anyway, so if anything, you were helping us.
engSearchText:
Don't be sorry! This kinda work normally falls in our
jurisdiction anyway, so if anything, you were
helping us.
jpnChrName: いえ、黒月としては むしろ大変助かっています。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、黒月としては
むしろ大変助かっています。

engChrName: Heh. Fair enough.
engSearchText: Heh. Fair enough.
jpnChrName: かような魔獣がいては、 遺構の探索もままなりませんから。
jpnSearchText:
かような魔獣がいては、
遺構の探索もままなりませんから。

engChrName: Not at all. This benefits us quite nicely, anyway.
engSearchText: Not at all. This benefits us quite nicely, anyway.
jpnChrName: やっぱ何か狙ってやがんな…… ま、アンタなら通常運転か。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱ何か狙ってやがんな……
ま、アンタなら通常運転か。

engChrName: Monsters of this caliber would have hindered our investigation of the ruins later.
engSearchText:
Monsters of this caliber would have hindered our
investigation of the ruins later.
jpnChrName: いいさ、ちょうど《灼飆（カムシン）》との戦いを 途中で切り上げて物足りなかったから。
jpnSearchText:
いいさ、ちょうど《灼飆（カムシン）》との戦いを
途中で切り上げて物足りなかったから。

engChrName: Up to shady shit as usual, I see. Why am I not surprised?
engSearchText:
Up to shady shit as usual, I see. Why am I
not surprised?
jpnChrName: あれで物足りねえのかよ……
jpnSearchText: あれで物足りねえのかよ……

engChrName: Don't be sorry! This was the perfect outlet to vent my frustration after my fight with the Khamsin was cut oh-so short.
engSearchText:
Don't be sorry! This was the perfect outlet to vent my
frustration after my fight with the Khamsin was cut
oh-so short.
jpnChrName: かまへんよ、ちょうど暇やったからなぁ。
jpnSearchText: かまへんよ、ちょうど暇やったからなぁ。

engChrName: You WANTED to fight that bastard? Man, you really are insane...
engSearchText:
You WANTED to fight that bastard? Man, you
really are insane...
jpnChrName: しかし、先ほどの戦闘中に 魔獣のあの行動は………
jpnSearchText:
しかし、先ほどの戦闘中に
魔獣のあの行動は………

engChrName: Not at all. This was quite the pleasant diversion.
engSearchText: Not at all. This was quite the pleasant diversion.
jpnChrName: あれって……まさかよね？ 気のせいよ、きっと！
jpnSearchText:
あれって……まさかよね？
気のせいよ、きっと！

engChrName: Hmm... There was something peculiar about our prey.
engSearchText:
Hmm... There was something peculiar about
our prey.
jpnChrName: ……ここで考えても埒が明かねぇだろ、 とりあえず次に行こう。
jpnSearchText:
……ここで考えても埒が明かねぇだろ、
とりあえず次に行こう。

engChrName: I'm glad I wasn't the only one who thought so. There was something weird about their behavior, but I can't put my finger on what...
engSearchText:
I'm glad I wasn't the only one who thought so.
There was something weird about their behavior, but
I can't put my finger on what...
jpnChrName: いたわね！
jpnSearchText: いたわね！

engChrName: Well, no use thinkin' about it now. Let's just move on to the next request.
engSearchText:
Well, no use thinkin' about it now. Let's just move on
to the next request.
jpnChrName: 今回はこういった趣向ですか。
jpnSearchText: 今回はこういった趣向ですか。

engChrName: Let's do this!
engSearchText: Let's do this!
jpnChrName: 速やかに排除する。
jpnSearchText: 速やかに排除する。

engChrName: Careful. They look strong.
engSearchText: Careful. They look strong.
jpnChrName: 速やかに排除します。
jpnSearchText: 速やかに排除します。

engChrName: We'll be fine.
engSearchText: We'll be fine.
jpnChrName: どのような敵であろうと排除するのみ。
jpnSearchText: どのような敵であろうと排除するのみ。

engChrName: I'm sure we can handle them.
engSearchText: I'm sure we can handle them.
jpnChrName: ふふ、遊ぶとしよか。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、遊ぶとしよか。

engChrName: True, but I doubt they will be any match for us.
engSearchText: True, but I doubt they will be any match for us.
jpnChrName: またなんか仕掛けてくるかもな── 気を付けて対処すんぞ！
jpnSearchText:
またなんか仕掛けてくるかもな──
気を付けて対処すんぞ！

engChrName: Heehee. The stronger, the better.
engSearchText: Heehee. The stronger, the better.
jpnChrName: なんとかなったね。 でも、さっきのあれって……
jpnSearchText:
なんとかなったね。
でも、さっきのあれって……

engChrName: Don't underestimate 'em. We might be in for a nasty surprise here.
engSearchText:
Don't underestimate 'em. We might be in for a nasty
surprise here.
jpnChrName: なんとかなったか。 だがさっきのあれは……
jpnSearchText:
なんとかなったか。
だがさっきのあれは……

engChrName: Well, that takes care of that. You were right about us being in for a surprise.
engSearchText:
Well, that takes care of that. You were right about us
being in for a surprise.
jpnChrName: なんとかなりましたね。 ですがさっきのあれは……
jpnSearchText:
なんとかなりましたね。
ですがさっきのあれは……

engChrName: That about wraps that up. You were right about us being in for a surprise.
engSearchText:
That about wraps that up. You were right about us
being in for a surprise.
jpnChrName: さすがに二度目となると 気のせいでは済まされないわね……
jpnSearchText:
さすがに二度目となると
気のせいでは済まされないわね……

engChrName: Okay, that takes care of that. You were right about us being in for a surprise.
engSearchText:
Okay, that takes care of that. You were right about us
being in for a surprise.
jpnChrName: ええ、先程の魔獣は間違いなく シャードスキルを使って来ました。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、先程の魔獣は間違いなく
シャードスキルを使って来ました。

engChrName: I'm starting to see a pattern here.
engSearchText: I'm starting to see a pattern here.
jpnChrName: シャードスキルってのは、 人間にしか扱えないモンなんじゃねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
シャードスキルってのは、
人間にしか扱えないモンなんじゃねぇのか？

engChrName: Indeed. These monsters are utilizing shard skills—of that I am certain.
engSearchText:
Indeed. These monsters are utilizing shard skills—of
that I am certain.
jpnChrName: シャードスキルって 人間にしか扱えないものじゃないんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
シャードスキルって
人間にしか扱えないものじゃないんですか！？

engChrName: But I thought only humans could use those?
engSearchText: But I thought only humans could use those?
jpnChrName: ザイファによる特殊機能であるため、 そのはずですが……
jpnSearchText:
ザイファによる特殊機能であるため、
そのはずですが……

engChrName: But I thought only humans could use those?!
engSearchText: But I thought only humans could use those?!
jpnChrName: ザイファによる特殊機能だから そのはずなんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ザイファによる特殊機能だから
そのはずなんだけど……

engChrName: That was my understanding as well. They are supposed to be a special feature of Xipha technology.
engSearchText:
That was my understanding as well. They are
supposed to be a special feature of Xipha technology.
jpnChrName: オーブメントなしでもアーツを使える 魔獣がそれなりにいるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
オーブメントなしでもアーツを使える
魔獣がそれなりにいるだろ。

engChrName: That was my understanding, too. They're supposed to be a special feature of Xipha technology.
engSearchText:
That was my understanding, too. They're supposed to
be a special feature of Xipha technology.
jpnChrName: それと同じで、自然界の他の生き物にも シャードを扱える“土台”はあるのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
それと同じで、自然界の他の生き物にも
シャードを扱える“土台”はあるのかもな。

engChrName: I mean, it's not that much of a stretch, right? We've seen monsters that use orbal arts, and they sure as hell aren't packin' orbments.
engSearchText:
I mean, it's not that much of a stretch, right?
We've seen monsters that use orbal arts, and they sure
as hell aren't packin' orbments.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、自然発生したものとも思えんな。
jpnSearchText: とはいえ、自然発生したものとも思えんな。

engChrName: I can buy that some of 'em have the potential to use shard skills, too.
engSearchText:
I can buy that some of 'em have the potential to use
shard skills, too.
jpnChrName: どうも胡散臭くなってきたな。
jpnSearchText: どうも胡散臭くなってきたな。

engChrName: I suppose it's not inconceivable that they have evolved with our technology, but it's happening too fast.
engSearchText:
I suppose it's not inconceivable that they have evolved
with our technology, but it's happening too fast.
jpnChrName: これは……なかなか興味深いですね。
jpnSearchText: これは……なかなか興味深いですね。

engChrName: Yeah. Something's fishy here.
engSearchText: Yeah. Something's fishy here.
jpnChrName: フフ、どうやら面白くなってきたようだ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、どうやら面白くなってきたようだ。

engChrName: What a fascinating conundrum.
engSearchText: What a fascinating conundrum.
jpnChrName: クク、面白くなってきたじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: クク、面白くなってきたじゃねぇか。

engChrName: This is getting interesting.
engSearchText: This is getting interesting.
jpnChrName: このまま残りの１つも討伐しましょうか？ 前の２つと同じタイプかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
このまま残りの１つも討伐しましょうか？
前の２つと同じタイプかもしれません。

engChrName: This is gettin' interesting.
engSearchText: This is gettin' interesting.
jpnChrName: 確かにシャードスキルの件は気になるが……
jpnSearchText: 確かにシャードスキルの件は気になるが……

engChrName: Perhaps the answers will come to us after we finish the third request. Shall we work on that next?
engSearchText:
Perhaps the answers will come to us after we finish
the third request. Shall we work on that next?
jpnChrName: 俺たちの仕事としては、 これで最低限は果たしただろ。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちの仕事としては、
これで最低限は果たしただろ。

engChrName: Up to y'all. Won't deny I'm curious about the whole shard skill thing, but the third request's optional.
engSearchText:
Up to y'all. Won't deny I'm curious about the whole
shard skill thing, but the third request's optional.
jpnChrName: 後１つくらい、他のどこかの勢力が 勝手に討伐するはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
後１つくらい、他のどこかの勢力が
勝手に討伐するはずだ。

engChrName: Bare minimum was to finish two, so we've fulfilled our obligations here.
engSearchText:
Bare minimum was to finish two, so we've fulfilled
our obligations here.
jpnChrName: そうね……いつまでもこんな地下にいたら 気が滅入ってしまうわよ。
jpnSearchText:
そうね……いつまでもこんな地下にいたら
気が滅入ってしまうわよ。

engChrName: If you guys're wiped out, we can leave the last one to some other group.
engSearchText:
If you guys're wiped out, we can leave the last one to
some other group.
jpnChrName: 喉も乾いたし、一旦地上に戻ろうか？
jpnSearchText: 喉も乾いたし、一旦地上に戻ろうか？

engChrName: Now that you mention it, I'm pooped. And thirsty, too.
engSearchText:
Now that you mention it, I'm pooped. And
thirsty, too.
jpnChrName: それがいいだろう。
jpnSearchText: それがいいだろう。

engChrName: You guys wanna head back to the surface? I'd kill for an ice-cold drink right about now.
engSearchText:
You guys wanna head back to the surface? I'd kill for
an ice-cold drink right about now.
jpnChrName: ま、つっても時間にまだ少し余裕はある。
jpnSearchText: ま、つっても時間にまだ少し余裕はある。

engChrName: I feel you there.
engSearchText: I feel you there.
jpnChrName: このまま最後のヤツを討伐しちまうのも 選択肢の一つだな。
jpnSearchText:
このまま最後のヤツを討伐しちまうのも
選択肢の一つだな。

engChrName: Well, we got some time, so if you guys wanna take a break and come back later, we can do that.
engSearchText:
Well, we got some time, so if you guys wanna take a
break and come back later, we can do that.
jpnChrName: 見つけた！
jpnSearchText: 見つけた！

engChrName: I'll leave the choice up to y'all.
engSearchText: I'll leave the choice up to y'all.
jpnChrName: 見つけたぞ！
jpnSearchText: 見つけたぞ！

engChrName: Let's finish this!
engSearchText: Let's finish this!
jpnChrName: ターゲット、見つけました！
jpnSearchText: ターゲット、見つけました！

engChrName: Let's end this!
engSearchText: Let's end this!
jpnChrName: 最後のヤツね！
jpnSearchText: 最後のヤツね！

engChrName: Let's finish this!
engSearchText: Let's finish this!
jpnChrName: ああ、仕上げだ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、仕上げだ！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: 容赦はしません！
jpnSearchText: 容赦はしません！

engChrName: Time for a beatdown!
engSearchText: Time for a beatdown!
jpnChrName: いざ参らん！
jpnSearchText: いざ参らん！

engChrName: I will show no mercy!
engSearchText: I will show no mercy!
jpnChrName: さっさとやっちまうか！
jpnSearchText: さっさとやっちまうか！

engChrName: Then let our battle begin!
engSearchText: Then let our battle begin!
jpnChrName: 今回もシャードスキルを使ってくる 可能性があるから注意しろ！
jpnSearchText:
今回もシャードスキルを使ってくる
可能性があるから注意しろ！

engChrName: I'm gonna go hog wild!
engSearchText: I'm gonna go hog wild!
jpnChrName: 行くぞ！
jpnSearchText: 行くぞ！

engChrName: Keep an eye out for shard skills, everyone!
engSearchText: Keep an eye out for shard skills, everyone!
jpnChrName: やはり、シャードスキルで間違いありません。
jpnSearchText: やはり、シャードスキルで間違いありません。

engChrName: Let's do this thing!
engSearchText: Let's do this thing!
jpnChrName: さすがにそこいらの手配魔獣よりも手強いな。 こんなのがウロチョロしてたら堪ったもんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
さすがにそこいらの手配魔獣よりも手強いな。
こんなのがウロチョロしてたら堪ったもんじゃねえ。

engChrName: Enemy shard skills were in play here as well...
engSearchText: Enemy shard skills were in play here as well...
jpnChrName: 通常の手配魔獣より数段手強い…… こんなの何体もいたら大変ですね。
jpnSearchText:
通常の手配魔獣より数段手強い……
こんなの何体もいたら大変ですね。

engChrName: Whew. These requests were brutal. Good thing we took those things out before they escaped and raised hell on the surface.
engSearchText:
Whew. These requests were brutal. Good thing we
took those things out before they escaped and raised
hell on the surface.
jpnChrName: 普通の手配魔獣よりも大分手強いじゃないか？ さすがに何体もいるとは思いたくないけど……
jpnSearchText:
普通の手配魔獣よりも大分手強いじゃないか？
さすがに何体もいるとは思いたくないけど……

engChrName: Whew. These requests were tough! It's a good thing we took those things out before they escaped and hurt a bunch of people on the surface.
engSearchText:
Whew. These requests were tough! It's a good thing
we took those things out before they escaped and hurt
a bunch of people on the surface.
jpnChrName: こんなヤツらが一気に３体も出現するなんざ、 偶然というには出来すぎてるな。
jpnSearchText:
こんなヤツらが一気に３体も出現するなんざ、
偶然というには出来すぎてるな。

engChrName: Phew. These requests were surprisingly difficult. I hope we don't come across any monsters like those in the future...
engSearchText:
Phew. These requests were surprisingly difficult.
I hope we don't come across any monsters like those
in the future...
jpnChrName: ふむ、何らかの理由があると考えるべきか。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、何らかの理由があると考えるべきか。

engChrName: Wonder where these things came from. It's not every day you run into monsters who can use shard skills.
engSearchText:
Wonder where these things came from. It's not every
day you run into monsters who can use shard skills.
jpnChrName: ん？　何か落ちてる。
jpnSearchText: ん？　何か落ちてる。

engChrName: Indeed. There must be more to this story than meets the eye.
engSearchText:
Indeed. There must be more to this story than meets
the eye.
jpnChrName: あそこになにか落ちているような……
jpnSearchText: あそこになにか落ちているような……

engChrName: Hmm? There's something on the floor.
engSearchText: Hmm? There's something on the floor.
jpnChrName: おや？　何か落ちているみたいね。
jpnSearchText: おや？　何か落ちているみたいね。

engChrName: There seems to be something on the floor...
engSearchText: There seems to be something on the floor...
jpnChrName: あら、魔獣の落とし物か？
jpnSearchText: あら、魔獣の落とし物か？

engChrName: Hmm? There's something on the floor.
engSearchText: Hmm? There's something on the floor.
jpnChrName: こいつは……
jpnSearchText: こいつは……

engChrName: Hmm? There's something on the ground.
engSearchText: Hmm? There's something on the ground.
jpnChrName: 何かの部品みたいね。 『ZA-SSM03』……どういう意味かしら？
jpnSearchText:
何かの部品みたいね。
『ZA-SSM03』……どういう意味かしら？

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: 推測になりますが、“SSM”は “シャードスキルモジュール”の略称──
jpnSearchText:
推測になりますが、“SSM”は
“シャードスキルモジュール”の略称──

engChrName: Looks like a machine part or something. It says 'ZA-SSM03'... What could that mean?
engSearchText:
Looks like a machine part or something. It
says 'ZA-SSM03'... What could that mean?
jpnChrName: “03”はそのまま３番目 という意味かもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
“03”はそのまま３番目
という意味かもしれません。

engChrName: I believe SSM may stand for 'Shard Skill Module'.
engSearchText: I believe SSM may stand for 'Shard Skill Module'.
jpnChrName: シャードスキルモジュール！？
jpnSearchText: シャードスキルモジュール！？

engChrName: And the 03 would indicate that this is the third such module.
engSearchText:
And the 03 would indicate that this is the third
such module.
jpnChrName: ということは、さっきの魔獣がシャードスキルを 使えたのはこのユニットが原因……
jpnSearchText:
ということは、さっきの魔獣がシャードスキルを
使えたのはこのユニットが原因……

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: シャードスキルモジュールだと！？
jpnSearchText: シャードスキルモジュールだと！？

engChrName: Then they were only able to use shard skills because of this unit?
engSearchText:
Then they were only able to use shard skills because
of this unit?
jpnChrName: するとなんだ、さっきの魔獣がシャードスキルを 使えたのはこいつのせいだってのか？
jpnSearchText:
するとなんだ、さっきの魔獣がシャードスキルを
使えたのはこいつのせいだってのか？

engChrName: What the hell?!
engSearchText: What the hell?!
jpnChrName: あくまで可能性に過ぎませんが。
jpnSearchText: あくまで可能性に過ぎませんが。

engChrName: So they were able to use shard skills because of this thing?
engSearchText:
So they were able to use shard skills because of
this thing?
jpnChrName: だが状況には合致している。
jpnSearchText: だが状況には合致している。

engChrName: That is but one possibility. Though it is likely, yes.
engSearchText: That is but one possibility. Though it is likely, yes.
jpnChrName: にわかに信じられないけど、 そうとしか考えられないのも確かね……
jpnSearchText:
にわかに信じられないけど、
そうとしか考えられないのも確かね……

engChrName: That would certainly explain it.
engSearchText: That would certainly explain it.
jpnChrName: あり得ない話じゃねえが…… すると“ZA”は何なんだ？
jpnSearchText:
あり得ない話じゃねえが……
すると“ZA”は何なんだ？

engChrName: It's kinda hard to believe, but it's just about the only explanation that makes sense.
engSearchText:
It's kinda hard to believe, but it's just about the only
explanation that makes sense.
jpnChrName: 興味深い話ですね。 となると、問題は“ZA”の意味ですが……
jpnSearchText:
興味深い話ですね。
となると、問題は“ZA”の意味ですが……

engChrName: Yeah, I'm starting to buy it, too. But what could the 'ZA' part mean?
engSearchText:
Yeah, I'm starting to buy it, too. But what could the
'ZA' part mean?
jpnChrName: そのような技術があろうとは。 となると、“ZA”は一体……
jpnSearchText:
そのような技術があろうとは。
となると、“ZA”は一体……

engChrName: Fascinating. But you haven't explained the 'ZA' portion of the code. What could that mean?
engSearchText:
Fascinating. But you haven't explained the 'ZA'
portion of the code. What could that mean?
jpnChrName: 面白れぇ話じゃねぇか。 って、“ZA”は何なんだ？
jpnSearchText:
面白れぇ話じゃねぇか。
って、“ZA”は何なんだ？

engChrName: Agreed. But what of the 'ZA' portion the code?
engSearchText: Agreed. But what of the 'ZA' portion the code?
jpnChrName: つい最近聞いた名の中に 該当するのがいたな……
jpnSearchText:
つい最近聞いた名の中に
該当するのがいたな……

engChrName: Isn't that somethin'. So what's the 'ZA' bit, then?
engSearchText: Isn't that somethin'. So what's the 'ZA' bit, then?
jpnChrName: 今回の“ゲーム”にも参加した新興武器メーカー ──《ゼクトアームズ》だ。
jpnSearchText:
今回の“ゲーム”にも参加した新興武器メーカー
──《ゼクトアームズ》だ。

engChrName: I have a feeling it comes from a name we've all heard recently.
engSearchText:
I have a feeling it comes from a name we've all
heard recently.
jpnChrName: 《ゼクトアームズ》……
jpnSearchText: 《ゼクトアームズ》……

engChrName: The up-and-coming weapons manufacturer that just so happened to make an appearance in this game: Zecht Arms.
engSearchText:
The up-and-coming weapons manufacturer that just
so happened to make an appearance in this game:
Zecht Arms.
jpnChrName: 確か第３フェーズまで残った連中だな。
jpnSearchText: 確か第３フェーズまで残った連中だな。

engChrName: That would make sense...
engSearchText: That would make sense...
jpnChrName: 《ゼクトアームズ》……
jpnSearchText: 《ゼクトアームズ》……

engChrName: They were one of the teams that made it to the third round, right?
engSearchText:
They were one of the teams that made it to the third
round, right?
jpnChrName: 確か第３フェーズまで残った連中だな。
jpnSearchText: 確か第３フェーズまで残った連中だな。

engChrName: Wait, really? Them?
engSearchText: Wait, really? Them?
jpnChrName: 《ゼクトアームズ》……
jpnSearchText: 《ゼクトアームズ》……

engChrName: They were one of the teams that made it to the third round, right?
engSearchText:
They were one of the teams that made it to the third
round, right?
jpnChrName: 確か第３フェーズまで 残ったチームだったっけ……
jpnSearchText:
確か第３フェーズまで
残ったチームだったっけ……

engChrName: Wait, really? Them?
engSearchText: Wait, really? Them?
jpnChrName: これもお前の方が詳しいだろ、 なにせライバル会社だ。
jpnSearchText:
これもお前の方が詳しいだろ、
なにせライバル会社だ。

engChrName: They were one of the teams that made it to the third round, weren't they?
engSearchText:
They were one of the teams that made it to the third
round, weren't they?
jpnChrName: 競合するのはあくまで一部の業務だけですが、 基本情報は押さえています。
jpnSearchText:
競合するのはあくまで一部の業務だけですが、
基本情報は押さえています。

engChrName: You probably know more about 'em than any of us, Risette, since, well, they're your competitor.
engSearchText:
You probably know more about 'em than any of us,
Risette, since, well, they're your competitor.
jpnChrName: ５年ほど前に設立され、大戦前から本格的に 市場に食い込んできた武器メーカー。
jpnSearchText:
５年ほど前に設立され、大戦前から本格的に
市場に食い込んできた武器メーカー。

engChrName: I would not consider them a full-on competitor, but yes, I am aware of their general operations and have kept abreast of their developments.
engSearchText:
I would not consider them a full-on competitor, but
yes, I am aware of their general operations and have
kept abreast of their developments.
jpnChrName: 最近は我が社同様“警備委託”などの領域にも 手を出そうとしていますが……
jpnSearchText:
最近は我が社同様“警備委託”などの領域にも
手を出そうとしていますが……

engChrName: The company was established about five years ago, and they have been aggressively increasing their market share since before the war began.
engSearchText:
The company was established about five years ago,
and they have been aggressively increasing their
market share since before the war began.
jpnChrName: まだ目立った成果はないようです。
jpnSearchText: まだ目立った成果はないようです。

engChrName: Their recent attempts to expand into contracted security put them in direct competition with us.
engSearchText:
Their recent attempts to expand into contracted
security put them in direct competition with us.
jpnChrName: 噂では従来の武器や警備マシナリィ設計とは 異なるアプローチを試しているとか……
jpnSearchText:
噂では従来の武器や警備マシナリィ設計とは
異なるアプローチを試しているとか……

engChrName: They have seen little success in that area, but that hasn't deterred them.
engSearchText:
They have seen little success in that area, but that
hasn't deterred them.
jpnChrName: さっきの部品もその一環ってわけ？
jpnSearchText: さっきの部品もその一環ってわけ？

engChrName: I have heard rumors that they were experimenting with traditional weaponry and patrol machinery.
engSearchText:
I have heard rumors that they were experimenting
with traditional weaponry and patrol machinery.
jpnChrName: 魔獣にシャードスキルを使わせる……
jpnSearchText: 魔獣にシャードスキルを使わせる……

engChrName: I wonder if the things we just fought were the result of that.
engSearchText:
I wonder if the things we just fought were the result
of that.
jpnChrName: いや、最終目的は 魔獣そのものを操ることなのかも？
jpnSearchText:
いや、最終目的は
魔獣そのものを操ることなのかも？

engChrName: But what's the benefit in giving monsters the ability to use shard skills? Why go to all this effort?
engSearchText:
But what's the benefit in giving monsters the ability
to use shard skills? Why go to all this effort?
jpnChrName: 魔獣にシャードスキルを使わせるとはな……
jpnSearchText: 魔獣にシャードスキルを使わせるとはな……

engChrName: Oh. Perhaps they're seeking to use that technology to control the monsters.
engSearchText:
Oh. Perhaps they're seeking to use that technology to
control the monsters.
jpnChrName: いや、最終目的はその魔獣を操ることか？
jpnSearchText: いや、最終目的はその魔獣を操ることか？

engChrName: But what's the point in giving monsters the ability to use shard skills? Seems like a lot of work for no payoff.
engSearchText:
But what's the point in giving monsters the ability to
use shard skills? Seems like a lot of work for
no payoff.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そうだとしたら なかなかイカれた発想だな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そうだとしたら
なかなかイカれた発想だな。

engChrName: No, wait. They might be able to use this tech to control monsters. Maybe that's what they're after?
engSearchText:
No, wait. They might be able to use this tech to
control monsters. Maybe that's what they're after?
jpnChrName: 《ゼクトアームズ》……奴らは雇われて ここへ来たわけじゃねえのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
《ゼクトアームズ》……奴らは雇われて
ここへ来たわけじゃねえのかもな。

engChrName: Might be on to something.
engSearchText: Might be on to something.
jpnChrName: 名を売るためってのもあるかもだが、 本当の狙いは恐らく──
jpnSearchText:
名を売るためってのもあるかもだが、
本当の狙いは恐らく──

engChrName: But if that's their endgame, I doubt they're under contract. I'm thinkin' they came of their own volition.
engSearchText:
But if that's their endgame, I doubt they're
under contract. I'm thinkin' they came of their
own volition.
jpnChrName: 実験、でしょうね。
jpnSearchText: 実験、でしょうね。

engChrName: Can't deny that winning this game is a decent way to get your name out there. Good for optics, too.
engSearchText:
Can't deny that winning this game is a decent way to
get your name out there. Good for optics, too.
jpnChrName: 新兵器、ひいては魔獣をも利用した 何らかの運用テスト……
jpnSearchText:
新兵器、ひいては魔獣をも利用した
何らかの運用テスト……

engChrName: And there's another undeniable benefit.
engSearchText: And there's another undeniable benefit.
jpnChrName: 確かに、強者集うこの地なら この上なく適任と言えよう。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、強者集うこの地なら
この上なく適任と言えよう。

engChrName: This place is a breeding ground for powerful monsters, which makes it a perfect venue to test their new weaponry.
engSearchText:
This place is a breeding ground for powerful
monsters, which makes it a perfect venue to test their
new weaponry.

engChrName: And by pitting them against us and the other players, they can gather a not-insignificant amount of combat data.
engSearchText:
And by pitting them against us and the other players,
they can gather a not-insignificant amount of
combat data.
jpnChrName: （師父（せんせい）……？）
jpnSearchText: （師父（せんせい）……？）

jpnChrName: オラシオンのこの状況と魔獣をも 利用しようとした武器メーカーか……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンのこの状況と魔獣をも
利用しようとした武器メーカーか……

engChrName: (What's he thinkin' about?)
engSearchText: (What's he thinkin' about?)
jpnChrName: かなり怪しい。
jpnSearchText: かなり怪しい。

engChrName: So they're taking advantage of this situation AND making use of the monsters here for their own ends.
engSearchText:
So they're taking advantage of this situation AND
making use of the monsters here for their own ends.
jpnChrName: そうだな……だが民間人に被害が 出ていない以上、俺たちにできることは限られる。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……だが民間人に被害が
出ていない以上、俺たちにできることは限られる。

engChrName: What they're doing has suspicious written all over it.
engSearchText: What they're doing has suspicious written all over it.
jpnChrName: 何らかの違法性が認められれば別だがな。
jpnSearchText: 何らかの違法性が認められれば別だがな。

engChrName: Won't argue with you there. Though as long as they aren't laying a finger on any civilians, our hands are tied.
engSearchText:
Won't argue with you there. Though as long as they
aren't laying a finger on any civilians, our hands
are tied.
jpnChrName: 一応、今後も注意しておこう。
jpnSearchText: 一応、今後も注意しておこう。

engChrName: But if we could prove they're doing something illegal, that'd be a whole different story.
engSearchText:
But if we could prove they're doing something illegal,
that'd be a whole different story.
jpnChrName: 魔獣によるシャードスキルの使用と その利用ですか……
jpnSearchText:
魔獣によるシャードスキルの使用と
その利用ですか……

engChrName: We'll just keep this in the back of our minds for now.
engSearchText: We'll just keep this in the back of our minds for now.
jpnChrName: いやはや、本当に興味深いものを 見ました。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、本当に興味深いものを
見ました。

engChrName: So they donned the role of puppeteer. They placed those monsters on a string and had them dancing to their whims.
engSearchText:
So they donned the role of puppeteer. They placed
those monsters on a string and had them dancing to
their whims.
jpnChrName: また何かろくでもねえことを 考えてんだな？
jpnSearchText:
また何かろくでもねえことを
考えてんだな？

engChrName: It's such an ingenious idea, I'm almost jealous I didn't come up with it myself.
engSearchText:
It's such an ingenious idea, I'm almost jealous I didn't
come up with it myself.
jpnChrName: また何かろくでもねえことを 考えてんだな？
jpnSearchText:
また何かろくでもねえことを
考えてんだな？

engChrName: You better not be thinking about stealing it.
engSearchText: You better not be thinking about stealing it.
jpnChrName: 恐らく件の会社との取引を 視野に入れている所でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
恐らく件の会社との取引を
視野に入れている所でしょう。

engChrName: Better not be thinkin' about stealing it.
engSearchText: Better not be thinkin' about stealing it.
jpnChrName: さすが長年の付き合いだけあって、 銀殿は良く分かっていますね。
jpnSearchText:
さすが長年の付き合いだけあって、
銀殿は良く分かっていますね。

engChrName: I doubt he would stoop that low, but he's almost certainly thinking about striking a deal with them at this very moment.
engSearchText:
I doubt he would stoop that low, but he's almost
certainly thinking about striking a deal with them at
this very moment.
jpnChrName: あまり嬉しくはありませんが……
jpnSearchText: あまり嬉しくはありませんが……

engChrName: You know me too well.
engSearchText: You know me too well.
jpnChrName: 魔獣の使役は古来より存在する技術ではあるけど、 いわゆる調教とはまったく違うようだね。
jpnSearchText:
魔獣の使役は古来より存在する技術ではあるけど、
いわゆる調教とはまったく違うようだね。

engChrName: Sadly...
engSearchText: Sadly...
jpnChrName: 表側の一武器メーカーとは言え、 なかなか侮れぬものかと。
jpnSearchText:
表側の一武器メーカーとは言え、
なかなか侮れぬものかと。

engChrName: Controlling monsters with technology? Well, that's a new one.
engSearchText:
Controlling monsters with technology? Well, that's a
new one.
jpnChrName: といっても、技術もまだ不完全みたいだし、 さすがに君たちほどではないかな？
jpnSearchText:
といっても、技術もまだ不完全みたいだし、
さすがに君たちほどではないかな？

engChrName: They claim to be an ordinary weapons manufacturer, but they are clearly anything but.
engSearchText:
They claim to be an ordinary weapons manufacturer,
but they are clearly anything but.
jpnChrName: 恐れ入ります。
jpnSearchText: 恐れ入ります。

engChrName: The tech's clearly far from complete, though, so I'd say they're still no match for you and your company.
engSearchText:
The tech's clearly far from complete, though, so I'd
say they're still no match for you and your company.
jpnChrName: シャードスキルを使う魔獣とその利用か……
jpnSearchText: <C1>シャードスキルを使う魔獣とその利用か……

engChrName: You flatter us.
engSearchText: You flatter us.
jpnChrName: ククク、マルドゥック以外にも こんな愉快な会社があるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
ククク、マルドゥック以外にも
こんな愉快な会社があるとはな。

engChrName: So they're controlling monsters with technology, huh?
engSearchText: So they're controlling monsters with technology, huh?
jpnChrName: この声は……！
jpnSearchText: この声は……！

engChrName: Heheh. I see Marduk isn't the only company that's concocting devious schemes behind the scenes.
engSearchText:
Heheh. I see Marduk isn't the only company that's
concocting devious schemes behind the scenes.
jpnChrName: 《破戒》か！？
jpnSearchText: 《破戒》か！？

engChrName: That voice!
engSearchText: That voice!
jpnChrName: 話は聞かせてもらったぜ。 レティたちも、暇つぶし以上の収穫だな？
jpnSearchText:
話は聞かせてもらったぜ。
レティたちも、暇つぶし以上の収穫だな？

engChrName: The Oathbreaker!
engSearchText: The Oathbreaker!
jpnChrName: ええ、ほんまに。
jpnSearchText: ええ、ほんまに。

engChrName: I thought you were only going out to kill time. I didn't think you would chance on something so exciting.
engSearchText:
I thought you were only going out to kill time.
I didn't think you would chance on something
so exciting.
jpnChrName: 俺たちの会話を聞いてたのかよ……
jpnSearchText: 俺たちの会話を聞いてたのかよ……

engChrName: Nor did I.
engSearchText: Nor did I.
jpnChrName: さっきヴァルターが通信を 入れてくれたおかげでな。
jpnSearchText:
さっきヴァルターが通信を
入れてくれたおかげでな。

engChrName: You heard everything we were saying, huh?
engSearchText: You heard everything we were saying, huh?
jpnChrName: 意外とマメなんだね……
jpnSearchText: 意外とマメなんだね……

engChrName: Not everything. I only started listening in after Walter called me.
engSearchText:
Not everything. I only started listening in after
Walter called me.
jpnChrName: 帰った後で報告するのも面倒だからな、 自分で聞けってことだ。
jpnSearchText:
帰った後で報告するのも面倒だからな、
自分で聞けってことだ。

engChrName: Wow. You're actually reporting to your boss? He must have you on a tight leash if you're being an obedient little dog.
engSearchText:
Wow. You're actually reporting to your boss?
He must have you on a tight leash if you're being an
obedient little dog.
jpnChrName: どうせこれも、何かエグいことに 使えるとか思ってんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
どうせこれも、何かエグいことに
使えるとか思ってんだろ。

engChrName: Pshaw. It ain't like that. I just couldn't be assed to explain it all to him once we got back.
engSearchText:
Pshaw. It ain't like that. I just couldn't be assed to
explain it all to him once we got back.
jpnChrName: ハハ、どちらかと言うと 俺よりも《博士》が飛びつきそうだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、どちらかと言うと
俺よりも《博士》が飛びつきそうだがな。

engChrName: You guys better watch out, by the way. If he got his grubby little hands on this tech, there's no tellin' what carnage he'd create.
engSearchText:
You guys better watch out, by the way. If he got his
grubby little hands on this tech, there's no tellin' what
carnage he'd create.
jpnChrName: 言っとくがアンタはこれ以上──
jpnSearchText: 言っとくがアンタはこれ以上──

engChrName: To be honest, I'd say this is more up the professor's alley. This stuff's way outside my wheelhouse.
engSearchText:
To be honest, I'd say this is more up the
professor's alley. This stuff's way outside
my wheelhouse.
jpnChrName: 分かってる分かってる…… あくまで今後の参考に、だ。
jpnSearchText:
分かってる分かってる……
あくまで今後の参考に、だ。

engChrName: I hope I don't need to remind you that you better not—
engSearchText:
I hope I don't need to remind you that you better
not—
jpnChrName: そんじゃオジサンはこの辺で。 最終舞台の演目、楽しみにしてるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃオジサンはこの辺で。
最終舞台の演目、楽しみにしてるぜ。

engChrName: I know, I know. I'm just taking notes for future reference.
engSearchText:
I know, I know. I'm just taking notes for
future reference.
jpnChrName: まったく油断ならねぇヤツだ……
jpnSearchText: まったく油断ならねぇヤツだ……

engChrName: I'll leave you be for now. I'm eagerly awaiting the final act of this thrilling drama.
engSearchText:
I'll leave you be for now. I'm eagerly awaiting the
final act of this thrilling drama.
jpnChrName: 何はともあれ、手配魔獣は これで全部片付いたな。
jpnSearchText:
何はともあれ、手配魔獣は
これで全部片付いたな。

engChrName: You can't let your guard down around that guy for even a second...
engSearchText:
You can't let your guard down around that guy for
even a second...
jpnChrName: 《ゼクトアームズ》のことも気になりますが、 今は優先すべきことがあるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
《ゼクトアームズ》のことも気になりますが、
今は優先すべきことがあるでしょう。

engChrName: Anyway, that's the last of the monster extermination requests.
engSearchText:
Anyway, that's the last of the monster
extermination requests.
jpnChrName: ああ、地上に戻って、 最終フェーズに備えよう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、地上に戻って、
最終フェーズに備えよう。

engChrName: Indeed. I am concerned about what Zecht Arms is plotting, but we have more urgent matters to attend to.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I am concerned about what Zecht Arms is
plotting, but we have more urgent matters to
attend to.
jpnChrName: （そういや今は、走り屋の連中から   参加者を集めるよう頼まれてたんだったな。）
jpnSearchText:
（そういや今は、走り屋の連中から
参加者を集めるよう頼まれてたんだったな。）

engChrName: Yeah. For now we've gotta get back to the surface and start getting ready for the final round.
engSearchText:
Yeah. For now we've gotta get back to the surface and
start getting ready for the final round.
jpnChrName: （コイツもそういうのには興味ありそうだが……）
jpnSearchText: （コイツもそういうのには興味ありそうだが……）

engChrName: (Oh, right. Those street racers asked me to do some scouting.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, right. Those street racers asked me to do
some scouting.)
jpnChrName: あ？　何だよ。 言いたい事があんなら言えっての。
jpnSearchText:
あ？　何だよ。
言いたい事があんなら言えっての。

engChrName: (Wonder if he'd be interested in takin' part?)
engSearchText: (Wonder if he'd be interested in takin' part?)
jpnChrName: （言うだけ言ってみるか……）
jpnSearchText: （言うだけ言ってみるか……）

engChrName: Huh? What'cha staring at me for? If you've got something to say, then say it.
engSearchText:
Huh? What'cha staring at me for? If you've got
something to say, then say it.
jpnChrName: 実は走り屋の連中から依頼を受けててな……
jpnSearchText: 実は走り屋の連中から依頼を受けててな……

engChrName: (Well, can't hurt to ask.)
engSearchText: (Well, can't hurt to ask.)
jpnChrName: ヴァンはグレアム達からの 依頼内容を説明した。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはグレアム達からの
依頼内容を説明した。

engChrName: I've got a question for ya. You see, a bunch of racers asked me to do something for 'em, and...
engSearchText:
I've got a question for ya. You see, a bunch of racers
asked me to do something for 'em, and...
jpnChrName: へぇ、そういう事ならオレも参加していいんだよな？
jpnSearchText: へぇ、そういう事ならオレも参加していいんだよな？

engChrName: Van explained the details of the request.
engSearchText: Van explained the details of the request.
jpnChrName: ああ、だが何に乗るつもりなんだ？
jpnSearchText: ああ、だが何に乗るつもりなんだ？

engChrName: So you want me to be a part of this race, huh?
engSearchText: So you want me to be a part of this race, huh?
jpnChrName: 実は記念祭の間はジジイから バイクを借りるっつう話になっててな。
jpnSearchText:
実は記念祭の間はジジイから
バイクを借りるっつう話になっててな。

engChrName: Yeah. You got something to drive with?
engSearchText: Yeah. You got something to drive with?
jpnChrName: ……だがまあ、レースとなると 傷を付けちまう可能性もある訳か。
jpnSearchText:
……だがまあ、レースとなると
傷を付けちまう可能性もある訳か。

engChrName: I'm borrowing your old master's motorbike till the end of the festival, so I could use that.
engSearchText:
I'm borrowing your old master's motorbike till the
end of the festival, so I could use that.
jpnChrName: レースに参加してもいいか 一応聞いとくとくべきかもな。
jpnSearchText:
レースに参加してもいいか
一応聞いとくとくべきかもな。

engChrName: Though it could get damaged in the race. Maybe I should run this past him first...
engSearchText:
Though it could get damaged in the race. Maybe I
should run this past him first...
jpnChrName: そういう事なら今連絡しちまえよ。
jpnSearchText: そういう事なら今連絡しちまえよ。

engChrName: Eh, I'm lazy. It should be fine.
engSearchText: Eh, I'm lazy. It should be fine.
jpnChrName: へいへいっと……
jpnSearchText: へいへいっと……

engChrName: Get your ass on the phone, my dude.
engSearchText: Get your ass on the phone, my dude.
jpnChrName: アーロンはベルガルドに連絡をした。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アーロンはベルガルドに連絡をした。

engChrName: Fiiiiiine.
engSearchText: Fiiiiiine.
jpnChrName: 許可が取れたぜ。 若人たちで楽しんでこいだとよ。
jpnSearchText:
許可が取れたぜ。
若人たちで楽しんでこいだとよ。

engChrName: Aaron reached out to Bergard.
engSearchText: Aaron reached out to Bergard.
jpnChrName: それならこれで１人追加だな。 言っとくが傷つけねえように気を付けろよ？
jpnSearchText:
それならこれで１人追加だな。
言っとくが傷つけねえように気を付けろよ？

engChrName: Done. He said, 'Go wild.'
engSearchText: Done. He said, 'Go wild.'
jpnChrName: わーってるっつの。
jpnSearchText: わーってるっつの。

engChrName: Cool. That's one less person I need to find. But be EXTRA careful not to damage it, you hear?
engSearchText:
Cool. That's one less person I need to find. But be
EXTRA careful not to damage it, you hear?
jpnChrName: これで目ぼしい奴全員に 声をかけ終わったな。
jpnSearchText:
これで目ぼしい奴全員に
声をかけ終わったな。

engChrName: I know, I know. Lay off me, will you?
engSearchText: I know, I know. Lay off me, will you?
jpnChrName: 次は走り屋のあいつらに 報告をしに行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
次は走り屋のあいつらに
報告をしに行くとするか。

engChrName: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
engSearchText: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
jpnChrName: 実は今請け負ってる依頼について、 師父（せんせい）に相談があるんですが……
jpnSearchText:
実は今請け負ってる依頼について、
師父（せんせい）に相談があるんですが……

engChrName: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
engSearchText: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
jpnChrName: ふむ……？　詳しく聞かせてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText: ふむ……？　詳しく聞かせてもらおうか。

engChrName: I'm working on a job at the moment, and there was something I wanted to ask you about.
engSearchText:
I'm working on a job at the moment, and there was
something I wanted to ask you about.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはグレアム達からの 依頼内容を説明した。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはグレアム達からの
依頼内容を説明した。

engChrName: Oh? Well, I'm all ears.
engSearchText: Oh? Well, I'm all ears.
jpnChrName: 成程な、そういう事なら アーロンに声をかけてみるのはどうだ。
jpnSearchText:
成程な、そういう事なら
アーロンに声をかけてみるのはどうだ。

engChrName: Van explained the details of the request.
engSearchText: Van explained the details of the request.
jpnChrName: おっと、どうしてアイツなんですか？ バイク乗りの師父ならともかく。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、どうしてアイツなんですか？
バイク乗りの師父ならともかく。

engChrName: You want me to participate in a racing competition? Hmm... Why not ask Aaron instead?
engSearchText:
You want me to participate in a racing competition?
Hmm... Why not ask Aaron instead?
jpnChrName: 実は記念祭の間にバイクを貸す約束をしていてな。
jpnSearchText: 実は記念祭の間にバイクを貸す約束をしていてな。

engChrName: Huh? Why him? You're the one with the motorbike.
engSearchText: Huh? Why him? You're the one with the motorbike.
jpnChrName: マシンを飛ばすには絶好の機会であろうし、 あやつも参加したがるのではないか？
jpnSearchText:
マシンを飛ばすには絶好の機会であろうし、
あやつも参加したがるのではないか？

engChrName: Actually, I lent it to him for the duration of the festival.
engSearchText:
Actually, I lent it to him for the duration of
the festival.
jpnChrName: そういう事なら確かに……
jpnSearchText: そういう事なら確かに……

engChrName: He would jump at the chance to join. I'm sure he'd love to put those wheels through their paces.
engSearchText:
He would jump at the chance to join. I'm sure he'd
love to put those wheels through their paces.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、師父こそ参加しなくてもいいんですか？ それこそ飛ばすには絶好の機会でしょうに。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、師父こそ参加しなくてもいいんですか？
それこそ飛ばすには絶好の機会でしょうに。

engChrName: I guess. I could see him gettin' a kick outta this.
engSearchText: I guess. I could see him gettin' a kick outta this.
jpnChrName: ふふ、若者の勝負にこの老骨が しゃしゃり出るのは忍びないのでな。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、若者の勝負にこの老骨が
しゃしゃり出るのは忍びないのでな。

engChrName: But the same goes for you, Master. I figured you'd enjoy the thrill of the race.
engSearchText:
But the same goes for you, Master. I figured you'd
enjoy the thrill of the race.
jpnChrName: お前達で存分に楽しんで来るといい。
jpnSearchText: お前達で存分に楽しんで来るといい。

engChrName: I would rather pass the torch to you young'uns. I'm getting too old for this, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
I would rather pass the torch to you young'uns.
I'm getting too old for this, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: 分かりましたよ、それじゃ連絡を 入れてみるんで少し待っていてください。
jpnSearchText:
分かりましたよ、それじゃ連絡を
入れてみるんで少し待っていてください。

engChrName: Why don't you give him a call? I'm sure he'd say yes in a heartbeat.
engSearchText:
Why don't you give him a call? I'm sure he'd say yes
in a heartbeat.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはアーロンに連絡をした。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンはアーロンに連絡をした。

engChrName: All righty. One minute.
engSearchText: All righty. One minute.
jpnChrName: 連絡が付きました。 アイツも参加するそうです。
jpnSearchText:
連絡が付きました。
アイツも参加するそうです。

engChrName: Van reached out to Aaron.
engSearchText: Van reached out to Aaron.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうか。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうか。

engChrName: Welp, you were right. Soon as the word 'race' left my mouth, he was right on board.
engSearchText:
Welp, you were right. Soon as the word 'race' left my
mouth, he was right on board.
jpnChrName: 私の愛車と共に、 存分に風を感じて来てもらわなければな。
jpnSearchText:
私の愛車と共に、
存分に風を感じて来てもらわなければな。

engChrName: Heh. I thought as much.
engSearchText: Heh. I thought as much.
jpnChrName: それじゃこれで、参加者は１人追加ですね。
jpnSearchText: それじゃこれで、参加者は１人追加ですね。

engChrName: I'm sure he will have a great time. You all have fun out there.
engSearchText:
I'm sure he will have a great time. You all have fun
out there.
jpnChrName: さてと、目ぼしい奴全員に これで声をかけ終わりました。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、目ぼしい奴全員に
これで声をかけ終わりました。

engChrName: Awesome. That's one less person I need to find.
engSearchText: Awesome. That's one less person I need to find.
jpnChrName: 次は走り屋のあいつらに 報告をしに行くとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
次は走り屋のあいつらに
報告をしに行くとしましょう。

engChrName: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
engSearchText: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
jpnChrName: “匂い”はまだ残ってる。 他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
“匂い”はまだ残ってる。
他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。

engChrName: All that's left is to loop back with the racers.
engSearchText: All that's left is to loop back with the racers.
jpnChrName: ……まだ“匂い”が残ってんな。 残りの掲示板も見ておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
……まだ“匂い”が残ってんな。
残りの掲示板も見ておくとするか。

engChrName: There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other bulletin boards.
engSearchText:
There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other
bulletin boards.
jpnChrName: これで匂う掲示板は一通り回れたな。
jpnSearchText: これで匂う掲示板は一通り回れたな。

engChrName: Hmm... The scent's still not gone. I'll check the next board.
engSearchText:
Hmm... The scent's still not gone. I'll check the
next board.
jpnChrName: では今日の依頼は３つですね。
jpnSearchText: では今日の依頼は３つですね。

engChrName: Okay, the scent's gone. Means all the boards have been checked.
engSearchText:
Okay, the scent's gone. Means all the boards have
been checked.
jpnChrName: 全部で依頼は３つですか。
jpnSearchText: 全部で依頼は３つですか。

engChrName: That means we have a total of three tasks to take care of today.
engSearchText:
That means we have a total of three tasks to take care
of today.
jpnChrName: ハッ、今日の依頼は３つか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、今日の依頼は３つか。

engChrName: So we've got three tasks to take care of today, huh?
engSearchText: So we've got three tasks to take care of today, huh?
jpnChrName: ま、既にノルマは達成済みだ。
jpnSearchText: ま、既にノルマは達成済みだ。

engChrName: Only three tasks for today? Nice.
engSearchText: Only three tasks for today? Nice.
jpnChrName: 余裕があればこの案件も片付けるとすっか。
jpnSearchText: 余裕があればこの案件も片付けるとすっか。

engChrName: All right. We've met our quota for the day.
engSearchText: All right. We've met our quota for the day.
jpnChrName: ──とりあえずノルマは２つだな。
jpnSearchText: ──とりあえずノルマは２つだな。

engChrName: We can take care of the other job if we want, but it ain't mandatory.
engSearchText:
We can take care of the other job if we want, but it
ain't mandatory.
jpnChrName: ──とりあえずノルマは２つだな。 とっとと片付けるとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
──とりあえずノルマは２つだな。
とっとと片付けるとすっか。

engChrName: We've gotta take care of at least two jobs today.
engSearchText: We've gotta take care of at least two jobs today.
jpnChrName: にしてもこの依頼は……
jpnSearchText: にしてもこの依頼は……

engChrName: We've gotta take care of at least two jobs today. Let's get 'em done.
engSearchText:
We've gotta take care of at least two jobs today.
Let's get 'em done.
jpnChrName: “匂い”はまだ残ってる。 他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
“匂い”はまだ残ってる。
他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。

engChrName: Oh, this job looks interesting.
engSearchText: Oh, this job looks interesting.
jpnChrName: ……まだ“匂い”が残ってんな。 残りの掲示板も見ておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
……まだ“匂い”が残ってんな。
残りの掲示板も見ておくとするか。

engChrName: There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other bulletin boards.
engSearchText:
There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other
bulletin boards.
jpnChrName: よし、匂う掲示板は一通り回れたな。
jpnSearchText: よし、匂う掲示板は一通り回れたな。

engChrName: Hmm... The scent's still not gone. I'll check the next board.
engSearchText:
Hmm... The scent's still not gone. I'll check the
next board.
jpnChrName: では本日の依頼は３つとなりますね。
jpnSearchText: では本日の依頼は３つとなりますね。

engChrName: Okay, that's all the boards checked.
engSearchText: Okay, that's all the boards checked.
jpnChrName: ああ、既にノルマは果たしたが 余裕があればこいつも片付けるとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、既にノルマは果たしたが
余裕があればこいつも片付けるとすっか。

engChrName: We have three jobs on today's docket.
engSearchText: We have three jobs on today's docket.
jpnChrName: ああ、このうち２つをノルマにするぞ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、このうち２つをノルマにするぞ。

engChrName: Yeah. We've already hit our quota, but if you guys wanna take care of this one, too, then I'm game.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We've already hit our quota, but if you guys
wanna take care of this one, too, then I'm game.
jpnChrName: 了解です、引き続き頑張りましょう。
jpnSearchText: 了解です、引き続き頑張りましょう。

engChrName: Yeah. We've gotta at least take care of two of 'em by the day's end.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We've gotta at least take care of two of 'em by
the day's end.
jpnChrName: “匂い”はまだ残ってる。 他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
“匂い”はまだ残ってる。
他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。

engChrName: All right, then.
engSearchText: All right, then.
jpnChrName: ──これで匂う掲示板は一通り回れたな。
jpnSearchText: ──これで匂う掲示板は一通り回れたな。

engChrName: There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other bulletin boards.
engSearchText:
There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other
bulletin boards.
jpnChrName: ま、今日は一つ片づけられれば十分かもな。
jpnSearchText: ま、今日は一つ片づけられれば十分かもな。

engChrName: No more scent, which means we're done with inspecting bulletin boards for today.
engSearchText:
No more scent, which means we're done with
inspecting bulletin boards for today.
jpnChrName: ノルマは果たせたが、 余裕があればこっちも片付けちまうか。
jpnSearchText:
ノルマは果たせたが、
余裕があればこっちも片付けちまうか。

engChrName: If we can take care of at least one job, I'll be happy.
engSearchText: If we can take care of at least one job, I'll be happy.
jpnChrName: うん、分かったよ。
jpnSearchText: うん、分かったよ。

engChrName: Today's quota has been met, but if we've got the time, we should finish the other job, too.
engSearchText:
Today's quota has been met, but if we've got the time,
we should finish the other job, too.
jpnChrName: それにしてもネットのトラブルか…… これなら僕が力になれるかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもネットのトラブルか……
これなら僕が力になれるかもしれない。

engChrName: Understood.
engSearchText: Understood.
jpnChrName: いいじゃねえか、お手並み拝見だな。
jpnSearchText: いいじゃねえか、お手並み拝見だな。

engChrName: I believe I'm qualified to help with the orbal network-related one.
engSearchText:
I believe I'm qualified to help with the orbal
network-related one.
jpnChrName: なるほど……こんな感じで 掲示板から依頼を引き受けるのね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……こんな感じで
掲示板から依頼を引き受けるのね。

engChrName: Oh, I'm sure you're more than qualified. Lookin' forward to seeing you kick ass on the keyboard.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm sure you're more than qualified.
Lookin' forward to seeing you kick ass on
the keyboard.
jpnChrName: “匂い”はまだ残ってる。 他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
“匂い”はまだ残ってる。
他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。

engChrName: So this is how you go around accepting jobs, huh?
engSearchText: So this is how you go around accepting jobs, huh?
jpnChrName: とりあえず、匂う掲示板は一通り回れたな。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず、匂う掲示板は一通り回れたな。

engChrName: There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other bulletin boards.
engSearchText:
There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other
bulletin boards.
jpnChrName: ２件の４ｓｐｇか。 少なくとも一つは片付けておきてえな。
jpnSearchText:
２件の４ｓｐｇか。
少なくとも一つは片付けておきてえな。

engChrName: Scent's gone, so we're done inspecting bulletin boards.
engSearchText:
Scent's gone, so we're done inspecting
bulletin boards.
jpnChrName: 既にノルマはこなしたが、 余裕があればこっちも片付けちまうか。
jpnSearchText:
既にノルマはこなしたが、
余裕があればこっちも片付けちまうか。

engChrName: We've got two requests. I'd like to handle at least one of 'em.
engSearchText:
We've got two requests. I'd like to handle at least one
of 'em.
jpnChrName: フフ、了解よ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、了解よ。

engChrName: One request down. We can call it here, but I'd like to finish the other one if we can.
engSearchText:
One request down. We can call it here, but I'd like to
finish the other one if we can.
jpnChrName: “匂い”はまだ残ってる。 他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
“匂い”はまだ残ってる。
他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。

engChrName: Got it.
engSearchText: Got it.

jpnSearchText: ……これで匂う掲示板は一通り回れたな。

engChrName: There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other bulletin boards.
engSearchText:
There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other
bulletin boards.
jpnChrName: “匂い”はまだ残ってる。 他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
“匂い”はまだ残ってる。
他の掲示板も見ておくとするか。

engChrName: I ain't smellin' the usual scent, so I think the bulletin board hunt's over.
engSearchText:
I ain't smellin' the usual scent, so I think the bulletin
board hunt's over.
jpnChrName: ……まだ“匂い”が残ってんな。 残りの掲示板も見ておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
……まだ“匂い”が残ってんな。
残りの掲示板も見ておくとするか。

engChrName: There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other bulletin boards.
engSearchText:
There's still a lingering scent. Gotta check the other
bulletin boards.
jpnChrName: これで匂う掲示板は一通り回れたか。
jpnSearchText: これで匂う掲示板は一通り回れたか。

engChrName: Hmm... The scent's still not gone. I'll check the next board.
engSearchText:
Hmm... The scent's still not gone. I'll check the
next board.
jpnChrName: なるべく片付けたいが……余裕次第だな。
jpnSearchText: なるべく片付けたいが……余裕次第だな。

engChrName: Okay, that should be all the bulletin boards that've got a scent.
engSearchText:
Okay, that should be all the bulletin boards that've
got a scent.
jpnChrName: にしても、オデット…… あの娘の依頼とはな。
jpnSearchText:
にしても、オデット……
あの娘の依頼とはな。

engChrName: I'd like to get through as many of these requests as we can, but that all depends on how busy we are.
engSearchText:
I'd like to get through as many of these requests as we
can, but that all depends on how busy we are.
jpnChrName: あはは……すみません。 詳細は皆と一緒に説明させてもらいますね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……すみません。
詳細は皆と一緒に説明させてもらいますね。

engChrName: I sure didn't expect us to get a job from Odette, though.
engSearchText:
I sure didn't expect us to get a job from
Odette, though.
jpnChrName: 菓子の調査ねえ…… とりあえず話だけでも聞きに行くか？
jpnSearchText:
菓子の調査ねえ……
とりあえず話だけでも聞きに行くか？

engChrName: It's certainly interesting, isn't it? I'll fill you in on the details when we're with the others.
engSearchText:
It's certainly interesting, isn't it? I'll fill you in on the
details when we're with the others.
jpnChrName: 今日は来てるね、４ｓｐｇ。
jpnSearchText: 今日は来てるね、４ｓｐｇ。

engChrName: Can't say I'm not intrigued. Definitely wanna hear about that one.
engSearchText:
Can't say I'm not intrigued. Definitely wanna hear
about that one.
jpnChrName: ちゃんと来てるね、４ｓｐｇ。 結社の人たちが仕込んだのかな。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんと来てるね、４ｓｐｇ。
結社の人たちが仕込んだのかな。

engChrName: Looks like we got some 4SPGs.
engSearchText: Looks like we got some 4SPGs.
jpnChrName: ああ、昨日よりは時間に余裕もある。 内容を見て対応していくか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、昨日よりは時間に余裕もある。
内容を見て対応していくか。

engChrName: Looks like we got some 4SPGs after all. The people from the society actually did what they said they'd do.
engSearchText:
Looks like we got some 4SPGs after all. The people
from the society actually did what they said they'd do.
jpnChrName: 脇道から思わぬ手掛かりを拾うことも あるかもしれんしな。
jpnSearchText:
脇道から思わぬ手掛かりを拾うことも
あるかもしれんしな。

engChrName: Guess so. We've got more free time today, so let's see if we can knock some of 'em out.
engSearchText:
Guess so. We've got more free time today, so let's see
if we can knock some of 'em out.
jpnChrName: とはいえあくまで“ゲーム”が優先、 余裕があればでいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえあくまで“ゲーム”が優先、
余裕があればでいいだろう。

engChrName: And who knows? We may find some useful information while we do so.
engSearchText:
And who knows? We may find some useful
information while we do so.
jpnChrName: ええ、それでいきましょう。
jpnSearchText: ええ、それでいきましょう。

engChrName: True, but don't forget that Almata's game is our first priority.
engSearchText:
True, but don't forget that Almata's game is our
first priority.
jpnChrName: アニエスはヴァンと別行動することになり タイレル地区のカフェテラスに向かうのだった。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスはヴァンと別行動することになり
タイレル地区のカフェテラスに向かうのだった。

engChrName: Right. Makes sense.
engSearchText: Right. Makes sense.
jpnChrName: フェリはヴァンと別行動することになり 旧市街の公衆浴場に向かうのだった。
jpnSearchText:
フェリはヴァンと別行動することになり
旧市街の公衆浴場に向かうのだった。

engSearchText:

engSearchText:
Bergard parted ways with Van and set off for the
arena in the Blacklight District.

jpnSearchText: <C1>仮想戦闘シミュレーターを終了しますか？

engChrName: Choose your preferred settings for the simulation.
engSearchText: Choose your preferred settings for the simulation.
jpnChrName: 仮想戦闘を開始します。よろしいですか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>仮想戦闘を開始します。よろしいですか？

engChrName: Turn off the simulator?
engSearchText: Turn off the simulator?
jpnChrName: 黒玉鋼の加工……僕にもできるかな。
jpnSearchText: 黒玉鋼の加工……僕にもできるかな。

engChrName: Begin the simulation?
engSearchText: Begin the simulation?
jpnChrName: 強力な武器があれば心強いが…… マジでできんのか？
jpnSearchText:
強力な武器があれば心強いが……
マジでできんのか？

engChrName: I wonder if I could forge a weapon with Onyx Steel?
engSearchText: I wonder if I could forge a weapon with Onyx Steel?
jpnChrName: そういえば、前にジスカール親方から特殊な合金の 加工法について教えて貰ったことがあるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、前にジスカール親方から特殊な合金の
加工法について教えて貰ったことがあるんだ。

engChrName: I'll bet you could if you put your mind to it.
engSearchText: I'll bet you could if you put your mind to it.
jpnChrName: 黒玉鋼──これを素材にすれば 強力な武器パーツが造れるかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
黒玉鋼──これを素材にすれば
強力な武器パーツが造れるかもしれない。

engChrName: Supervisor Giscard did teach me how to work with special alloys.
engSearchText:
Supervisor Giscard did teach me how to work with
special alloys.
jpnChrName: 強力な武器か……あれば心強いが。 マジでできんのか？
jpnSearchText:
強力な武器か……あれば心強いが。
マジでできんのか？

engChrName: Theoretically, if I apply that same knowledge to this Onyx Steel, I should be able to make a very powerful weapon.
engSearchText:
Theoretically, if I apply that same knowledge to this
Onyx Steel, I should be able to make a very
powerful weapon.
jpnChrName: もちろん親方のようにはいかないけど…… かなり近い物なら造れると思う。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん親方のようにはいかないけど……
かなり近い物なら造れると思う。

engChrName: That'd be sick. You're pretty damn resourceful, Quatre.
engSearchText:
That'd be sick. You're pretty damn
resourceful, Quatre.
jpnChrName: ──何とかやってみるよ。
jpnSearchText: ──何とかやってみるよ。

engChrName: Thanks. Though I'm sure the supervisor is better suited to this task...
engSearchText:
Thanks. Though I'm sure the supervisor is better
suited to this task...
jpnChrName: ハッ、頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、頼んだぜ。

engChrName: Regardless, I'll do my best.
engSearchText: Regardless, I'll do my best.
jpnChrName: 誰の武器パーツを作成しようか？
jpnSearchText: 誰の武器パーツを作成しようか？

engChrName: And that's all anyone can ever ask of you.
engSearchText: And that's all anyone can ever ask of you.
jpnChrName: うん。
jpnSearchText: うん。

engChrName: Who should I make this for?
engSearchText: Who should I make this for?

jpnSearchText: よし！
